h4.p: [03]^b^I gatiyaṃ^eb^. Yesaṃ dhātūnaṃ gatiattho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho. Pavattipāpuṇānipi. Tatra gamanaṃ duvidhaṃ kāyagamanaṃ ñāṇagamanañca. Tesu ^b^kāyagamanaṃ^eb^ nāma iriyāpathagamanaṃ, ^b^ñāṇagamanaṃ^eb^ nāma ñāṇuppatti, tasmā payogānurūpena ‘‘gacchatī’’ti padassa ‘‘jānātī’’tipi attho bhavati, ‘‘pavattatī’’tipi attho bhavati, ‘‘pāpuṇātī’’tipi attho bhavati, iriyāpathagamanena gacchatītipi attho bhavati, ñāṇagamanena gacchatītipi attho bhavati. Tathā hi ‘‘sīghaṃ gacchatī’’tiādīsu iriyāpathagamanaṃ ‘‘gamana’’nti vuccati. Sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gato. ‘‘Gatimā’’tiādīsu ^a^M0.0002^ea^ pana ñāṇagamanaṃ. Evaṃ sabbesampi gatyatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathāpayogaṃ attho gahetabbo.

[03]Tassimāni rūpāni bhavanti – iti, eti, udeti. Kārite ‘‘udāyatī’’ti rūpaṃ bhavati. Uṭṭhāpetīti hi attho, dukāro āgamo. Upeti, samupeti, veti, apeti, aveti, anveti, sameti, abhisameti, samayo, abhisamayo, īdi, udi, ekodi, paṇḍito, ito, udito, upeto, samupeto, anvito, apeto, sameto, etabbo, paccetabbo, paṭiyamāno, paṭicco, ento, adhippeto, adhippāyo, paccayo, aññānipi yojetabbāni. ‘‘Itā, ita’’ntiādinā yathārahaṃ itthinapuṃsakavasenapi. Paccetuṃ, upetuṃ, samupetuṃ, anvetuṃ, sametuṃ, abhisametuṃ, icca, paṭicca, samecca, abhisamecca, apecca, upecca, paṭimukhaṃ itvā, itvāna, upetvā, upetvāna, upetuna, aññānipi buddhavacanānurūpato yojetabbāni.

[03]Tatra ^b^itāya^eb^nti iti ayanti chedo. ^b^Iti^eb^iti ca gacchati pavattatīti attho. Ayaṃ panettha suttapadattho – yo ^a^M0.0003^ea^ doso loke ‘‘kodho’’ti lokiyamahājanena vuccati, nāyaṃ atthato kodhoti vattabbo. Kinti pana vattabbo, eso hi sarīrasaṅkhātaguhāsayo maccurājā eva kodhavasena pamaddanto sattasantāne gacchatīti vattabbo. Taṃ evarūpaṃ ‘‘maccurājā’’ti vattabbaṃ bahuno janassa anatthakaraṃ kodhaṃ hitakāmo damena paññāya vīriyena diṭṭhiyā ca chindeyyāti.

[03]^b^Etī^eb^ti imassa pana āgacchatīti attho. ‘‘Etī’’ti ettha hi ^b^ā^eb^upasaggo sandhikiccena paṭicchannattā na pākaṭo valāhakāvattharito puṇṇacando viya. Tathā hi ettha ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho bhavati, ^b^ā^eb^kārassa ca ^b^i^eb^kārena parena saddhiṃyeva ^b^e^eb^kārādeso. Tasmā ‘‘ayaṃ so sārathī eti. Etu vessantaro rājā’’tiādīsu ‘‘āgacchati, āgacchatū’’tiādinā attho kathetabbo. Byākaraṇasatthepi hi ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho dissati, tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Atha vā ^b^itī^eb^ti rassavasena vuttaṃ padaṃ gamanaṃ bodheti, ^b^etī^eb^ti vuddhivasena vuttaṃ pana yathāpayogaṃ āgamanādīni. Mattāvasenapi hi padāni savisesatthāni bhavanti. Taṃ yathā? Sāsane pabbajito, raṭṭhā pabbājitoti. Saññogāsaññogavasenapi, taṃ yathā? Gāmā niggacchati. Yasaṃ poso nigacchati, tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
[21]^b^I gatiya^eb^nti kathitā, dhātu vuddhiṃ gatā yadā;
[22]Āgamane ca hotīti, dhīmā lakkheyya taṃ yathā.

[03]Tathā hi ītīti anatthāya eti āgacchatīti īti, upaddavo, iti āgamanattho gahetabbo. Āha ca ^b^suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘etīti īti, āgantukānaṃ akusalabhāgīnaṃ byasanahetūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacana’’nti.

[03]Idāni yathārahaṃ nipātākhyātanāmikapariyāpannānaṃ ^b^itīto^eb^ saddānamatthuddhāro vuccate – tattha ^b^iti^eb^saddo hetuparisamāpanādipadattha vipariyāya pakārāvadhāraṇa nidassanādianekatthappabhedo. Tathā hesa ‘‘ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccatī’’tiādīsu hetuatthe dissati. ‘‘Tasmātiha me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu anukampā, kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā’’tiādīsu parisamāpane. ‘‘Iti vā iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato’’tiādīsu ādiattho. ‘‘Māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanamabhilāpo’’tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye. ‘‘Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito. Saupaddavo bālo, anupaddavo ^a^M0.0005^ea^ paṇḍito. Saupasaggo bālo, anupasaggo paṇḍito’’tiādīsu pakāro. ‘‘Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā ādanda atthītissa vacanīyaṃ. Kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya’’ntiādīsu avadhāraṇe. ‘‘Atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto, natthīti kho kaccāna ayaṃ dutiyo anto’’tiādīsu nidassane. Nipātavaseneva te payogā gahetabbā. ‘‘Itāyaṃ kodharūpenā’’ti ettha pana ākhyātavasena gamane ^b^iti^eb^saddo dissati. Ayamevattho idhādhippeto, nipātattho pana na icchitabbo, viññūnaṃ atthaggahaṇe kosallupādanatthaṃ kevalaṃ atthuddhāravasena āgatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itaro pana –

[03]Idha pana ^b^samaya^eb^saddassa atthuddhāraṃ sanibbacanaṃ vattabbampi avatvā upari ^b^aya^eb^dhātuvisayeyeva vakkhāma ^b^i e aya^eb^dhātuvasena tidhātumayattā ^b^samaya^eb^saddassa. Tatra ^b^itī^eb^ti ^b^i^eb^kārānantaratyantapadassa ca ‘‘eti, udetī’’tiādīnañca ^b^e^eb^kārānantara^b^tya^eb^ntapadānaṃ aññesañca evarūpānaṃ padamālā yathārahaṃ yebhuyyena attanopadāni vajjetvā yojetabbā. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu dukkarā kriyāpadamālā. Yasmā pana imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sukarā ca dukkarā ca ^b^tya^eb^ntapadamālā jānitabbā ^a^M0.0006^ea^, tasmā ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇādīsu aṭṭhasu gaṇesu vihitehi channavutiyā vacanehi sabbasādhāraṇaṃ asabbasādhāraṇañca padamālānayaṃ brūma –
[22]Ito mutto nayo nāma, natthi koci kriyāpade.

[03]Idāni ikārānantaratyantapadassa kamo vuccate – iti, inti. Isi, itha. Imi, ima. Aparipuṇṇo vattamānānayo. Itu, intu. Ihi, itha. Imi, ima. Aparipuṇṇo pañcamīnayo. Ettha ca imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sāsanānurūpabhāvassa imāni sādhakapadāni ^a^M0.0007^ea^ ‘‘veti, apeti, anvetī’’ti. Tattha vi iti ^b^veti^eb^. Vigacchatīti attho, ^b^iti^eb^saddo hettha gamanaṃ bodheti. Tathā apa iti ^b^apeti^eb^. Apagacchatīti attho. Anu iti ^b^anveti^eb^. Anugacchatīti attho. Garū pana anu eti ^b^anvetī^eb^ti vadanti. Taṃ –

[07]Imāya pāḷiyā na sameti ‘‘jessantaṃ anvetī’’ti vacanato ‘‘anugacchāmī’’ti vacanato ca. Tathā hi ^b^eti^eb^saddo yattha ce iriyāpathavācako, tattha āgamanaṃyeva joteti, na gamanaṃ, tasmā āgamanatthassa ayuttito gamanatthassa ca yuttito vi itiādinā chedo ñeyyo. Etesañca ^b^iti^eb^saddavasena katachedānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ yuttibhāvañca ‘‘itāyaṃ kodharūpenā’’ti pāḷiyeva sādheti, tasmāyeva ‘‘anu iti, anu inti, anu isī’’tiādinā ‘‘anvetī’’tiādīnaṃ chede labbhamānanayena vuttappakāro vattamānāpañcamīnayo parassapadavasena dassito. Sattamīrūpādīni sabbathā appasiddhāni.

[03]Imāni pana bhavissantiyā rūpāni, sittā te lahumessati. Issati, issanti. Issasi, issatha. Issāmi, issāma. Issate, issante. Issase, issavhe. Issaṃ, issāmhe. Asabbadhātukattepi suddhassarattā dhātussa ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo na labbhati. Paripuṇṇo bhavissantīnayo.

[03]Atha kālātipattiyā rūpāni bhavanti, issā, issaṃsu. Isse, issatha. Issaṃ, issamhā. Issatha, issisu. Issase, issavhe. Issaṃ, issāmhase. Kālātipattibhāve ^a^M0.0008^ea^ ca asabbadhātukatte ca santepi suddhassarattā dhātussa ^b^a^eb^kārikārāgamo na labbhati anekantikattā vā anupapannattā ca ^b^a^eb^kārāgamo na hoti. Dvinnañhettha suddhassarānaṃ anantarikānaṃ ekatosannipāto anupapatti. Paripuṇṇo kālātipattinayo.

[03]Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane sotūnaṃ payogatthesu paramakosallajananatthaṃ ‘‘nanu te sutaṃ brāhmaṇa bhaññamāne, devā na issanti purisaparakkamassā’’ti pāḷito nayaṃ gahetvā vuttappakārehi bhavissantiyā rūpehi sabbaso samānāni asamānatthāni vattamānikarūpāni ca īsakaṃ aññamaññaṃ samānāni bhavissantīkālātipattīnaṃ rūpāni ca pakāsayissāma – vattamānāvasena tāva ‘‘issati, issanti. Issasi, issathā’’ti sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Attho pana ‘‘issaṃ karotī’’tiādinā vattabbo. Tasmiṃyeva atthe bhavissantīvasena ‘‘ississati, ississanti. Ississasi, ississathā’’ti paripuṇṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Attho pana ‘‘issaṃ karissatī’’tiādinā vattabbo. Kālātipattivasena pana ‘‘ississā, ississaṃsu. Ississe, ississathā’’ti paripuṇṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ, attho pana ‘‘issaṃ akarissā’’tiādinā vattabbo. Dhātvantaravasena saṃsandanānayoyaṃ.
[21]Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṃ, vissāsaṃ eyya paṇḍito;
[03]Eyya ^a^M0.0009^ea^, eyyuṃ. Eyyāsi, eyyātha. Eyyāmi, eyyāma. Etha, eraṃ. Etho, eyyāvho. Eyyaṃ, eyyāmhe.
[03]So puriso eyya, te eyyuṃ. Tvaṃ eyyāsi, tumhe eyyātha. Ahaṃ eyyāmi, mayaṃ eyyāma. So puriso etha, te eraṃ. Tvaṃ etho, tumhe eyyāvho. Ahaṃ eyyaṃ, mayaṃ eyyāmhe.
[03]Essati, essanti. Essasi, essatha. Essāmi, essāma. Essate, essante. Essase, essavhe. Essaṃ, essāmhe.
[22]Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasaṃ.
[03]‘‘Abhidosagato idāni ehī’’ti vacanadassanato aparānipi bhavissantīrūpāni gahetabbāni.
[03]Ehiti, ehinti. Ehisi, ehitha. Ehimi, ehima. Ehite, ehinte. Ehise, ehivhe. Ehissaṃ, ehissāmhe.
[03]Essā, essaṃsu. Esse, essatha. Essaṃ essāmhā. Essatha, essisu. Essase, essavhe. Essiṃ, essāmhase.
[03]Udetu, udentu. Udehi, udetha. Udemi, udema, udāmase.
[03]Udeyya, udeyyuṃ. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ. Udissati, udissanti. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ. Udissā, udissaṃsu. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ.

[03]^b^Ku^eb^^a^M0.0010^ea^^b^sadde ke^eb^ ca. Koti, kavati, kāyati, evaṃ kattupadāni bhavanti. Kuyyati, kiyyati, evaṃ kammapadāni. Kānanaṃ, kabbaṃ, jātakaṃ, evaṃ nāmikapadāni. Kutvā, kutvāna, kavitvā, kavitvāna, kāvitvā, kāvitvāna, kāyituṃ, evaṃ abyayapadāni.
[03]Tatra ^b^kānana^eb^nti ṭhitamajjhanhikasamaye kavati saddaṃ karotīti kānanaṃ, vanaṃ. Tathā hi –

[03]Vuttaṃ. Atha vā kokilamayūrādayo kavanti saddāyanti kūjanti etthāti kānanaṃ. Manoharatāya avassaṃ kuyyati paṇḍitehīti ^b^kabbaṃ. Kāviyaṃ. Kāveyyaṃ^eb^. Aññatra pana kavīnaṃ idanti ^b^kabba^eb^nti taddhitavasena attho gahetabbo. Keci tu ^b^kābya^eb^nti saddarūpaṃ icchanti, na taṃ pāvacane pamāṇaṃ sakkaṭabhāsābhāvato. Sakkaṭabhāsātopi hi ācariyā nayaṃ gaṇhanti. Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ atītaṃ bhagavato cariyaṃ, taṃ kīyati kathīyati etenāti ^b^jātakaṃ^eb^. Jātakapāḷi hi idha ‘‘jātaka’’nti vuttā. Aññatra pana jātaṃ eva jātakanti gahetabbaṃ. Tathā hi ^b^jātaka^eb^saddo desanāyampi vattati ‘‘itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhamma’’ntiādīsu. Jātiyampi vattati ‘‘jātakaṃ samodhānesī’’tiādīsu.

[03]^b^Pakka nīcagatiyaṃ. Nīcagamanaṃ^eb^ nāma hīnagamanaṃ hīnappavatti vā. ^b^Nīca^eb^saddo hi hīnavācako ‘‘nīce kule paccājāto’’ti ettha viya. Pakkati kriyāpadamettha dissati, na nāmikapadaṃ. Yattha yattha nāmikapadaṃ na dissati, tattha tattha nāmikapadaṃ upaparikkhitvā ^a^M0.0011^ea^ gahetabbaṃ. Kriyāpadameva hi duddasaṃ, kriyāpade vijjamāne nāmikapadaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ, tasmā antamaso ‘‘pakkanaṃ, takanaṃ’’ iccevamādīni bhāvavācakāni nāmikapadāni sabbāsu dhātūsu yathārahaṃ labbhantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Taki kicchajīvane. Kicchajīvanaṃ^eb^ kasirajīvanaṃ. Taṅkati. Ātaṅkati. Ātaṅko. ^b^Ātaṅko^eb^ti kicchajīvitakaro rogo, tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā ‘‘appābādhaṃ appātaṅka’’nti imasmiṃ pāḷippadese iti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ ^b^‘‘ābādho^eb^ti visabhāgavedanā vuccati, yā ekadese uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ ayapaṭṭena bandhitvā viya gaṇhāti. ^b^Ātaṅko^eb^ti kicchajīvitakaro rogo. Atha vā yāpetabbarogo ātaṅko, itaro ābādho. Khuddako vā rogo ātaṅko, balavā ābādho. Keci pana ‘ajjhattasamuṭṭhāno ābādho, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhāno ātaṅko’ti vadantī’’ti.
[03]^b^Suka gatiyaṃ^eb^. Sokati, suko, sukī. Tatra ^b^suko^eb^ti suvo. Sokati manāpena gamanena gacchatīti suko. Tassa bhariyā sukī.

[03]^b^Bukka bhassane^eb^. Idha ^b^bhassanaṃ^eb^ nāma sunakhabhassanaṃ adhippetaṃ ‘‘sunakho bhassitvā’’ti ettha viya, na ‘‘āvāso gocaraṃ ^a^M0.0012^ea^ bhassa’’ntiādīsu viya. Vacanasaṅkhātaṃ bhassanaṃ, bukkati sā.

[03]^b^Aka kuṭilagatiyaṃ^eb^. Akati. Etā ^b^ku^eb^ādikā ^b^aka^eb^pariyantā dhātuyo parassa bhāsāti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Tesaṃ mate etā ‘‘ti anti, tu antu’’ iccādīnaṃyeva visayo. Pāḷiyaṃ pana niyamo natthi, tasmā na taṃ idha pamāṇaṃ.

[03]^b^I ajjhayane. Ajjhayanaṃ^eb^ uccāraṇaṃ sikkhanaṃ vā, ayati, adhīyati, ajjhayati, adhīte, ajjhenaṃ, ajjhāyako. Dibbaṃ adhīyase māyaṃ. Adhīyanti mahārāja, dibbamāyidha paṇḍitā. Ajjhenamariyā pathaviṃ janindā. Tattha ^b^ajjhāyako^eb^ti ajjhayatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti attho.

[03]^b^U sadde^eb^. Avati, avanti. Avasi. Ettha ‘‘yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā’’ti pāḷi ^b^pa^eb^pubbassa ^b^u^eb^dhātussa payogoti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Pa^eb^pubbassa ^b^vada^eb^dhātussa ^b^da^eb^kāralopappayogotipi vattuṃ yujjati.
[03]^b^Vaṅka koṭille^eb^. Vaṅkati. Vaṅkaṃ. ^b^Vaṅka^eb^saddo hi ^b^vakka^eb^saddena samānattho, ^b^vakka^eb^saddo ca ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddena. Tathā hi –

[07]Pāḷi ^a^M0.0013^ea^ dissati. Ayaṃ pana ^b^vakka^eb^saddo sakkaṭabhāsaṃ patvā ^b^ka^eb^kāra^b^ra^eb^kārasaññogakkhariko bhavati, dhātubhāvo panassa porāṇehi na vutto, tasmā kriyāpadaṃ na diṭṭhaṃ. Imassa pana ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddassa ^b^‘‘vaṅka koṭille^eb^’’ti dhātubhāvo vutto, ‘‘vaṅkatī’’ti kriyāpadañca, pāḷiyaṃ tu ‘‘vaṅkatī’’ti kriyāpadaṃ na diṭṭhaṃ, tathā bhāvavācako ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddopi. Vāccaliṅgo pana anekesu ṭhānesu diṭṭho. Tatta ^b^vaṅkatī^eb^ti kriyāpadaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avijjamānampi gahetabbameva ^b^nāthatī^eb^ti kriyāpadamiva. Bhāvavācakassa pana ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddassa atthitā natthitā ca pāḷiādīsu punappunaṃ upaparikkhitabbā. Kecettha vadeyyuṃ ‘‘yadi bhāvavācako ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddo natthi, kathaṃ ‘aṭṭhavaṅkaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāra’nti ettha samāso’’ti. Ettha pana aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vaṅkaṃ ^b^aṭṭhavaṅkaṃ,^eb^ na aṭṭhavaṅkāni yassāti. Dabbavācako hi ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddo, na bhāvavācakoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[22]Baḷise giribhede ca, vattate sa pumā tadā.
[03]Ayañhi ‘‘te’me janā vaṅkaghastā sayanti. Yathāpi maccho baḷisaṃ, vaṅkaṃ maṃsena chāditaṃ. Vaṅkaghastova ambujo’’tiādīsu baḷise vattati.

[03]Ettha siyā ‘‘nanu ca bho ‘yathāpi maccho baḷisaṃ, vaṅkaṃ maṃsena chādita’nti ettha ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddo guṇavācako visesanasado, yena baḷiso visesito, tena vaṅkaṃ kuṭilaṃ baḷisanti attho viññāyatī’’ti? Tanna, ^b^vaṅka^eb^sadde avuttepi baḷisasabhāvassa vaṅkattā kuṭilattho pākaṭoti natthi visesanasaddena ^a^M0.0014^ea^ payojanaṃ. Idaṃ pana ‘‘baḷisaṃ vaṅka’’nti vacanaṃ ‘‘hatthi nāgo. Saroruhaṃ padumaṃ. Hatthī ca kuñjaro nāgo’’tiādivacanamiva pariyāyavacanaṃ, tasmā ‘‘vaṅka’’nti padassa ‘‘kuṭila’’nti attho na gahetabbo. Atha vā yathā ‘‘yathā āraññakaṃ nāgaṃ, dantiṃ anveti hatthinī’’ti ettha ^b^nāga^eb^saddassa ^b^dantī^eb^saddassa ca aññamaññapariyā yavacanattepi ^b^danti^eb^nti manoramadantayuttanti attho saṃvaṇṇito, tathā ‘‘baḷisaṃ vaṅka’’nti imesampi aññamaññaṃ pariyāyavacanattepi ^b^vaṅka^eb^nti kuṭilanti attho vattabbo. Evañhi sati attho sālarājā viya suphullito hoti, desanā ca vilāsappattā, na pana ‘‘vaṅkaṃ baḷisa’’nti saddānaṃ guṇaguṇīvasena samānādhikaraṇabhāvo icchitabbo ‘‘buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī’’tiādīsu ‘‘buddho bhagavā’’ti imesaṃ viya samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa anicchitabbattā. Na hi īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇabhāvo porāṇehi anumato.

[03]‘‘Buddhaṃ buddhaṃ nikhilavisayaṃ suddhiyā yāva suddhi’’nti ca ādīsu pana anumato. Ettha hi ‘‘etādiso’’ti ca ‘‘appaṭipuggalo’’ti ca ‘‘tathāgato’’ti ca ‘‘balappatto’’ti ca ‘‘sambuddho’’ti ca ‘‘parinibbuto’’ti ca imāni ‘‘satthā’’ti anena padena samānādhikaraṇāni. Tathā ‘‘buddhaṃ buddha’’nti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ pacchimaṃ purimena samānādhikaraṇaṃ bhavati.

[03]Iti ‘‘yathāpi maccho baḷisaṃ, vaṅkaṃ maṃsena chādita’’nti ettha ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddo baḷisassābhidhānantaraṃ, na guṇavācako. Evaṃ ^b^vaṅka^eb^saddo baḷise vattati. ‘‘Kaṅkaṃ gacchāma pabbataṃ. Dūre vaṅkatapabbato’’tiādīsu ^a^M0.0015^ea^ pana girivisese vattati. Ettha ca ‘‘vaṅkapabbato’’ti vattabbe sukhuccāraṇatthaṃ niruttinayena majjhe animittaṃ ^b^ta^eb^kārāgamaṃ katvā ‘‘vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā vaṅkoyeva vaṅkatā, yathā devo eva devatā. Yathā ca disā eva disatāti, evaṃ ^b^tā^eb^paccayavasena vaṅkatā ca sā pabbato cāti ‘‘vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttaṃ, majjhe rassavasena cetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā vaṅkamassa saṇṭhānamatthīti vaṅkatoti ^b^mantu^eb^atthe ^b^ta^eb^paccayo, yathā pabbamassa atthīti pabbatoti. Evaṃ vaṅkato ca so pabbato cāti vaṅkatapabbato. ‘‘Vaṅkapabbato’’ icceva vā paṇṇatti, pādakkharapāripūriyā pana ‘‘dūre vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Loka dassane^eb^. Lokati. Loko. Ālokoti aññānipi rūpāni gahetabbāni. ^b^Curādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pana patvā imissā ‘‘loketi, lokayati, oloketi, olokayatī’’tiādinā rūpāni bhavanti. ^b^Loko^eb^ti tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti. Tattha ‘‘eko loko, sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti āgato saṅkhāro eva loko saṅkhāraloko. Sattā eva loko sattaloko. Cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto okāso eva loko okāsaloko, yo ‘‘bhājanaloko’’tipi vuccati. Tesu saṅkhāro lujjatīti lokoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ‘‘lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā lokoti vuccatī’’ti. Lokiyati ettha puññapāpaṃ tabbipāko cāti satto loko. Lokiyati vicittākārato dissatīti cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto okāso loko. Yasmā pana ^b^loka^eb^saddo samūhepi dissati, tasmā lokiyati samudāyavasena ^a^M0.0016^ea^ paññāpiyatīti loko, samūhoti ayampi attho gahetabbo. Atha vā ^b^loko^eb^ti tayo lokā kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti. Tesaṃ sarūpaṃ ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇe kathessāma bahuvidhatañca. Bahiddhā pana kavīhi ‘‘loko tu bhuvane jane’’ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Siloka saṅghāte. Saṅghāto^eb^ piṇḍanaṃ. Silokati, siloko, silokamanukassāmi. Akkharapadaniyamito vacanasaṅghāto ^b^siloko^eb^. So pajjanti vuccati, tathā hi ‘‘siloko yasassi pajje’’ti kavayo vadanti.
[03]^b^Deka dheka saddussāhesu. Saddo^eb^ ravo, ^b^ussāho^eb^ vāyāmo. Dekati. Dhekati.
[03]^b^Reka saki saṅkāyaṃ^eb^. Rekati. Saṅkati, tasmiṃ me saṅkate mano. Saṅkā.
[03]^b^Kata loliye^eb^. Lolabhāvo ^b^loliyaṃ^eb^ yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Kakati, kāko, kākī. Ettha ‘‘kāko, dhaṅko, vāyaso, bali, bhoji, ariṭṭho’’ti imāni kākābhidhānāni.
[03]^b^Kuka vaka ādāne^eb^. Kukati, vakati, koko, vako. Ettha ^b^koko^eb^ti araññasunakho. ^b^Vako^eb^ti khuddakavanadīpiko, byagghotipi vadanti.
[03]^b^Vaka dittiyaṃ paṭighāte ca. Ditti^eb^ sobhā, vakati.

[03]^b^Kaki^eb^^a^M0.0017^ea^^b^vaki sakka tika ṭika seka^eb^ gatyatthā. Kaṅkati, vaṅkati, sakkati, nisakkati, parisakkati, osakkati, vadhāya parisakkanaṃ. Biḷāranisakkamattampi. Tekati, ṭekati, ṭīkā sekati. Ettha ^b^ṭīkā^eb^ti ṭikiyati jāniyati saṃvaṇṇanāya attho etāyāti ṭīkā. Etā ^b^i^eb^dhātuādikā ^b^seka^eb^pariyantā dhātuyo ^b^‘‘attanobhāsā’’^eb^ti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Tesaṃ mate etā ‘‘te ante, taṃ antaṃ’’iccādīnaṃyeva visayo, pāvacane pana niyamo natthi.

[03]^b^Hikka abyattasadde. Abyattasaddo^eb^ avibhāvitatthasaddo niratthakasaddo ca. Hikkati, hikkate. Imaṃ ^b^‘‘ubhayatobhāsā’’^eb^ti vadanti. Idaṃ tu pāvacanena saṃsandati. Parassattanobhāsānañhi dhātūnaṃ ‘‘bhavati, bhavate, bādhate, bādhatī’’tiādinā yebhuyyena dvidhā dvidhā rūpāni sāsane dissanti.

[03]^b^Khā pakathane khyā^eb^ ca. ^b^Pakathanaṃ^eb^ ācikkhanaṃ desanaṃ vā. Khāti, saṅkhāti. ^b^Ā^eb^pubbatte visadisabhāvena ^b^khā^eb^tyakkharassa dvittaṃ, ^b^ā^eb^kārassa ca saññogapubbattā rassattaṃ, akkhāti. Akkhāsi purisuttamo. Akkheyyaṃ te ahaṃ ayye. Dhammo saṅkhāyati. Akkhāyati. Atra pana ^b^ka^eb^kāralopo. Svākhāto bhagavatā dhammo. Saṅkhāto. Akkhāto. Akkhātāro tathāgatā. Saṅkhātā sabbadhammānaṃ vidhuro. Saṅkhā, paṭisaṅkhā. Kriyaṃ ākyāti kathetīti ākhyātaṃ. Keci ^a^M0.0018^ea^ pana ‘‘svākhāto’’ti ca ‘‘svākkhyāto’’ti ca ‘‘svākhyāto’’ti ca padamicchanti. Tattha pacchimāni sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṃ gahetvā vuttāni, itaraṃ yathāṭhitarūpanipphattivasena, ato yathādassitapadāniyeva pasatthatarāni. Tattha ^b^saṅkhā^eb^saddassa atthuddhāro nīyate – ^b^saṅkhā^eb^saddo ñāṇakoṭṭhāsapaññattigaṇanāsu dissati. ‘‘Saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevatī’’tiādīsu hi ñāṇe dissati. ‘‘Papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantī’’tiādīsu koṭṭhāse. ‘‘Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā’’tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. ‘‘Na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu’’ntiādīsu gaṇanāyaṃ. Etthetaṃ vuccati –

[03]^b^Khi khaye^eb^. Khiyanadhammaṃ khīyati. Sāsanānurūpena sare ^b^i^eb^kārassa ^b^iyyā^eb^deso, khiyyati. ‘‘Khayo, khaṃ’’ iccapi rūpāni ñeyyāni. Tattha ^b^khayo^eb^ti khiyanaṃ khayo. Atha vā khiyanti kilesā etthāti khayo, magganibbānāni. Khayasaṅkhātena maggena pāpuṇiyattā phalampi khayo. ^b^Kha^eb^nti tucchaṃ suññaṃ vivittaṃ rittaṃ, ^b^kha^eb^nti vā ākāso.

[03]^b^Khi nivāse^eb^. Khīyati, khiyyati vā. Sāsanānurūpena ^b^i^eb^kārassa ^b^īya iyyā^eb^deso daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇepi pakkhipitabbo. Khaṃ khayaṃ. Abhiramaṇīyaṃ rājakkhayaṃ. Tattha ^b^khīyatī^eb^ti nivasati. ^b^Kha^eb^nti cakkhādīndriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ nivāsaṭṭhena. ^b^Khaya^eb^nti nivesanaṃ. ^b^Rājakkhaya^eb^nti rañño nivesanaṃ. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi –
[03]^b^Khe khādanasattāsu^eb^. Khāyati. Undūrā khāyanti. Vikkhāyitakaṃ. Gokhāyitakaṃ. Assirī viya khāyati. Disāpi me na pakkhāyanti. Etthādimhi ^b^kāyatī^eb^ti khādati. Atha vā upaṭṭhāti paññāyati.

[03]^b^Sukha dukkha takriyāyaṃ. Takriyā^eb^ti sukhadukkhānaṃ vedanānaṃ kriyā, sukhanaṃ dukkhananti vuttaṃ hoti. Akammakā ime dhātavo. Sukhati, dukkhati. Sukhaṃ, dukkhaṃ. Sukhito, dukkhito. Sukhaṃ sātaṃ pīṇanaṃ, dukkhaṃ vighātaṃ aghaṃ kileso. Tattha ^b^sukha^eb^nti sukhayatīti sukhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. ^b^Dukkha^eb^nti dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti attho. Imāni nibbacanāni kāritavasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sukhadukkha^eb^saddatthaṃ vadantehi garūhi ^b^sukhayati dukkhayati^eb^saddānaṃ kammatthamādāya vivaraṇassa katattā. Tathā hi ‘‘sukheti sukhayati, sukhāpeti sukhāpayati, dukkheti dukkhayati, dukkhāpeti dukkhāpayatī’’ti imāni tesaṃ kāritapadarūpāni, attānaṃ sukheti pīṇetīti ca, sukhayati sukhaṃ, dukkhayatīti dukkhanti ca,

[07]Pāḷiādidassanato. Saddasatthe pana dhātupāṭhasaṅkhepe ca ime dhātavo ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇeyeva vuttā. ‘‘Sukhayati dukkhayatī’’ti ca akāritāni suddhakattupadāni icchitāni. Mayaṃ tu tesaṃ tabbacanaṃ suddhakattari ca tāni padarūpāni na icchāma pāḷiādīhi viruddhattā, tasmāyeva te imasmiṃ ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe vuttā. Ayañhi suddhakattuvisaye asmākaṃ ruci ‘‘sukhatīti sukhito, dukkhatīti dukkhito’’ti.

[03]Nanu ca bho ‘‘sukhati dukkhatī’’ti kriyāpadāni buddhavacane na dissantīti? Saccaṃ, evaṃ santepi aṭṭhakathānayavasena gahetabbattā dissantiyeva nāma. Na hi sabbathā sabbesaṃ dhātūnaṃ rūpāni sāsane loke vā labbhanti, ekaccāni pana labbhanti, ekaccāni na labbhanti. Evaṃ santepi nayavasena labbhantiyeva. ‘‘Kappayavho patissatā’’ti hi diṭṭhe ‘‘caravho bhuñjavho’’tiādīnipi nayavasena diṭṭhāniyeva nāma.

[03]Tatra panāyaṃ nayo. ^b^Visuddhimaggā^eb^dīsu hi ‘‘ekadviyojanamattampi addhānaṃ gatassa vāyo kuppati, gattāni dukkhantī’’ti evaṃ ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇikaṃ akammakaṃ suddhakattuvācakaṃ ‘‘dukkhantī’’ti kriyāpadaṃ dissati. Tasmiṃ diṭṭhiyeva ‘‘sukhati, sukhanti. Sukhasi, sukhatha. Sukhāmi, sukhāmā’’tiādīni ca ‘‘dukkhati, dukkhanti. Dukkhasi, dukkhathā’’tiādīnica diṭṭhāni nāma honti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa tādisassa anavajjassa nayassa gahetabbattā, tasmā ‘‘sukhatīti sukhito, dukkhatīti dukkhito’’ti ^b^bhūvādi^eb^nayo eva gahetabbo, na pana ^b^curādi^eb^nayo. Aparampettha nibbacanaṃ, sukhaṃ sañjātaṃ ^a^M0.0021^ea^ etassāti ^b^sukhito,^eb^ sañjātasukhoti attho. Esa nayo ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti etthāpi. Atha vā sukhena ito pavattoti sukhito. Esa nayo ‘‘dukkhito’’ti etthāpi. Dullabhāyaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.

[03]^b^Mokkha muccane^eb^. Akammakoyaṃ dhātu. Mokkhati. Mokkho. Pātimokkho. Kārite ‘‘mokkheti, mokkhayati, mokkhāpeti, mokkhāpayatī’’ti rūpāni. Keci panimaṃ ^b^‘‘mokkha mocane’’^eb^ti paṭhitvā ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇe pakkhipanti. Tesaṃ mate ‘‘mokkheti, mokkhayatī’’ti suddhakattupadāni bhavanti. Etāni pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanti. Tathā hi ‘‘mokkhanti mārabandhanā. Na me samaṇe mokkhasi. Mahāyaññaṃ yajissāma, evaṃ mokkhāma pāpakā’’ti pāḷiyā virujjhanti. ‘‘Yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti ^b^pātimokkho’’^eb^ti aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanti, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘mokkhesi mokkhemā’’ti ca avatvā ‘‘mokkhasi, mokkhāmā’’ti suddhakattuvācakaṃ vuttaṃ, tañca kho apādānavisayaṃ katvā. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘mokkheti, mocetī’’ti hetukattuvācakaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi apādānavisayaṃyeva katvā. Evaṃ imassa dhātuno suddhakattuvisaye akammakabhāvo vidito, hetukattuvisaye ekakammakabhāvo vidito ^b^muca paca chidā^eb^dayo viya. ^b^Mokkha^eb^dhātu dvigaṇikoti ce? Na, anekesu sāṭṭhakathesu pāḷippadesesu ‘‘mokkheti, mokkhayatī’’ti suddhakatturūpānaṃ adassanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Okha rākha lākha dākha dhākha sosanālamatthesu^eb^. Okhati. Rākhati. Lākhati. Dākhati. Dhākhati.
[03]^b^Ukha nakha makha rakha lakha rakhi lakhi ikhi rikhi gatyatthā^eb^. Ukhati. Nakhati. Makhati. Rakhati. Lakhati. Raṅkhati. Laṅkhati. Iṅkhati. Riṅkhati.
[03]^b^Rakkha pālane^eb^. Rakkhati. Rakkhā, rakkhaṇaṃ, sīlaṃ rakkhito devadatto, sīlaṃ rakkhitaṃ devadattena, sīlaṃ rakkhako devadatto.

[03]^b^Nakkha gatiyaṃ^eb^. Nakkhati. Nakkhattaṃ. Ettha ^b^nakkhatta^eb^nti etto ito cāti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṃ. Porāṇā pana ‘‘nakkharanti na nassantīti ^b^nakkhattānī’’^eb^ti kathayiṃsu. ‘‘Nakkhattaṃ, joti, nirikkhaṃ, bhaṃ’’ iccete pariyāyā.

[03]^b^Kakhi vakhi makhi kaṅkhāyaṃ^eb^. Satthari kaṅkhati. Vaṅkhati, maṅkhati. ‘‘Kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvedhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsagāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhanā thambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho’’ iccete kaṅkhāpariyāyā. Etesu pana –
[03]^b^Kakhi iccāyaṃ^eb^. Dhanaṃ kaṅkhati, abhikaṅkhati, nābhikaṅkhāmi maraṇaṃ. Abhikaṅkhitaṃ dhanaṃ.

[03]^b^Likha lekhane^eb^. Likhati, sallekhati. Atisallekhatevāyaṃ samaṇo. Lekhā, lekhanaṃ, lekhako, likhitaṃ, sallekhapaṭipatti, etā ^b^dakhi^eb^ādikā ^b^likha^eb^pariyantā ^b^‘‘parassabhāsā’’^eb^ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
[03]^b^Dhukkha dhikkha sandīpanakilesanajīvanesu^eb^. Dhukkhati. Dhikkhati. Saddasatthavidū pana ‘‘dhukkhate dhikkhate’’ti ^b^attanobhāsaṃ^eb^ vadanti. Tathā ito parāni rūpānipi.

[03]^b^Rukkha vakkha varaṇe. Varaṇaṃ^eb^ saṃvaraṇaṃ. Rukkhati. Vakkhati. Rukkho, vakkho. Ettha ca ^b^vakkho^eb^ti rukkhoyeva. Tathā hi ‘‘sādūni ramaṇīyāni, santi vakkhā araññajā’’ti jātakapāṭho dissati. Imāni pana rukkhassa nāmāni –
[27]Ago nago kujo sākhī, sālo ca viṭapī taru;
[22]Dumo phalī tu phalavā, gaccho tu khuddapādapo’’ti.

[03]Kecettha vadeyyuṃ ‘‘nanu ca ^b^sāla^eb^saddena sālarukkhoyeva vutto, nāñño ‘sālā phandanamāluvā’ti payogadassanato, atha kimatthaṃ ^b^sāla^eb^saddena yo koci rukkho ^a^M0.0024^ea^ vutto’’ti? Na sālarukkhoyeva ^b^sāla^eb^saddena vutto, atha kho sālarukkhepi vanappatijeṭṭharukkhepi yasmiṃ kasmiñci rukkhepi ‘‘sālo’’ti vohārassa dassanato aññepi rukkhā vuttā. Tathā hi sālarukkhopi ‘‘sālo’’ti vuccati. Yathāha ‘‘seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahantaṃ sālavanaṃ, tañcassa elaṇḍehi sañchannaṃ. Antarena yamakasālāna’’nti. Vanappatijeṭṭharukkhopi. Yathāha –
[03]Yo koci rukkhopi. Yathāha ‘‘atha kho taṃ bhikkhave māluvabījaṃ aññatarasmiṃ sālamūle nipateyyā’’ti. Atridaṃ vuccati –

[03]^b^Sikkha vijjopādāne^eb^. Sikkhati. Sikkhā, sikkhanaṃ, sikkhitaṃ sippaṃ, sikkhako, sikkhito, sekkho, asekkho. ^b^Ka^eb^kāralope ‘‘sekho asekho’’ti rūpāni bhavanti. Tattha ^b^sikkhito^eb^ti sañjātasikkho, asikkhīti vā sikkhito, tathā hi kattuppayogo dissati ‘‘ahaṃ kho pana susikkhito anavayo sake ācariyake kumbhakārakamme’’ti.

[03]^b^Bhikkha yācane^eb^. Bhikkhati. Bhikkhu, bhikkhā, bhikkhanaṃ, bhikkhako, bhikkhitaṃ bhojanaṃ. Ettha pana ‘‘bhikkhu yati samaṇo muni pabbajito ^a^M0.0025^ea^ anagāro tapassī tapodhano’’ iccetāni pariyāyavacanāni. Etesu sāsane ‘‘bhikkhū’’ti upasampanno vuccati. Kadāci pana ‘‘bhikkhusataṃ bhojesi, bhikkhusahassaṃ bhojesī’’tiādīsu sāmaṇerepiupādāya ‘‘bhikkhū’’ti vohāro pavattati, tāpasāpi ca ^b^samaṇa^eb^saddādīhi vuccanti, ‘‘ahū atītamaddhāne, samaṇo khantidīpano’’tiādi ettha nidassanaṃ.

[03]^b^Dakkha vuddhiyaṃ sīghatte ca^eb^. Dakkhati, dakkhiṇā, dakkho. Dakkhanti vaddhanti sattā etāya yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti ^b^dakkhiṇā,^eb^ dātabbavatthu. Dakkhati kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṃ gacchatīti ^b^dakkho,^eb^ cheko, yo ‘‘kusalo’’tipi vuccati.

[03]^b^Dikkha muṇḍiopanayananiyamabbatādesesu. Dikkha^eb^dhātu muṇḍiye, upanayane, niyame, vate, ādese ca pavattati. Dikkhati. Dikkhito muṇḍo. Ettha siyā – nanu ca bho ^b^sarabhaṅgajātake^eb^ ‘‘gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā’’ti etasmiṃ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi ^b^‘‘ciradikkhitāna^eb^nti cirapabbajitāna’’nti vuttaṃ. Na hi tattha ‘‘ciramuṇḍāna’’nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sante kasmā idha ^b^‘‘dikkha^eb^dhātu muṇḍiye vuttā’’ti? Saccaṃ, tattha pana ^b^dikkhita^eb^saddassa pabbajite vattanato ‘‘cirapabbajitāna’’nti vuttaṃ, na dhātuatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ. Ida pana dhātuatthavibhāvanatthaṃ muṇḍiye vuttā. Tāpasā hi muṇḍiyatthavācakena ^b^dikkhita^eb^saddena vattuṃ yuttā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi ^b^cakkavattisuttatthavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā’’ti imissā pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇe ‘‘tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohārenti, tato paṭṭhāya parūḷhakese ^a^M0.0026^ea^ bandhitvā vivaranti, tena vuttaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā’’ti evaṃ attho saṃvaṇṇito.
[03]^b^Ikkha dassanaṅkesu^eb^. Ikkhati, upekkhati, apekkhati. Upekkhā, apekkhā, paccavekkhaṇā. ^b^Ka^eb^kāralope ‘‘upekhā, apekhā, upasampadāpekho’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.

[03]^b^Cikkha cakkha viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ^eb^. Cikkhati, ācikkhati, abbhācikkhati. Ācikkhako. Cakkhati, cakkhu. Ettha ^b^cakkhū^eb^ti cakkhatīti cakkhu, samavisamaṃ abhibyattaṃ vadantaṃ viya hotīti attho. Atha vā ‘‘sūpaṃ cakkhati, madhuṃ cakkhatī’’tiādīsu viya yasmā assādatthopi ^b^cakkhu^eb^saddo bhavati, tasmā ‘‘cakkhati viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotī’’ti assādatthopi gahetabbo. ‘‘Cakkhuṃ kho māgaṇḍiyaṃ rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammudita’’nti hi vuttaṃ. Satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārāmatādibhāve nirūḷhattā nayane eva ^b^cakkhu^eb^saddo pavattati ^b^paṅkajā^eb^disaddā viya padumādīsu.
[03]^b^Gu karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo^eb^ vaccakaraṇaṃ. Gavati. ^b^Ge sadde^eb^. Gāyati. Gītaṃ.

[03]^b^Vagga^eb^^a^M0.0027^ea^ gatiyaṃ. Vaggati. Vaggo, vaggitaṃ. Ettha samudāyavasena vagganaṃ pavattanaṃ ^b^vaggo. Vaggita^eb^nti gamanaṃ. Tathā hi ^b^nāgapetavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘yo so majjhe assatarīrathena catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena. Amhākaṃ putto ahu majjhimo so, amaccharī dānapatī virocatī’’ti imissā pāḷiyā atthaṃ vadantehi ^b^‘‘suvaggitenā^eb^ti sundaragamanenā’’ti. Kiñci bhiyyo kriyāpadampi ca diṭṭhaṃ ‘‘dhunanti vagganti pavattanti cambare’’ti.

[03]^b^Ragi lagi agi vagi magi igi rigi ligi tagi sagi gamane ca. Ca^eb^kāro gatipekkhako. Raṅgati. Raṅgo. Laṅgati. Laṅgo, laṅgī. Aṅgati, aṅgeti. Aṅgo, samaṅgī, samaṅgitā, aṅgaṃ, aṅgaṇaṃ. Vaṅgati. Vaṅgo. Maṅgati. Maṅgo, upaṅgo, maṅgalaṃ. Iṅgati. Iṅgitaṃ. Riṅgati. Riṅganaṃ. Liṅgati. Liṅganaṃ. Ulliṅgati, ulliṅganaṃ. Taṅgati. Taṅganaṃ. Saṅgati. Saṅganaṃ. Tattha ^b^aṅga^eb^nti yesaṃ kesañci vatthūnaṃ avayavo, sarīrampi kāraṇampi ca vuccati. ^b^Aṅgaṇa^eb^nti katthaci kilesā vuccanti ‘‘rāgo aṅgaṇa’’ntiādīsu. Rāgādayo hi aṅganti etehi taṃsamaṅgipuggalā nihīnabhāvaṃ gacchantīti ^b^‘‘aṅgaṇānī’’^eb^ti vuccanti. Katthaci malaṃ vā paṅko vā ‘‘tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī’’tiādīsu. Añjati makkhetīti hi aṅgaṇaṃ, malādi. Katthaci tathārūpo vivaṭappadeso ‘‘cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ, bodhiyaṅgaṇa’’ntiādīsu. Añjati tattha ṭhitaṃ atisundaratāya abhibyañjetīti hi aṅgaṇaṃ, vivaṭo bhūmippadeso. Iccevaṃ –
[03]^b^Laga saṅgeca. Ca^eb^ kāro anantaravuttāpekkhako. Lagati. Ca jato na hoti laganaṃ. Baḷise laggo.
[03]^b^Agga kuṭilagatiyaṃ^eb^. Aggatīti aggi, kuṭilaṃ gacchatīti attho.
[03]^b^Gu uggame. Uggamo^eb^ uggamanaṃ pākaṭatā. Gavati. Saddasatthavidū panimāsaṃ ‘‘gāte gavate’’ti ^b^attanobhāsattaṃ^eb^ vadanti.
[03]^b^Ghā gandhopādāne^eb^. Ghāti. Ghānaṃ. Gandhaṃ ghatvā. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘gandhaṃ ghatvā sati muṭṭhā’’ti. Etissā pana ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pattāya ‘‘ghāyati ghāyitvā’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
[03]^b^Jaggha hasane^eb^. Jagghati, sañjagghati. Sañjagghittho mayā saha. Jagghitumpi na sobhati. Jagghitvā.
[03]^b^Sighi āghāne. Āghānaṃ^eb^ ghānena gandhānubhavanaṃ. Siṅghati, upasiṅghati. Upasiṅghitvā. Ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ. Etā ^b^‘‘parassabhāsā’’^eb^ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
[03]^b^Raghi laghi gatyakkhepe. Gatyakkhepo^eb^ gatiyā akkhepo. Raṅghati, laṅghati, ullaṅghati. Laṅghitā, ullaṅghikāpīti, laṅghitvā.
[03]^b^Dāgha āyāse ca. Āyāso^eb^ kilamanaṃ. ^b^Ca^eb^kāro sāmatthiyāpekkhako. Dāghati. Nidāgho.
[03]^b^Silāgha katthane. Katthanaṃ^eb^ pasaṃsanaṃ. Silāghati. Silāghā. Buddhassa silāghate. Silāghitvā. ^b^‘‘Attanobhāsā’’^eb^ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
[03]^b^Suca soke^eb^. Socati. Soko, socanā, socaṃ, socanto, socantī, socantaṃ kulaṃ, socitvā.
[03]^b^Kuca sadde tāre. Tārasaddo^eb^ accuccasaddo. Kocati. Uccasaddaṃ karotīti attho.
[03]^b^Añcu gatipūjanāsu^eb^. Maggaṃ añcati. Buddhaṃ añcati. Uddhaṃ anuggantvā tiriyaṃ añcitoti tiracchāno. Kaṭukañcukatā.
[03]^b^Vañcu cañcu tañcu gatiyaṃ^eb^. Vañcati. Cañcati. Tañcati. Mañcati. Santi pādā avañcanā. ^b^Avañcanā^eb^ti vañcituṃ gantuṃ asamatthā.
[03]^b^Gucu gaṇecu theyyakaraṇe^eb^. Thenanaṃ theyyaṃ, corikā. Tassa kriyā ^b^theyyakaraṇaṃ^eb^. Gocati. Gaṇecati.

[03]^b^Vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ^eb^. Viyattassa esā viyatti, tissaṃ viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, viyattāyaṃ vācāyanti adhippāyo. Viyattassa hi vadato puggalassa vasena vācā viyattā nāma vuccati. Yathā pana kucchisaddatiracchānagatādisaddo ‘‘abyattasaddo’’ti vuccati, na evaṃ vacanasaṅkhāto saddo ‘‘abyattasaddo’’ti vuccati viññātatthattā. ‘‘Vatti, vacati, vacanti. Vacasi’’ iccādīni suddhakattupadāni. ‘‘Vāceti, vācenti’’ iccādīni hetukattupadāni. ‘‘Atthābhisamayā dhīro, paṇḍitoti pavuccati. Vuccanti. Santo sappurisā loke, devadhammāti vuccare’’ iccādīni kammapadāni. Garū pana ^b^va^eb^kārassa ^b^u^eb^kārādesavasena ^b^‘‘uttaṃ uccate uccante’’^eb^tiādīni icchanti, tāni sāsane appasiddhāni, sakkaṭabhāsānulomāni. Sāsanasmiñhi ^b^ra^eb^kārāgamavisaye ^b^ni^eb^pubbasseva vacassa ^b^va^eb^ssa ^b^u^eb^kārādeso siddho ^b^‘‘nirutti, niruttaṃ,^eb^ nerutta’’nti. Vacanaṃ, vācā, vaco, vacī, vuttaṃ, pavuttaṃ, vuccamānaṃ, adhivacanaṃ, vattabbaṃ, vacanīyaṃ, imāni nāmikapadāni. Vattuṃ, vattave, vatvā, vatvāna, imāni ^b^tu^eb^mantādīni ^b^‘‘parassabhāsā’’^eb^ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.

[03]Tattha ^b^vattī^eb^ti vadati. Ākhyātapadañhetaṃ. Atthasaṃvaṇṇakehipi ‘‘vatti etāyāti vācā’’ti nibbacanamudāhaṭaṃ. Saddasatthe ca tādisaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Ettha paneke vadanti ‘‘vacati, vacantītiādīni kriyāpadarūpāni buddhavacane aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu satthesu ca anāgatattā chaḍḍetabbānī’’ti. Tanna, yasmā sāsane ‘‘avaca, avaciṃsū’’ti suddhakattupadāni ca ‘‘vāceti, vācentī’’tiādīni hetukattupadāni ca dissanti, tasmā ^a^M0.0032^ea^ buddhavacanādīsu anāgatānipi ‘‘vacati, vacantī’’tiādīni rūpāni gahetabbāni. Vaceyya, vuccatu, vucceyya. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ sabbattha vitthārato gahetabbaṃ.
[03]Parokkhārūpāni vadāma – vaca, vacu. Vace, vacittha. Vacaṃ, vacimha. Vacittha, vacire. Vacittho, vacivho. Vaciṃ, vacimhe.
[03]Hiyyattanīrūpāni vadāma – avacā, avacū. Avaco, avacuttha. Avocaṃ, avacumha. Avacuttha, avacutthuṃ. Avacase, avacuvhaṃ. Avaciṃ, avacamhase.
[03]Ajjatanīrūpāni vadāma – avaci, avocuṃ, avaciṃsu. Avoco, avocuttha. Avociṃ, avocumha. Avocā, avocu. Avacase, avocivaṃ. Avocaṃ, avocimhe.
[03]Bhavissantīrūpāni vadāma – vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasi, vakkhatha. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma. Vakkhate, vakkhante. Vakkhase, vakkhavhe. Vakkhassaṃ vakkhamhe.

[03]Imesaṃ pana padānaṃ ‘‘kathessati, kathessantī’’tiādinā attho vattabbo. ^b^Vakkha rose^eb^ti dhātussa ca ‘‘vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasī’’tiādīni vatvā avasāne uttamapurisekavacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘vakkhemī’’ti vattabbaṃ. Attho panimesaṃ ‘‘rosati, rosantī’’tiādinā vattabbo. Ayaṃ ^b^vacavakkha^eb^dhātūnaṃ bhavissantīvattamānāvasena rūpasaṃsandanānayo. Aparānipi ^b^vaca^eb^dhātussa bhavissantī sahitāni rūpāni bhavanti – vakkhissati, vakkhissanti. Vakkhissasi, vakkhissatha. Vakkhissāmi, vakkhissāma. Vakkhissate, vakkhissante. Vakkhissase, vakkhissavhe. Vakkhissaṃ, vakkhissāmhe.

[03]Gadratapañhepi ^a^M0.0033^ea^ ‘‘rājā tumhehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā gahapati patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ ñatvā nisīdathāti vakkhissatī’’ti evamādiaṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati, tasmāyeva edisī padamālā racitā. ^b^Vakkha rose^eb^ti dhātussapi bhavissantīsahitāni rūpāni ‘‘vakkhissati, vakkhissantī’’tiādīni bhavanti. Attho panimesaṃ ‘‘rosissati, rosissantī’’tiādinā vattabbo. Ayaṃ ^b^vacavakkha^eb^dhātūnaṃ bhavissantīvaseneva rūpasaṃsandanānayo.
[03]Avacissā, vacissā, avacissaṃsu, vacissaṃsu. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Idha pana ^b^vutta^eb^saddassa atthuddhāraṃ vattabbampi avatvā upariyeva kathessāma ito ativiya vattabbaṭṭhānattā.
[03]^b^Cu cavane^eb^. Cavati. Kārite ‘‘cāvetī’’ti rūpaṃ. Devakāyā cuto. Cutaṃ padumaṃ. Cavituṃ, cavitvā.

[03]^b^Maca muci kakkane. Kakkanaṃ^eb^ sarīre ubbaṭṭanaṃ. Macati. Muñcati. ^b^Maci dhāraṇucchāyapūjanesu^eb^. Dhāraṇaṃ ucchāyo pūjananti tayo atthā. Tattha ^b^ucchāyo^eb^ malaharaṇaṃ. Mañcati. Mañco, mañcanaṃ. Mañcati puggalaṃ dhāretīti mañco.
[03]^b^Paca byattikaraṇe^eb^. Pacati. Pāko, paripāko, vipāko, pakkaṃ phalaṃ.

[03]^b^Ruca^eb^^a^M0.0034^ea^^b^dittiyaṃ rocane ca. Ditti^eb^ sobhā. ^b^Rocanaṃ^eb^ ruci. Rocati. Verocano. Samaṇassa rocate saccaṃ. Tassa te saggakāmassa, ekattamuparocitaṃ. Ayañca ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇe ruciatthaṃ gahetvā ‘‘ruccatī’’ti rūpaṃ janeti. Tena ‘‘gamanaṃ mayha ruccatī’’ti pāḷi dissati. ^b^Curādi^eb^gaṇe pana ruciatthaṃ gahetvā ‘‘roceti rocayatī’’ti rūpāni janeti. Tena ‘‘kiṃ nu jātiṃ na rocesī’’tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti. Tegaṇikoyaṃ dhātu.
[03]^b^Paca saṃpāke^eb^. Pacati, pacanti. Saddasatthavidū pana ^b^‘‘attanobhāsā’’^eb^ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Yāca yācanāyaṃ^eb^. Brāhmaṇo nāgaṃ maṇiṃ yācati. Nāgo maṇiṃ yācito brāhmaṇena. Te taṃ asse ayācisuṃ. So taṃ rathamayācatha. Devadattaṃ āyācati. Evaṃ suddhakattari rūpāni bhavanti. Brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇena nāgaṃ maṇiṃ yāceti, yācayati, yācāpeti, yācāpayati. Evaṃ hetukattari. Rājā brāhmaṇena dhanaṃ yāciyati, yācayiyati, yācāpiyati, yācāpayiyati. Evaṃ kammani. Yācaṃ, yācanto, yācantī, yācantaṃ kulaṃ. Yācamāno, yācamānā, yācamānaṃ kulaṃ. Yācako, yācanā, yācitabbaṃ, yācituṃ, yācitvāna, yācituna, yāciya, yāciyāna. Evaṃ nāmikapadāni ^b^tu^eb^mantādīni ca bhavanti.

[03]^b^Paca pāke^eb^. Odanaṃ pacati. ^b^‘‘Ubhayatobhāsā’’^eb^ti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Yathā pana sāsane ‘‘paṇḍitoti pavuccatī’’ti ^a^M0.0035^ea^^b^vaca^eb^dhātussa kammani rūpaṃ pasiddhaṃ, na tathā ^b^paca^eb^dhātussa. Evaṃ santepi garū ‘‘tayā paccate odano’’ti tassa kammani rūpaṃ vadanti. Sāsane pana avisesato ‘‘paccate’’ti vā ‘‘paccatī’’ti vā vuttassapi padassa akammakoyeva divādigaṇiko payogo icchitabbo ‘‘devadatto niraye paccati. Yāva pāpaṃ na paccatī’’tiādidassanato. Kecettha vadeyyuṃ ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīyantiādi viya ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇapakkhiko kammakattuppayogo esa, tasmā ‘sayamevā’ti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā ‘sayameva devadatto paccatī’tiādinā attho vattabbo’’ti tanna, ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’nti ettha hi pānīyaṃ manussā pivanti, na pānīyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivati. Manusseheva taṃ pīyate, na sayaṃ. Evaṃ parassa pānakriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtampi taṃ sukarapānakriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhantaṃ viya hotīti ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’nti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.

[03]‘‘Sayameva kaṭo kariyate’’ti etthāpi kaṭaṃ manussā karonti, na kaṭaṃ kaṭo karoti. Manusseheva kaṭo kariyate, na sayaṃ. Evaṃ parassa karaṇakriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtopi so sukaraṇa kriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhanto viya hotīti ‘‘sayameva kaṭo kariyate’’ti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.

[03]Ettha yathā ^b^sayaṃ^eb^saddo pānīyaṃ pānīyeneva pīyate, na amhehi. Kaṭo kaṭeneva kariyate, na amhehīti sakammakavisayattā payogānaṃ aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanasaṅkhātaṃ atthavisesaṃ vadati, na tathā ‘‘devadatto niraye paccati, kammaṃ paccatī’’tiādīsu tumhehi ajjhāharito ^b^sayaṃ^eb^saddo atthavisesaṃ vadati akammakavisayattā etesaṃ payogānaṃ. Evaṃ ^a^M0.0036^ea^ ‘‘devadatto’’tiādikassa paccattavacanassa akammakakattuvācakattā kammarahitasuddhakattuvācakattā ca ‘‘paccatī’’ti idaṃ ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇikarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Paca^eb^dhātu saddasatthe ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇa vutto natthīti ce? Natthi vā atthi vā, kimettha saddasatthaṃ karissati, pāḷi eva pamāṇaṃ, tasmā mayaṃ lokavohārakusalassa bhagavato pāḷinayaññeva gahetvā imaṃ ^b^paca^eb^dhātuṃ ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇepi pakkhipissāma. Tathā hi ^b^dhammapālācariya anuruddhācariyā^eb^dīhi abhisaṅkhatā ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇikappayogā dissanti –-

[07]Iccevamādayo. Ettha pana tesaṃ idameva pāḷiyā na sameti. Ye ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇamhi sakammakabhāvena ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe ca akammakabhāvena pavattassa ^b^bhū^eb^dhātusseva ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe pavattassa sakamakassapi sato ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇaṃ patvā akammakabhūtassa ^b^paca^eb^dhātussa sakammakattamicchanti. Etañhi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā, tasmā bhagavato pāvacane sotūnaṃ saṃsayasamugghāṭatthaṃ ettha imaṃ nītiṃ paṭṭhapema –

[03]Puriso odanaṃ pacati. Sa bhūtapacaniṃ paci. Odano paccati. Kammaṃ paccati. Vīhisīsaṃ paccati. Rukkhaphalāni paccanti. Nāgo pākāraṃ bhindati. Taḷākapāḷi bhijjati. Bhijjanadhammaṃ bhijjati. Ettha ca ^b^sayaṃ^eb^saddaṃ ajjhāharitvā ‘‘sayameva odano paccatī’’tiādinā vuttepi ‘‘puriso sayameva pāṇaṃ hanati. Bhagavā sayameva ^a^M0.0037^ea^ ñeyyadhammaṃ abujjhī’’ti payogesu parassa āṇattisambhūtahananakriyāpaṭisedhamiva paropadesasambhūtabujjhanakriyāpaṭisedhanamiva ca aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanavasena vuttattā yo ^b^sayaṃ^eb^saddavasena kammakattubhāvaparikappo, taṃ na pamāṇaṃ. ^b^Sayaṃ^eb^saddo hi suddhakattuatthepi dissati, na kevalaṃ ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’ntiādīsu kammattheyeva, tasmā sāsanānurūpena attho gahetabbo nayaññūhi.
[03]Puriso maggaṃ gacchati. Gambhīresupi atthesu ñāṇaṃ gacchati. Dhammaṃ carati. Tattha tattha carati.
[03]Pāsādaṃ passati, pāsādaṃ dakkhati pāsādo dissati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
[03]Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, idha nandati pecca nandati.
[03]Puriso gāmā niggacchati, dhanaṃ adhigacchati, puriso pāṇaṃ abhibhavati, himavatā pabhavanti mahānadiyo. Aññānipi payogāni yojetabbāni.

[03]Tattha yadi sāsane ^b^paca^eb^dhātussa kammani rūpaṃ siyā, ‘‘purisena kammaṃ kariyatī’’ti payogo viya ‘‘purisena odano paciyatī’’ti payogo icchitabbo. Ye pana garū ‘‘tayā paccate odano’’tiādīni icchanti, te saddasatthanayaṃ nissāya vadanti maññe. Evaṃ santepi upaparikkhitvā yuttāni ce, gahetabbāni. Kārite ‘‘puriso purisena purisaṃ vā odanaṃ pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati. Purisena puriso odanaṃ pāciyati, pācayiyati, pācāpiyati, pācāpayiyatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti. ‘‘Yathā daṇḍena gopālo, gāvaṃ pāceti gocara’’ntiādīsu aññopi attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Pacaṃ, pacanto, pacantī, pacamāno, pacamānā. Pātabbaṃ, pacitaṃ, pacitabbaṃ, pacanīyaṃ, pacituṃ, pacitvā. Ettha ca ‘‘imassa maṃsañca pātabba’’nti payogo udāharaṇaṃ. ‘‘Pacati, pacanti. Pacasī’’tiādi padakkamo subodho.
[22]Paraṃ na byākarissaṃ so, sāsane īrito na hi.
[03]^b^Chu^eb^^a^M0.0039^ea^^b^chedane^eb^. Choti. Chotvāna moḷiṃ varagandhavāsitaṃ. Acchocchuṃvata bho rukkhaṃ.
[03]^b^Milecha aviyattāyaṃ vācāyaṃ^eb^. Milecchati, milakkhu. Paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti milakkhūsu aviññātāresu.
[03]^b^Achi āyāme^eb^. Añcati. Dīghaṃ vā añchanto dīghaṃ añchāmīti pajānāti.
[03]^b^Muccha mohamucchāsu^eb^. Mucchati. Mucchito visavegena, visaññī samapajjatha. Mucchā, mucchitvā.
[03]^b^Uchi uñche. Uñcho^eb^ pariyesanaṃ. Uñchati. Uñchācariyāya īhatha.

[03]^b^Puccha pañhe^eb^ pucchati. Pucchitā, pucchako, puṭṭho, pucchito, pucchā. Bhikkhu vinayadharaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati. Pucchi, pucchituṃ. Pucchitvā. Ettha ca pañcavidhā pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti. Tāsaṃ nānattaṃ ^b^aṭṭhasālini^eb^yādito gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vutta^eb^saddo kesoharaṇepi dissati ‘‘kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro’’tiādīsu. Ettha ca ^b^sira^eb^saddena siroruhā vuttā yathā ^b^mañca^eb^saddena mañcaṭṭhā, ^b^cakkhu^eb^saddena ca cakkhunissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Ropitepi ‘‘yathā sāradikaṃ bījaṃ, khette vuttaṃ virūhatī’’tiādīsu. Kathitepi ‘‘vuttamidaṃ bhagavatā, vuttamarahatā’’tiādisu. Atridaṃ vuccati –

[03]Aparo nayo – ^b^vutta^eb^saddo ‘‘no ca kho paṭivutta’’ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati. ‘‘Pannalomo paradattavutto’’tiādīsu jīvitavuttiyaṃ. ‘‘Paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto’’tiādīsu apagame. ‘‘Gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samīhita’’ntiādīsu pāvacanavasena pavattite. Loke pana ‘‘vutto pārāyano’’tiādīsu ajjhene dissati, atridaṃ vuccati

[03]Aparopi nayo – ^b^vutta^eb^saddo saupasaggoca anupasaggo ca vapane vāpasamīkaraṇe kesohāre jīvitavuttiyaṃ pamuttabhāve ^a^M0.0041^ea^ pāvacanavasena pavattite ajjhene kathaneti evamādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa –

[07]Ādīsu vapane āgato. ‘‘No ca kho paṭivutta’’ntiādīsu aṭṭhadantakādīhi vāpasamīkaraṇe. ‘‘Kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro’’tiādīsu kesoharaṇe. ‘‘Pannalomo paradattavutto migabhūtena cetasā viharatī’’tiādīsu jīvitavuttiyaṃ. ‘‘Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāyā’’tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve. ‘‘Yesamidaṃ etarahi porāṇaṃ mantapadaṃ gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samīhita’’ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite. Loke pana ‘‘vutto gaṇo, vutto pārāyano’’tiādīsu ajjhene. ‘‘Vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatā, dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā’’tiādīsu kathane. Atridaṃ vuccati –

[03]^b^Jijaye^eb^. Jeti. Jayati, parājayati. Dhammaṃ caranto sāmikaṃ parājeti. Dhammaṃ caranto parajjati. Rājānaṃ jayāpesuṃ. Jayāpetvā. Ettha ^b^jayāpesu^eb^nti ‘‘jayatu bhava’’nti āsīsavacanaṃ vadiṃsūti attho. Jayanaṃ, jitaṃ, jayo, vijitaṃ, jino, jetā, jeto, jito māro, māraṃ jito, jitavā, jitāvī, vijitāvī, māraji, lokaji, odhijino, anodhijino, jito. Vijito, jetuṃ, vijetuṃ, jitvā, vijitvā. Imassa pana dhātussa ^b^kiyādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pattassa ‘‘jināti jinitvā’’tyādīni rūpāni bhavanti.

[03]^b^Ji abhibhavane^eb^. Jeti. Jino. Pubbe viya rūpāni. Ettha ca ‘‘tumhehi ānanda sappurisehi vijitaṃ, pacchimā janatāsālimaṃsodanaṃ atimaññissatī’’ti pāḷi abhibhavanatthasādhakā. Ettha hi ^b^vijita^eb^nti adhibhūtanti attho.
[03]^b^Ju gatiyaṃ^eb^. Ettha sīghagati adhippetā. Javati. Javanaṃ, javo, javaṃ, javanto, javanacittaṃ, javanapañño, javanahaṃso. Manojavaṃ gacchati yenakāmaṃ.
[03]^b^Jekhaye^eb^. Jīyati. ^b^E^eb^kārassa ^b^īyā^eb^deso. Sāsanānurūpena ‘‘kiṃ maṃ dhanena jīyethā’’ti hi pāḷi dissati. Saddasatthavidū pana ‘‘jāyatī’’ti rūpaṃ vadanti.
[03]^b^Vaja gatiyaṃ. Dhaja dhaji^eb^ ca. Vajati. Abbajati. Manussattañca abbaje. Vajo, vajanaṃ, pavajanaṃ, pabbajjā, pabbajito, pabbājito.
[03]Dhajati. Dhajo. Dhañjati. Dhañjanaṃ. Ettha ^b^dhajo^eb^ti ketu. ^b^Dhañjana^eb^nti gamanaṃ.

[03]^b^Aja khepane ca^eb^. Gatiapekkhakoyeva ^b^ca^eb^kāro. Ajati. Ajo. Ettha ^b^ajo^eb^ti eḷako. Imāni panassa pariyāyavacanāni ‘‘ajo eḷako urabbho avi meṇḍo’’ti. Tattha ^b^urabbho^eb^ti eḷako, yo ‘‘ajo’’tipi vuccati. ^b^Avī^eb^ti rattalomo eḷako. ^b^Meṇḍo^eb^ti kuṭilasiṅgo eḷako. Tathā hi ^b^janakajātake^eb^ ajarathato meṇḍarathā visuṃ vuttā. Apica ^b^ajeḷaka^eb^nti ajato eḷakassa visuṃ vacanato ^b^eḷaka^eb^saddena meṇḍopi gahetabbo, ^b^mahosadhajātakaṭṭhakathāya^eb^ñhi meṇḍeḷakānaṃ nibbisesatā vuttāti.
[03]^b^Ajja sajja ajjane. Ajjanaṃ^eb^ ajjanakriyā. Ajjati. Sajjati.
[03]^b^Khajja majjane ca. Majjanaṃ^eb^ suddhi. Byathanāpekkho ^b^ca^eb^kāro. Khajjati. Khajjūro.
[03]^b^Khaji gativekalle^eb^. Kissa bhante ayyo khañjatīti. Ubho khañjā. Khañjanaṃ, khañjituṃ, khañjitvā.
[03]^b^Khaja kampane^eb^. Khajati. Ejā. Ettha ca ^b^ejā^eb^ti lābhādiṃ paṭicca ejati kampatīti ejā, balavataṇhāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
[03]^b^Buja vajiranibbese^eb^. Vajiranigghoseti keci vidū vadanti. Bojati.
[03]^b^Laja lāja tajja bhassane^eb^. Lajati. Lājati. Tajjati.
[03]^b^Laji dittiyañca^eb^. Bhassanāpekkho ^b^ca^eb^kāro. Lañjati. Tatiyo nayalañjako. Lañjeti pakāseti suttatthanti lañjako.
[03]^b^Tuji balane ca. Balanaṃ^eb^ balanakriyā. Hiṃsāpekkhako ^b^ca^eb^kāro. Tuñjati.

[03]^b^Gaja kuji muji gajja saddatthā^eb^. Gajati. Kuñjati. Muñjati. Gajo gajjati, megho gajjati. Yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gajjati. Maṇi gajjati. Ñāṇagajjanaṃ gajjati. Gajjituṃ samattho. Gajjitā. Gajjitvā. Tattha ^b^gajo^eb^ti hatthī. Hatthissa hi anekāni nāmāni –
[21]Hatthī nāgo gajo dantī, kuñjaro vāraṇo karī;
[21]Thambho rammo dvipo ceva, hatthinī tu kareṇukā;
[03]^b^Caja cāge^eb^. Cajati. Pariccajati. Cāgo. Pariccāgo. Cajanaṃ. Cajaṃ, cajanto. Cajamāno.
[03]^b^Sanja saṅge. Saṅgo^eb^ laganaṃ. Sañcati. Satto. Sajanaṃ, satti. Āsatti. Sajituṃ. Sajitvā.
[03]^b^Bhaji bhajjane. Bhajjanaṃ^eb^ tāpakaraṇaṃ. Tilāni bhajjati. Purisena bhajjamānāni tilāni.

[03]^b^Tija nisāne, khamāyañca. Nisānaṃ^eb^ tikkhatākaraṇaṃ. ^b^Khamā^eb^ khanti. Tejati. Titikkhati. Tejano. Tejo. Tattha ^b^tejano^eb^ti kaṇḍo saro usu. ^b^Tejo^eb^ti sūriyo. Atha vā ^b^tejo^eb^ti tejanaṃ usmā uṇhattaṃ tāpo. ^b^Tejo^eb^ti vā ānubhāvo pabhāvo.
[03]^b^Rāja dittiyaṃ bhāja^eb^ ca. Rājati. Bhājati. Rājā. Rājinī. Vanarāji. Rājitvā. Virājitvā. Atra viññūnamatthavivaraṇe kosallajananatthaṃ silokaṃ racayāma –
[22]Ne’tassa iti vatvāna, dve janā kalahaṃ karuṃ.

[03]Ettha ca paṭhamapādassa dutiyapade ‘‘me ahi ^b^mahī’’^eb^ti chedo ‘‘puttā me atthi puttā matthī’’ti viya. ‘‘Mahi arāja mahārājā’’ti ca chedo ‘‘yopi ayaṃ yopāya’’nti viya. Ettha ^b^arāja^eb^saddo ‘‘atikaramakarācariyā’’ti ettha ^b^akarī^eb^ti atthavācako ^b^akara^eb^saddo viya ākhyātaparokkhāvibhattiko daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Arāja^eb^ virocīti attho. Ayaṃ pana gāthāya piṇḍattho ^b^‘‘mahārāja^eb^ me ahi arāja, mama eva ahi arāja, na etassa iti vatvā ^b^dve^eb^ ahituṇḍikajanā kalahaṃ kariṃsū’’ti.

[03]^b^Ranja rāge^eb^. Bhikkhu cīvaraṃ rajati. Satto rūpādīsu rañjati. Rajanaṃ. Rajako. Rāgo. Virāgo. Haliddirāgo. Rājā. Rājinī. Imassa ca ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pattassa ‘‘rajjati virajjatī’’ti rūpāni ^a^M0.0046^ea^ bhavanti. Tattha ^b^rajana^eb^nti rajanavatthu. ^b^Rajako^eb^ti rajakāro vatthadhovanako. ^b^Rāgo^eb^ti rajjanti sattā tena, sayaṃ vā rañjati, rañjanamattameva vā etanti rāgo, taṇhā. Imāni pana tadabhidhānāni –
[21]Rāgo lobho tasiṇā ca, taṇhā ejā visattikā;
[21]Kāmo nikāmanā icchā, nikanti ca niyanti ca;
[21]Anurodho ca sārāgo, saṅgo paṅko ca sibbinī;

[03]^b^Virāgo^eb^ti maggo nibbānañca. ^b^Rājā^eb^ti pathavissaro. Ettha dhātudvayavasena nibbacanāni niyyante. Nānāsampattīhi rājati dibbati virocatīti ^b^rājā^eb^. Dānañca piyavacanañca atthacariyā ca samānattatā cāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi attani mahājanaṃ rañjetītipi ^b^rājā. Rājinī^eb^ti rājabhariyā. Tesaṃ abhidhānāni vuccante sahābhidhānantarehi –
[03]^b^Bhaja sevāyaṃ^eb^. Bhajati. Bhajanā. Sambhajanā. Bhatti. Sambhatti. Bhattā.

[03]^b^Yaja devapūjasaṅgatakaraṇadānadhammesu. Devapūja^eb^ggahaṇena buddhādipūjā gahitā. ^b^Saṅgatakaraṇaṃ^eb^ samodhānakaraṇaṃ. Tathā hi ^b^adhimuttattheravatthumhi^eb^ ‘‘yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñci, bhavo vā yattha labbhatī’’ti gāthāyaṃ ^b^saṅgata^eb^saddena samodhānaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Dānaṃ^eb^ pariccāgo. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ jhānasīlādi. Etesvatthesu ^b^yaja^eb^dhātu vattati. Pupphehi buddhaṃ yajati. Devataṃ yajati. Devamanussehi bhagavā yajiyati. Ijjati. Yiṭṭhaṃ. Yañño. Yāgo. Dhammayāgo. Yajamāno sake pure. Yiṭṭhuṃ, yajituṃ. Puthuyaññaṃ yajitvāna. Soḷasaparikkhāraṃ mahāyaññaṃ kattukāmo.
[03]^b^Majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ^eb^. Majjati. Bāhiraṃ parimajjati. Bhūmiṃ sammajjati. Majjanaṃ. Sammajjanī.
[03]^b^Niñji suddhiyaṃ^eb^. Niñjati. Paniñjati. Niñjituṃ. Paniñjituṃ. Niñjitvā. Paniñjitvā. Ayaṃ pana pāḷi ‘‘tato tvaṃ moggallāna uṭṭhāyāsanā udakena akkhīni paniñjitvā disā anulokeyyāsī’’ti.
[03]^b^Bhaja pāke^eb^. Tilāni bhajjati. Bhajjamānā tilāni ca.
[03]^b^Ruja bhaṅge^eb^. Rujati. Rujā. Rogo. Ettha ^b^rujā^eb^ti byādhi rujanaṭṭhena. ^b^Rogo^eb^ti rujati bhañjati aṅgapaccaṅgānīti rogo, byādhiyeva, yo ‘‘ātaṅko’’tipi ‘‘ābādho’’tipi vuccati.

[03]^b^Bhuja koṭille. Āvi^eb^pubbo aññatthesu ca. Urago bhujati. Ābhujati. Bhikkhu pallaṅkaṃ ābhujati, ūrubaddhāsanaṃ bandhatīti attho. Mahāsamuddo ābhujati, āvaṭṭatīti attho. Keci pana ‘‘osakkatī’’ti atthaṃ vadanti. ‘‘Vaṇṇadāna’’nti ābhujati, manasi karotīti attho. Mūlāni vibhujatīti ^b^mūlavibhujo,^eb^ ratho. Ettha ca ^b^vibhujatī^eb^ti chindati. Bhogo. Bhogī. Ābhogo. Ābhujitvā. Ettha ca ^b^bhogo^eb^ti bhujayati kuṭilaṃ kariyatīti bhogo, ahisarīraṃ. ^b^Bhogī^eb^ti sappo.

[03]^b^Raji vijjhane^eb^. Nāgo dantehi bhūmiṃ rañjati. Ārañjati. Ettha ca ‘‘tathāgatarañjitaṃ itipī’’ti nettipāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tassattho ‘‘idaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ tathāgatagandhahatthino mahāvajirañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇadantehi rañjitaṃ ārañjitaṃ, tebhūmakadhammānaṃ ārañjanaṭṭhānantipi vuccatī’’ti. ^b^Rañjita^eb^nti hi rañjati vijjhati etthāti ruñjitaṃ, rañjanaṭṭhānaṃ. ‘‘Idaṃ nesaṃ padakkanta’’ntiādimhi viya etassa saddassa siddhi veditabbā adhikaraṇatthasambhavato.

[03]^b^Vijī bhayacalanesu. Ī^eb^kārantoyaṃ dhātu, tenassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na santi. Vejati. Vego. Dhammasaṃvego. Saṃvigo vegena palāyi. Nadīvego. Ūmivego ^a^M0.0049^ea^, vātavego. Ettha ^b^dhammasaṃvego^eb^ti sahottappaṃ ñāṇaṃ. ‘‘Vego, javo, rayo’’ti ime ekatthā. ^b^Divādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pana pattassa ‘‘vijjati saṃvijjati ubbijjatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti dvigaṇikattā.
[03]^b^Lajja lajjane^eb^. Lajjati. Lajjā. ^b^Lajjā^eb^ti hirī. Yā ‘‘viriḷanā’’tipi vuccati.

[03]^b^Kujja adhomukhīkaraṇe^eb^. Kujjati. Nikujjati. Ukkujjati. Paṭikujjati. Nikujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya. Aññissā pātiyā paṭikujjati. Avakujjo nipajjahaṃ. Tattha ^b^kujjati nikujjatī^eb^ti imāni ‘‘carati vicaratī’’ti padāni viya samānatthāni, adhomukhaṃ karotīti hi attho. ^b^Ukkujjatī^eb^ti uparimukhaṃ karoti. ^b^Paṭikujjatī^eb^ti mukhe mukhaṃ ṭhapeti.
[03]^b^Jhe cintāyaṃ^eb^. Jhāyati, nijjhāyati, upanijjhāyati, ujjhāyati, sajjhāyati. Jhānaṃ, nijjhānaṃ, upanijjhānaṃ, ujjhāyanaṃ, sajjhāyanaṃ. Nijjhatti. Upajjhā, upajjhāyo. Jhāyī, ajjhāyako.

[03]Tattha jhāyananti duvidhaṃ jhāyanaṃ sobhanamasobhanañca. Tesu sobhanaṃ ‘‘jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo. Jhāyāmi ^a^M0.0050^ea^ akutobhayo’’tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asobhanaṃ pana ‘‘tattha tattha jhāyanto nisīdi. Adhomukho pajjhāyanto nisīdī’’tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Jhāyī^eb^ti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena vā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena vā jhāyanasīlo cintanasīlo. Jhāyī jhānavāti attho. ^b^Ajjhāyako^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘na dānime jhāyanti, na dānime jhāyantīti kho vāseṭṭha ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakātveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta’’nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ, idāni pana taṃ ajjhāyatīti ^b^ajjhāyako,^eb^ mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharantīti. Ayaṃ panattho ^b^‘‘adhi^eb^pubbassa i ajjhayane’’ti dhātussa vasena gahetabbo. Evaṃ ^b^adhi^eb^pubbassa ^b^i^eb^dhātussa vasena imassa dhātussa atthaparivattanaṃ bhavati. Yaṃ sandhāya ‘‘ajjhāyako mantadharo’’ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Jhe dittiyaṃ^eb^. Dīpo jhāyati, dārūni jhāyanti. Ettha ^b^jhāyatī^eb^ti jalati. ^b^Jhāyanajalana^eb^saddā hi ekatthā.

[03]^b^Ñā avabodhane^eb^. ‘‘Ñāti, ñanti, ñāsi. Ñātu, ñantu. Ñeyya, ñeyyu’’ntiādīni yathāpāvacanaṃ gahetabbāni. Ñāti, ñātako, añño, ñattaṃ, ñatti, paññatti, viññatti, saññatti, saññā, saññāṇaṃ, paññā, paññāṇaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, viññāṇaṃ.

[03]Tattha ^a^M0.0051^ea^^b^ñātī^eb^ti jānāti. Puna ^b^ñātī^eb^ti bandhu. So hi ‘‘ayaṃ amhāka’’nti ñātabbaṭṭhena ñātīti. Evaṃ ñātako. ^b^Añño^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikādayo atthe na ñāti na jānātīti añño, avidvā bāloti attho. ^b^Ñatta^eb^nti jānanabhāvo. ‘‘Yāvadeva anatthāya, ñattaṃ bālassa jāyatī’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. ^b^Saññāṇa^eb^nti cihanaṃ. Kārite ‘‘ñāpeti saññāpeti viññāpayatī’’tiādīni bhavanti. Yasmā pana ‘‘aññāti paṭivijjhati. Attatthaṃ vā paratthaṃ vā ñassati. Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Ekacce nabbhaññaṃsu, ekacce abbhaññaṃsū’’ti pāḷiyo dissanti, tasmā ^b^ñātī^eb^tiādīni ākhyātikapadāni diṭṭhāniyeva honti nayavasena. Tathā hi ^b^aññātī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ā^eb^iti upasaggo, so parassakkharassa saññoguccāraṇicchāya rassaṃ katvā niddiṭṭho. ^b^Ñātī^eb^ti sāsane ākhyātikapadaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, tasmāyeva ‘‘ñāti, ñanti. Ñāsī’’tiādinā padamālākaraṇe nattheva doso.
[03]^b^Ñā māraṇatosananisānesu. Māraṇaṃ^eb^ jīvitindriyupacchedakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Tosanaṃ^eb^ tuṭṭhi. ^b^Nisānaṃ^eb^ tikkhatā. Ñatti. Manuññaṃ. Paññatti.

[03]Ettha ^b^ñattī^eb^ti māretīti vā tosetīti vā nisetīti vā attho. Ayañca ^b^ñatti^eb^saddo ‘‘vatti etāyāti vācā’’ti ettha ^b^vatti^eb^saddo viya ākhyātikapadanti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā ^b^ādatte^eb^ti ettha vibhattibhūtassa ^b^te^eb^saddassa viya vibhattibhūtassa ^b^ti^eb^saddassa saññogabhāvo ca dhātuantassarassa rassattañca. ^b^Manuñña^eb^nti manaṃ ābhuso ñeti tosetīti manuññaṃ. Ayamattho ^b^mana^eb^saddūpapadassa ^b^ā^eb^pubbassimassa ^b^ñā^eb^dhātussa vasena daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Paññattī^eb^ti nānappakārato pavattinivāraṇena akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ñatti ^a^M0.0052^ea^ māraṇaṃ paññatti. Atha vā dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ dhammadesanāya citte anekavidhena somanassuppādanaṃ. Atikhiṇabuddhīnaṃ anekavidhena ñāṇatikhiṇakaraṇañca paññatti nāma, tathā sotūnaṃ cittatosanena cittanisānena ca paññāpanaṃ paññattīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Saṭa rujāvisaraṇagatyāvasānesu. Rujā^eb^ pīḷā. ^b^Visaraṇaṃ^eb^ vippharaṇaṃ. ^b^Gatyāvasānaṃ^eb^ gatiyā avasānaṃ osānaṃ abhāvakaraṇaṃ, nisīdananti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṭati. Sāṭo vuccati sāṭako.
[03]^b^Khiṭa uttāsane^eb^. Kheṭati, ākheṭako, kheṭo, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito.
[03]^b^Jaṭa^eb^^a^M0.0053^ea^^b^ghaṭa saṅghāte^eb^. Jaṭati. Jaṭā, jaṭilo, jaṭī. Antojaṭā bahijaṭā, jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā. Kārite ‘‘so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ. Arahattamaggakkhaṇe vijaṭeti nāmā’’ti payogo.
[03]^b^Bhaṭa bhattiyaṃ^eb^. Bhaṭati. Bhaṭo. Vetanaṃ bhaṭako yathā.
[03]^b^Taṭa ussaye. Ussayo^eb^ āroho ubbedho. Taṭati. Taṭo, giritaṭo, nadītaṭo, taṭī, taṭaṃ.

[03]^b^Piṭa saddasaṅghāṭesu^eb^. Peṭati. Peṭako, piṭakaṃ. ^b^Piṭakasaddo^eb^ ‘‘mā piṭakasampadānenā’’tiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati. ‘‘Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭakaṃ ādāyā’’tiādīsu yasmiṃ kismiñci bhājane.
[03]^b^Haṭa dittiyaṃ^eb^. Haṭati. Hāṭakaṃ, haṭakaṃ. Yaṃ jātarūpaṃ ^b^haṭaka^eb^nti vuccati.

[03]^b^Aṭa paṭa iṭa kiṭa kaṭa gatiyaṃ^eb^. Aṭati. Paṭati. Eṭati. Keṭati. Kaṭati. Paṭo icceva nāmikapadaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Paṭati jiṇṇabhāvaṃ ^a^M0.0054^ea^ gacchatīti paṭo. ^b^Paṭo^eb^ti vatthaṃ. Vatthassa hi anekāni nāmāni –
[03]^b^Ruṭi luṭi theyye^eb^. Ruṇṭati. Luṇṭati. Ruṇṭako. Luṇṭako.
[03]^b^Ghaṭa cetāyaṃ^eb^. Ghaṭati. Ghaṭo. ^b^Ghaṭo^eb^ vuccati kumbho. Imāni tadabhidhānāni –
[21]Ghaṭo kumbho ghaṭī kumbhī, tuṇḍikiro tu ukkhalī;
[03]^b^Caṭa bhaṭa paribhāsane deṭa^eb^ ca. Caṭati. Bhaṭati. Deṭati.
[03]^b^Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭa chedane^eb^. Cuṭati. Chuṭati. Kuṭati.

[03]^b^Ṭhā^eb^^a^M0.0055^ea^^b^gatinivattiyaṃ. Gatinivatti^eb^ uppajjamānassa gamanassupacchedo. Ṭhāti, ṭhanti. Tiṭṭhati. Patiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭheti. Saṇṭhāti. Saṇṭhahati. Adhiṭṭhahati. Upaṭṭhahati. Ṭhātu. Tiṭṭhatu. Tiṭṭheyya. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhu. Aṭṭhā, aṭṭhū, aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṃsu. Yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati. Tiṭṭhissati. Upassuti tiṭṭhissatha. Aṭṭhissā, aṭṭhissaṃsu. Atiṭṭhissā, atiṭṭhissaṃsu. Ṭhātuṃ, upaṭṭhātuṃ. Upaṭṭhahituṃ. Adhiṭṭhātuṃ. Adhiṭṭhahituṃ. Ṭhatvā, adhiṭṭhitvā. Upaṭṭhahitvā, adhiṭṭhahitvā. Ṭhānaṃ, ṭhiti, saṇṭhiti, avaṭṭhiti. Saṇṭhānaṃ, paṭṭhānaṃ. Upaṭṭhāko, ṭhito. Pabbataṭṭho bhūmaṭṭho. Upaṭṭhahaṃ iccādīni.

[03]Tattha ^b^ṭhāna^eb^saddo issariyaṭhitikhaṇakāraṇesu dissati. ‘‘Kiṃ panāyasmā devānamindo kammaṃ katvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto’’tiādīsu hi issariye dissati. ‘‘Ṭhānakusalo hoti akkhaṇavedhī’’tiādīsu ṭhitiyaṃ. ‘‘Ṭhānasopetaṃ tathāgataṃ paṭibhātī’’tiādīsu khaṇe. ‘‘Ṭhānañca ṭhānaso ñatvā aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānaso’’tiādīsu kāraṇe. Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena, tasmā ^b^ṭhāna^eb^nti vuccati.

[03]^b^Paṭha^eb^^a^M0.0056^ea^^b^viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ^eb^. Dhammaṃ paṭhati. Pāṭho, nakkhattapāṭhako, so horapāṭhakaṃ pucchi. Sabbapāṭhī bhavissati. Paṭhituṃ, paṭhitave, paṭhitvā, paṭhitvāna, paṭhituna, paṭhiya, paṭhiyāna.

[03]Evaṃvidhaṃ ^b^tuṃ^eb^paccayantādivibhāgaṃ sabbattha yathārahaṃ vattukāmāpi gantha vitthārabhayena na vadāma. Avuttopi īdiso vibhāgo nayānusārena yathāsambhavaṃ sabbattha yojetabbo. Yattha pana pāḷinidassanādiviseso icchitabbo hoti, tatthevetaṃ dassessāma.

[03]^b^Vaṭha thūliye^eb^. Vaṭhati. Vaṭharo. ^b^Vaṭharo^eb^ti thūlaghanasarīrasmiṃ vattabbavacanaṃ. Tathā hi ^b^vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘vaṭharo^eb^ti thūlo, thūlo ca ghanasarīro cāyaṃ bhikkhūti vuttaṃ hotī’’ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Sāṭha balakkāre. Balakkāro^eb^ nāma attano balena yathājjhāsayaṃ dabbalassa abhibhavanaṃ. Sāṭhati. Sāṭho.
[03]^b^Uṭha ruṭha luṭha upaghāte^eb^. Oṭhati. Roṭhati. Loṭhati.
[03]^b^Saṭha ketave ca^eb^. Pubbatthesu cakāro. Saṭhati. Saṭho ^b^saṭho^eb^ti kerāṭiko vuccati.
[03]^b^Kuṭhi luṭhi ālassiye ca. Ca^eb^kāro pubbatthe ca. Kuṇṭhati. Kuṇṭho. Luṇṭhati. Luṇṭho.
[03]^b^Ruṭhi luṭhi aṭhi gatiyaṃ^eb^. Ruṇṭhati. Luṇṭhati. Aṇṭhati.
[03]^b^Eṭha heṭha vibādhāyaṃ^eb^. Eṭhati. Heṭhati. Viheṭhati. Viheṭhanaṃ.
[03]^b^Ḍi vihāyasagatiyaṃ gamanamatte ca^eb^. Ḍeti, ḍayati. Ḍemāno. Ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna. Ye maṃ pure paccuḍḍenti.
[22]Na tesaṃ dhammaṃ rocemi, na te dhammassa kovidā.
[03]Ettha ca ^b^pāsaṇḍā^eb^ti pāsaṃ ḍentīti pāsaṇḍā, sattānaṃ cittesu diṭṭhipāsaṃ khipantīti attho. Atha vā taṇhāpāsaṃ diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti uḍḍentīti pāsaṇḍā.

[03]^b^Paḍi gatiyaṃ^eb^. Paṇḍati. Paṇḍā, paṇḍito. Ettha ^b^paṇḍā^eb^ti paññā. Sā hi sukhumesupi atthesu paṇḍati gacchati dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādikampi ākāraṃ jānātīti ‘‘paṇḍā’’ti vuccati. ^b^Paṇḍito^eb^ti paṇḍāya ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito. Atha vā sañjātā paṇḍā etassāti ^b^paṇḍito^eb^. Paṇḍati ñāṇagatiyā gacchatītipi ^b^paṇḍito^eb^. Tathā hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0059^ea^ vuttaṃ ‘‘paṇḍantīti ^b^paṇḍitā^eb^. Sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikatthesu ñāṇagatiyā gacchantīti attho’’ti.
[03]^b^Vaḍḍha vaḍḍhane^eb^. Vaḍḍhati. Sirivaḍḍhako, dhanavaḍḍhako, vaḍḍhito, buḍḍho. Ettha ca ^b^va^eb^kārassa ^b^ba^eb^kāro, ^b^a^eb^kārassa ^b^cu^eb^kāro.
[03]^b^Kaḍḍha ākaḍḍhane^eb^. Kaḍḍhati, ākaḍḍhati, nikaḍḍhati. Akāmā parikaḍḍhanti, ulūkaññeva vāyasā.

[03]^b^Aṇa raṇa vaṇa bhaṇa maṇa kaṇa sadde^eb^. Aṇati. Aṇako brāhmaṇo. Raṇati. Raṇaṃ. Vaṇati. Vāṇako. Bhaṇati. Bhāṇako. Maṇati. Maṇiko. Kaṇati. Kāṇo. Tattha ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ti brahmaṃ aṇatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. Akkharacintakā pana ‘‘brahmuno apaccaṃ ^b^brāhmaṇo’’^eb^ti vadanti. Ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Raṇa^eb^saddo ‘‘saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammā’’tiādīsu kilesesu vattati. Kilesā hi raṇanti kandanti etehīti ^b^raṇā^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03]Ettha yuddhe vattati. ^b^Raṇaṃ katvā^eb^ti hi yuddhaṃ katvāti attho. ‘‘Tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca raṇaṃ karontā, dhāviṃsu te aṭṭhadisā samantato’’ti ettha cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe vattati. ^b^Raṇaṃ karontā^eb^ti hi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karontāti attho. Evaṃ atthavivaraṇampi saddasaṅkhātamatthaṃ antoyeva katvā adhippāyatthavasena kataṃ, na dhātunānatthavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā dhātūnamatthātisayayogopi bhavati, tena evaṃ atthavivaraṇaṃ katantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Bhaṇa bhaṇane^eb^. Parittaṃ bhaṇati, vacanaṃ bhaṇati. Dīghabhāṇako, piyabhāṇī, bhāṇavāro. Ettha bhāṇavāroti –
[03]^b^Ghiṇi ghuṇi ghaṇi gahaṇe^eb^. Ghiṇṇati. Ghuṇṇati. Ghaṇṇati.
[03]^b^Paṇa byavahāre, thutiyañca^eb^. Paṇati vāṇijo, vohāraṃ karoti iccattho. Saddho buddhaṃ paṇati, thomayati iccattho, āpaṇaṃ, sāpaṇo gāmo.
[03]^b^Pīṇa pīṇane. Pīṇanaṃ^eb^ paripuṇṇatā. Pīṇati. Pīṇo divā na bhuñjati, pīṇorakkhaṃsabāhu.
[03]^b^Saṇa abyattasadde^eb^. Saṇati. Saṇateva brahmāraññaṃ. ^b^Saṇatevā^eb^ti nadati viya.
[03]^b^Puṇa nipuṇe^eb^. Puṇati, nipuṇati. Nipuṇadhammo. Ettha ca ^b^nipuṇasaṇhasukhumasaddā^eb^ vevacanasaddā ^b^kusalachekadakkha^eb^saddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Phuṇa vikiraṇe vidhunane ca^eb^. Phuṇati. Aṅgārakāsuṃ apare phuṇanti.

[03]^b^Te pālane. Pālanaṃ^eb^ rakkhaṇaṃ. Tāyati. Tāṇaṃ, gottaṃ, nakkhattaṃ. Aghassa tātā. Kicchenādhigatā bhogā, te tāto vidhami dhamaṃ. Tattha ^b^gotta^eb^nti gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. ‘‘Gotamo kassapo’’ti hi ādinā pavattamānaṃ gaṃ vacanaṃ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, tathā abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. Ko pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasammuditaṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpaṃ.

[03]^b^Nakkhatta^eb^nti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṃ, taṃ pana assayujādivasena sattavīsatividhaṃ hoti. Tathā hi assayujo ^a^M0.0063^ea^ bharaṇī kattikā rohaṇī migasiro addā punabbasu phusso assaliso māgho pubbaphagguṇī uttaraphagguṇī hattho cittaṃ svāti visākhā anurādhā jeṭṭhā mūlaṃ pubbāsaḷhaṃ uttarāsaḷhaṃ sāvaṇaṃ dhanasiṭṭhā satabhisattaṃ pubbabhaddapadaṃ uttarabhaddapadaṃ revatī cāti ^b^sattavīsati nakkhattāni^eb^. Tāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ īsakampi na vijahanti kiñci sīghaṃ kiñci dandhaṃ, kadāci sīghaṃ, kadāci dandhaṃ, etto ito cāti evaṃ visamagatiyā agantvā yantacakke paṭipāṭiyā yojitāni viya samappamāṇagatiyā attano vīthiyāva gacchantāni maṇḍalākārena sineruṃ parivattanti. Evaṃ imāni nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyanti rakkhantīti nakkhattānīti vuccanti. Porāṇā pana ^b^khara^eb^dhātuvasena ‘‘nakkharanti na nassantīti ^b^nakkhattānī’’^eb^ti āvocuṃ, ‘‘nakkhattaṃ joti rikkhaṃ taṃ’’ iccetāni nakkhattatārakānaṃ nāmāni. ‘‘Uḷu tārā tārakā’’ti imāni pana sabbāsampi tārakānaṃ sādhāraṇanāmāni. ^b^Osadhī^eb^ti pana tārakāvisesassa nāmaṃ.

[03]^b^Citi saññāṇe^eb^. Saññāṇaṃ cihanaṃ lakkhaṇakaraṇaṃ. Cetati. Cihanaṃ karotīti attho. Īkārantavasena vuttattā asmā dhātuto ^b^saki saṅkāya^eb^nti dhātuto viya niggahītāgamo na hoti. Esa nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu.

[03]^b^Pata gatiyaṃ^eb^. Patati. Papatati papātaṃ, papateyyahaṃ. Pāpattaṃ nirayaṃ bhusaṃ. ^b^Ahaṃ^eb^saddena yojetabbaṃ, pāpattaṃ papatitosmīti attho. Pāpattha nirayaṃ bhusaṃ, sokumāroti yojetabbaṃ, pāpattha papatitoti attho. Parokkhāpadañhietaṃ dvayaṃ. ‘‘Pāvadaṃ pāvadā’’tiādīsu viya upasaggapadassa dīghabhāvo, tato ^b^aṃ^eb^saddassa ^b^ttaṃ^eb^ādeso, ^b^a^eb^saddassa ca ^b^tthā^eb^deso bhavati. Acinteyyo hi pāḷinayo.

[03]^b^Ata^eb^^a^M0.0064^ea^^b^sātaccagamane. Sātaccagamanaṃ^eb^ nirantaragamanaṃ. Atati. Yasmā pana ^b^ata^eb^dhātu sātaccagamanatthavācikā, tasmā bhavābhavaṃ dhāvanto jātijarābyādhimaraṇādibhedaṃ anekavihitaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ atati satataṃ gacchati pāpuṇāti adhigacchatīti attātipi nibbacanamicchitabbaṃ. Atthantaravasena pana ‘‘āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo’’ti ca ‘‘sukhadukkhaṃ adati anubhavatīti attā’’ti ca ‘‘attamanoti pītisomanassena gahitamano’’ti ca attho daṭṭhabbo, yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathā tathā atthassa gahetabbatoti.

[03]^b^Ati bandhane^eb^. Antati. Antaṃ. Antiyatibandhiyati antaguṇenāti ^b^antaṃ^eb^. Idha ^b^anta^eb^ saddassa atthuddhāro vuccate ‘‘antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariya’’nti ettha dvattiṃsākārantogadhaṃ kuṇapantaṃ antaṃ nāma. ‘‘Kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati. Haritantaṃ vā’’ti ettha antimamariyādanto anto nāma. ‘‘Antamidaṃ bhikkhave jīvikāna’’nti ettha lāmakanto. ‘‘Sakkāyo eko anto’’ti ettha koṭṭhāsanto. ‘‘Esevanto dukkhassa sappaccayasaṅkhayā’’ti ettha koṭanto. Iccevaṃ –

[03]^b^Kita nivāse rogāpanayane ca^eb^. Ketati. Sāketaṃ na garaṃ, niketo, niketaṃ pāvisi. Āmodamāno gacchati sanniketaṃ. Tikicchati, cikicchati, cikicchā, cikicchako. Tattha ^b^sāketa^eb^nti sāyaṃ gahitavasanaṭṭhānattā sāketaṃ, ^b^yaṃ^eb^saddalopo.

[03]^b^Yata patiyatane. Patiyatanaṃ^eb^ vāyāmakaraṇaṃ. Yatati. Yati, yatavā, payatanaṃ, āyatanaṃ, lokāyataṃ. Ettha ^b^āyatana^eb^nti āyatanato āyatanaṃ, cakkhurūpādīni. Etāni hi taṃdvārārammaṇacittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti etesūti ‘‘āyatanānī’’ti vuccanti. Ettha pana ^b^nītanu^eb^dhātūnaṃ vasenapi āyatanasaddattho vattabbo siyā, so uttari āvibhavissati.

[03]^b^Āyatana^eb^saddo nivāsaṭṭhāne ākare samosaraṇaṭṭhāne sañjātidese kāraṇe ca. Tathā hi ‘‘loke issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana’’ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhāne ^b^āyatana^eb^saddo vattati. ‘‘Suvaṇṇāyatanaṃ rajatāyatana’’ntiādīsu ākare. Sāsane pana ‘‘manorame āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā’’tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhāne. ‘‘Dakkhiṇāpatho gunnaṃ āyatana’’ntiādīsu sañjātidese. ‘‘Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane’’tiādīsu kāraṇe vattatīti ^a^M0.0066^ea^ veditabbo. So ca nānāpavattinimittavasena gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Lokāyataṃ^eb^ nāma ‘‘sabbaṃ ucchiṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ nucchiṭṭhaṃ. Seto kāko, kāḷo bako iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā’’ti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ, yaṃ loke ‘‘vitaṇḍasattha’’nti vuccati, yañca sandhāya bodhisatto asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito ‘‘na seve lokāyatikaṃ, netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhana’’nti āha. Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṃ, kintaṃ? Vitaṇḍasatthaṃ. Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakriyāya cittampi na uppādenti. Aññatthāpi hi evaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘lokāyatasippa^eb^nti ‘kāko seto, aṭṭhīnaṃ setattā, balākā rattā, lohitassa rattattā’ti evamādinayappavattaṃ paralokanibbānānaṃ paṭisedhakaṃ vitaṇḍasatthasippa’’nti.
[03]^b^Yuta juta bhāsane. Bhāsanaṃ^eb^ udīraṇaṃ. Yotati. Jotati.

[03]^b^Jutadittiyaṃ^eb^. Jotati, vijjotati. Juti, joti. Kārite ‘‘joteti, jotayitvāna saddhamma’’nti payogā. Ettha ca ^b^jutī^eb^ti āloko siri vā. ^b^Jotī^eb^ti patāpo. Atha vā ^b^jotī^eb^ti candādīni. Vuttampi ceta ^b^sirimāvimāna vatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘jotīti candimasūriyanakkhattatārakānaṃ sādhāraṇanāma’’nti. Atha vā ‘‘joti jotiparāyaṇo’’ti vacanato yo koci jotati khattiyakulādīsu jātattā ca rūpasobhāyuttattā ca, so ‘‘jotī’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Sita^eb^^a^M0.0067^ea^^b^vaṇṇo. Sita^eb^dhātu setavaṇṇe vattati. Kiñcāpettha vaṇṇasāmaññaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi idha nīlapītādīsu setavaṇṇoyeva gahetabbo payogadassanavasena. Setati. Setaṃ vatthaṃ. Vāccaliṅgattā pana ^b^seta^eb^saddo tiliṅgo gahetabbo.
[21]^b^Setaṃ sitaṃ suci sukkaṃ, paṇḍaraṃ dhavalampi ca;^eb^
[03]^b^Vatu vattane^eb^. Vattati, pavattati, saṃvattati, anuvattati, parivattati. Pavattaṃ.
[03]^b^Kilota addabhāve. Addabhāvo^eb^ tintabhāvo. Kilotati, pakilotati, temetīti attho. Kārite pakiloteti, pakilotayati. Uṇhodakasmiṃ pakilotayitvā, temetvāti attho.
[03]^b^Kati chedane^eb^. Maṃsaṃ kantati, vikantati, ayokanto. Sallakanto mahāvīro. Mā no ajja vikantiṃsu, rañño sūdā mahānase.
[03]^b^Catī hiṃsāgandhesu^eb^. Īkārantattā imasmā niggahītāgamo na hoti. Catati.

[03]^b^Thā^eb^^a^M0.0068^ea^^b^gatinivattiyaṃ^eb^. Thāti. Avatthā, vavatthānaṃ, vavatthitaṃ, vanatho. ‘‘Chetvā vanaṃ vanathañcā’’ti ettha hi mahantā rukkhā vanaṃ nāma, khuddakā pana tasmiṃ vane ṭhitattā vanatho nāma vuccanti.
[03]^b^Thu thutiyaṃ^eb^. Thavati, abhitthavati. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuti, abhitthuti.
[21]Yadi hi rūpinī siyā, paññā me vasumatī na sameyya;
[03]Tehi thutippasattho so, yenidaṃ thavitaṃ ñāṇaṃ, buddhaseṭṭho ca thomito. Tatra ^b^thavanā^eb^ti pasaṃsanā. Pasaṃsāya hi anekāni nāmāni.
[21]Thavanā ca pasaṃsā ca, silāghā vaṇṇanā thuti;

[03]^b^The saddasaṅghātesu^eb^. Thīyati, patitthīyati. Thī. Atrimā pāḷiyo – abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti. Thiyo naṃ paribhāsiṃsūti. Tatra ‘‘thīyati patitthīyatī’’timāni ^b^e^eb^kāra^b^ssīyā^eb^desavasena sambhūtāni. Thīyati saṅghātaṃ gacchati gabbho etissāti ^b^thī^eb^. Ācariyā pana ^b^itthī^eb^saddasseva evaṃ nibbacanaṃ vadanti, na ^b^thī^eb^saddassa.
[21]Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti ^b^thī^eb^ iti no ruci;
[22]Ayaṃ vinicchayo patto, nicchayaṃ bho suṇātha me.
[21]Itthī thī vanitā nārī, abalā bhīru sundarī;
[21]Gorī ca dārikā kaññā, kumārī ca kumārikā;

[03]Tathā hi aṭṭhavassikā ^b^gorī^eb^tipi ^b^dārikā^eb^tipi vuccati. Dasavassikā ^b^kaññā^eb^ti vuccati. Anibbiddhā vā yobbanitthī kaññāti vuccati. Dvādasavassikā ^b^kumārī^eb^tipi vuccati ^b^kumārikā^eb^tipi. Atho jaraṃ appattā ^b^yuvatī^eb^tipi ^b^taruṇī^eb^tipi ^b^māṇavikā^eb^tipi vuccati. Jaraṃ pattā pana ^b^therī^eb^tipi ^b^mahallikā^eb^tipi vuccati. Purisesupi ayaṃ nayo yathārahaṃ veditabbo.

[03]Kiñcāpettha evaṃ niyamo vutto, tathāpi katthaci aniyamavasenapi vohāro pavattati. Tathā hi ‘‘rājā kumāramādāya, rājaputtī ca dārika’’nti ca ‘‘acchā kaṇhājinaṃ kañña’’nti ca imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ vasena yā itthī ^b^dārikā^eb^saddena vattabbā, sā ^b^kaññā^eb^saddenapi vattabbā jātā. Yāpi ^a^M0.0070^ea^ ca ^b^kaññā^eb^saddena vattabbā, sāpi ^b^dārikā^eb^saddena vattabbā jātā. Tathā ‘‘rājā kumāramādāya, rājaputtī ca dārika’’nti ca ‘‘kumāriye upaseniye, niccaṃ nigaḷamaṇḍite’’ti ca imāsaṃ pana pāḷīnaṃ vasena yā itthī ^b^dārikā^eb^sadena vattabbā, sā ^b^kumārikā^eb^saddenapi vattabbā jātā. Yā ca pana ^b^kumārī^eb^saddena vattabbā, sāpi ^b^dārikā^eb^saddena vattabbā jātā. Apicettha ‘‘rājakaññā rucā nāmā’’ti ca ‘‘tato maddimpi nhāpesuṃ, sivikaññā samāgatā’’ti ca imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ dassanato yā anibbiddhā vā hotu nibbiddhā vā, yāva jaraṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva sā kaññāyeva nāmātipi veditabbaṃ.

[03]Kecettha vadeyyuṃ – yaṃ tumhehi ‘‘aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccatī’’ti vuttaṃ, etasmiṃ pana vacane ‘‘yadāhaṃ dārako homi, jātiyā aṭṭhavassiko’’ti vacanato aṭṭhavasso dārako hotu, ‘‘tatthaddasakumāraṃ so, ramamānaṃ sake pure’’ti pāḷiyaṃ pana puttadārehi saṃvaddho vessantaramahārājā kathaṃ ‘‘kumāro’’ti vattuṃ yujjissati dvādasavassātikkantattā? Yujjateva bhagavato icchāvasena. Bhagavā hi dhammissarattā vohārakusalatāya ca yaṃ yaṃ veneyyajanānurūpaṃ desanaṃ desetuṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ deseti eva, tasmā bhagavatā tassa mātāpitūnaṃ atthitaṃ sandhāya kumāraparihārena vaddhitattañca evaṃ desanā katā. Tathā hi āyasmā kumārakassapo kumāraparihārena vaddhitattā mahallakopi samāno kumārakassapotveva vohariyati. ‘‘Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī’’ti ettha pana sirasmiṃ palitesu jātesupi āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo tasmiṃ there adhimattavissāso ^a^M0.0071^ea^ hutvā komāravādena ovadanto ^b^kumārako^eb^ti avocāti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘sattā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassaṃ, tāva ^b^kumārakā, bālā^eb^ti ca vuccanti, tato paraṃ vīsativassāni ^b^yuvāno’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Mantha mattha viloḷane^eb^. Manthati. Manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya. Abhimatthati dummedhaṃ vajiraṃvamhamayaṃ maṇiṃ. Sineruṃ matthaṃ katvā.
[03]^b^Kuthi puthi luthi hiṃsāsaṃkilesesu^eb^. Kunthati. Kuntho, kunthakipillikaṃ. Disvāna patitaṃ sāmaṃ, puttakaṃ paṃsukunthitaṃ. Punthati. Lunthati.

[03]^b^Nātha yācanopatāpissariyāsīsāsu. Nātha^eb^dhātu yācane upatāpe issariye āsīsane cāti catūsvatthesu vattati. Tenāhu porāṇā ^b^‘‘nāthatī^eb^ti nātho, veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ āsīsati pattheti, parasantānagataṃ vā kilesabyasanaṃ upatāpeti, ‘‘sādhu bhikkhave bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkheyyā’tiādinā taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācatīti attho, paramena cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte vā guṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti paramissaro bhagavā ‘nātho’ti vuccatīti nāthatīti nātho’’ti. Saddasatthavidū pana tesu catūsu atthesu ^b^nātha nādha^eb^ iti dhātudvayaṃ paṭhanti. ^b^Attanobhāsattā^eb^ pana tassa ‘‘nāthate nādhate’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.

[03]Ettha siyā ‘‘yadi yācanatthena nāthatīti nātho, evaṃ sante yo koci yācako daliddo, so eva nātho ^a^M0.0072^ea^ siyā. Yo pana ayācako samiddho, so na nāthati na yācatīti anātho siyā’’ti? Na, ^b^nātha^eb^saddo hi yācanatthādīsu pavattamāno lokasaṅketavasena uttamapurisesu nirūḷho, bhagavā ca uttamesu sātisayaṃ uttamo, tena taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācatīti ^b^nātha^eb^saddassattho vutto. ^b^Anātha^eb^saddo pana ittarajanesu nirūḷho, so ca kho ‘‘na nāthoti anātho. Natthi nātho etassāti vā anātho’’ti dabbapaṭisedhavasena, na pana ‘‘na nāthati na yācatīti anātho’’ti dhātuatthapaṭisedhavasena. Yo hi aññassa saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā hoti, so nātho, yo ca aññassa saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā na hoti, nāpi attano añño saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā hoti, so anāthoti vuccati saṅketavasena. Tathā hi ‘‘saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ, lokasammutikāraṇa’’nti vuttaṃ. Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne ‘‘lokanātho tuvaṃ eko, saraṇaṃ sabbapāṇina’’nti ca ‘‘anāthānaṃ bhavaṃ nātho’’ti ca –

[03]Pāḷiyo nidassanāni bhavanti. Yasmā pana sāsane ca loke ca yācako ‘‘nātho’’ti na vuccati, ayācako ca ‘‘anātho’’ti. Lokassa pana saraṇaṃ ‘‘nātho’’ti vuccati. Yassa saraṇaṃ na vijjati, so ‘‘anātho’’ti vuccati, tathā samiddho ‘‘nātho’’ti vuccati, asamiddho ‘‘anātho’’ti. Tasmā paññavatā sabbesu ṭhānesu dhātuatthamattena lokasamaññaṃ anatidhāvitvā yathānurūpaṃ attho gahetabbo. Ayañca nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.
[03]^b^Satha seṭhille^eb^. Sathati. Sathalo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo ākirate rajaṃ. Siṭhilotipi pāḷi dissati. Tadā ^b^ṭhi^eb^kāro muddhajo gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Kattha silāghāyaṃ^eb^. Katthati, vikatthati. Katthanā, vikatthanā. Tattha ^b^katthatī^eb^ti pasaṃsati. ^b^Vikatthatī^eb^ti virūpaṃ katthati abhūtavatthudīpanato. Ettha ca ‘‘bahumpi so vikattheyya, aññaṃ janapadaṃ gato’’ti ca ‘‘idhekacco katthī hoti vikatthī, so katthati ‘ahamasmi sīlasampannoti vā vattasampannoti vā vikatthatī’ti’’ ca ādayo payogā.
[03]^b^Byatha dukkhabhayacalanesu^eb^. Byathati. Bhantā byathitamānasā. Tato kumārābyathitā, sutvā luddassa bhāsitaṃ. Itthetaṃ dvayaṃ calañceva byathañca.
[03]^b^Sutha kutha katha hiṃsāyaṃ^eb^. Sothati. Kothati. Kathati.

[03]^b^Patha gatiyaṃ^eb^. Pathati. Patho. ^b^Patho^eb^ti maggo. So duvidho mahājanena padasā paṭipajjitabbo pakatimaggo ca paṇḍitehinibbānatthikehi paṭipajjitabbo paṭipadāsaṅkhāto ariyamaggo cāti. Tattha pakatimaggo uppannakiccākiccehi janehi pathiyati gacchiyatīti patho, paṭipadā pana amatamahāpuraṃ gantukāmehi kulaputtehi saddhāpātheyyaṃ gahetvā pathiyati paṭipajjiyatīti patho. Atha vā pātheti kārakaṃ puggalaṃ gameti nibbānaṃ sampāpetīti vā patho ^a^M0.0074^ea^, paṭipadāyeva. Maggābhidhānaṃ ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇe ^b^magga^eb^dhātukathanaṭṭhāne kathessāma.
[03]^b^Potha pariyāyanabhāve.^eb^ Pothati. Pothako. Pothetīti ayaṃ ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇepi vattati. Tena ‘‘samantā anupariyeyyuṃ, nippothentā catuddisā’’ti payogo dissati.

[03]^b^Dā dāne. Ā^eb^pubbo gahaṇe. Saddho dānaṃ dadāti deti, sīlaṃ ādadāti ādeti. Imāni suddhakattupadāni taddīpakattā. Saddho assaddhaṃ dānaṃ dāpeti, sīlaṃ ādapeti, samādapeti. Ye dhammamevādapayanti santo. Imāni kāritapadāni hetukattupadānīti ca vuccanti taddīpakattā. Saddhena dānaṃ dīyati, sīlaṃ ādīyati, samādīyati, imāni kammapadāni taddīpakattā. Ayañca ^b^dā dāne^eb^ti dhātu sāsanānurūpasutivasena ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇaṃ patvā ^b^supana^eb^kriyaṃ vadanto ‘‘dāyati niddāyati niddā’’ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. ^b^Dānamavakhaṇḍanañca^eb^ vadanto ‘‘diyati dānaṃ dātta’’nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. ^b^Suddhiṃ^eb^vadanto ‘‘dāyati vedāyati vodāna’’nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati, imasmiṃ pana ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe ^b^dānaṃ^eb^ vadanto ^b^ā^eb^pubbavasena ^b^gahaṇañca^eb^^a^M0.0075^ea^ vadanto ‘‘dadāti deti ādadāti ādeti dānaṃ ādāna’’nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati. Tathā kucchitagamanaṃ vadanto ‘‘dāti suddāti suddo suddī’’ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayatīti ayaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā cettha, evamaññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ viseso upaparikkhitabbo nayaññūhi.

[03]Idānissa nāmapadāni ^b^tu^eb^mantādīni brūma. ‘‘Dānaṃ, deyyaṃ, dātabbaṃ, brahmadeyyaṃ, dinnaṃ, dāyako, dāyikā, dakkhiṇā’’ iccādīni, ‘‘dātuṃ, padātuṃ, dātave, padātave, datvā, datvāna, dadātuna, daditvā, daditvāna, dadiya, dajjā, dadiyāna, ādātuṃ, ādāya, ādiya’’ iccādīni ca yojetabbāni.

[03]Tattha ^b^dāna^eb^nti dātabbaṃ, dadanti etenāti atthe na deyyadhammo dānacetanā ca vuccati. Kasmā pana tattha ^b^dinna^eb^saddoyeva kathiyati, na ^b^datta^eb^saddoti? Akathane kāraṇamatthi. ‘‘Dānaṃ dinna’’ntiādīsu hi ^b^dinna^eb^saddaṭṭhāne ^b^datta^eb^saddo na dissati, tasmā na kathiyati.

[03]Tasmā ‘‘devadatto’’tiādīsu ‘‘devena dinno’’ti samāsaṃ katvā paṇṇattivacanattā ^b^dinna^eb^saddassa ^b^dattā^eb^deso kātabbo sāsanānurūpena. Upari hi ‘‘dinnassa datto kvaci paṇṇattiya’’nti lakkhaṇaṃ passissatha. Ayameva hi sāsane nīti avilaṅghanīyā. Idaṃ panettha vavatthānaṃ –
[21]Ediso pāḷiyaṃ natthi, nayo tasmā na so varo;

[07]Ettha ca ^b^brahmadatta^eb^nti idaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ, na pāḷito. Pāḷinayañhipatvā ‘‘brahmadattiya’’nti vā ‘‘brahmadinna’’nti vā ‘‘devadattiya’’nti vā ‘‘devadinna’’nti vā rūpena bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā hi ‘‘bodhisatto ca maddī ca sammodamānā sakkadattiye assame vasiṃsū’’ti pāḷinayānurūpo aṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati. Tasmā etthevaṃ vadāma –
[03]Ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Atra pana paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇavasena yathārahaṃ padakkamo bhavati.

[03]Dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma, dadāmase. Dadeyya, dade, dajjā. Dajjā sappuriso dānaṃ. Dadeyyuṃ, dajjuṃ. Pitā mātā ca te dajjuṃ. Dadeyyāsi, dajjāsi, dajjesi iccapi. Dajjāsi abhayaṃ mama. Mātaraṃ kena dosena, dajjāsi dakarakkhino. Sīlavantesu dajjesi, dānaṃ maddi yathārahaṃ. Dadeyyātha, dajjātha. Dadeyyāmi, dajjāmi, dadeyyāma, dajjāma. Dadetha, daderaṃ. Dadetho, dadeyyāvho, dajjāvho. Dadeyyaṃ, dajjaṃ. Neva dajjaṃ mahosadhaṃ. Dadeyyāmhe, dajjāmhe. Ayamasmākaṃ khanti. Garūnaṃ pana khanti aññathā bhavati. Tathā hi –

[03]Tattha ^a^M0.0078^ea^ asmākaṃ khantiyā ‘‘dajjā dajja’’ntiādīni ^b^yya^eb^kārasahiteyeva sattamiyā padarūpe sijjhanti. ‘‘Dajjā sappuriso dāna’’nti ettha hi ‘‘dajjā idaṃ ‘‘dadeyyā’’ti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā ^b^yya^eb^kāre pare saralopaṃ katvā tato tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ saṃyogañca tīsusaññogabyañjanesu dvinnaṃ sarūpānamekassa lopañca dyakārasaññogassa ca ^b^ja^eb^kāradvayaṃ katvā tato dīghavasenuccāritabbattā animittaṃ dīghabhāvaṃ katvā nipphajjati. Evaṃ sāsanassānurūpo vaṇṇasandhi bhavati. Duvidho hi sandhi padasandhi vaṇṇasandhīti. Tesu yattha padacchedo labbhati, so padasandhi. Yathā? Tatrāyaṃ. Yattha pana na labbhati, so vaṇṇasandhi. Yathā? Atrajo. Yathā ca sugato, yathā ca paddhāni. Evaṃ duvidhesu sandhīsu ‘‘dajjā’’ti ayaṃ vaṇṇasandhi eva.
[21]‘‘Ayaṃ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṃ parittakaṃ;

[07]Dassanato. Ettha hi ^b^dajjā^eb^ti datvāti attho. Idaṃ pana ^b^datvā^eb^saddena samānatthaṃ ‘‘dadiyya’’ iti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā ^b^yya^eb^kāre pare saralopaṃ katvā saññogesu sarūpalopañca tato dyakārasaññogassa ^b^jja^eb^kāradvayaṃ dīghattañca katvā nipphajjati.

[03]Athāparopi rūpanayo bhavati kammani ^b^ya^eb^paccayavasena. Tathā hi ‘‘petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā’’ti ca ‘‘dakkhiṇā dajjā’’ti ca dve pāṭhā dissanti.
