Tattha pacchimassa ^b^dajjā^eb^ti dātabbāti attho kammani ^b^ya^eb^paccayavasena. Idha pana ^b^dā^eb^dhātuto ^b^ya^eb^paccayaṃ katvā dhātussa dvittañca pubbassa rassattañca tato ^b^ya^eb^kāre pare ^a^M0.0079^ea^ saralopaṃ saññogabhāvañca ^b^jja^eb^kāradvayañca itthiliṅgattā ^b^ā^eb^paccayādiñca katvā ‘‘dajjā’’ti nipphajjati. Evaṃ ‘‘dajjā dadeyyā’’ti ca ‘‘dajjā dadiyya datvā’’ti ca ‘‘dajjā dātabbā’’ti ca etāni paccekaṃ pariyāyavacanāni bhavanti. ‘‘Dajjuṃ. Dajjāsi, dajjātha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma. Dajjāvho, dajja’’nti etānipi ‘‘dadeyyuṃ dadeyyāsī’’tiādinā padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā ^b^yya^eb^kāre pare saralopaṃ saññogesu sarūpalopaṃ ^b^dya^eb^kārasamaññogassa ^b^jja^eb^kāradvayañca katvā nipphajjanti. Etesu ^b^dajjāsī^eb^ti yaṃ rūpaṃ tassāvayavassa ^b^ā^eb^kārassa ^b^e^eb^kāraṃ katvā aparampi ‘‘dajjesī’’ti rūpaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo aññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.

[03]Acinteyyānubhāvassa hi sammāsambuddhassa pāḷinayo acinteyyoyeva hoti, gambhīro dukkhogāḷho, na yena kenaci lakkhaṇena sādhetabbo, yathātanti viraciteheva lakkhaṇehi sādhetabbo. Tathā hi ‘‘khattiyā titthiyā cetiyānī’’tiādīsu ^b^ya^eb^kāre pare saralopo bhavati, tena ‘‘athetthekasataṃ khatyā. Evampi titthyā puthuso vadanti. Ārāmarukkhacetyānī’’ti payogā dissanti. Tathā ‘‘sākacchati taccha’’nti etthāpi ‘‘saha kathayatī’’tivā ‘‘saṃkathayatī’’ti vā ‘‘tathya’’nti ca padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā ^b^saha^eb^saddassa ^b^ha^eb^kāralopaṃ, ^b^saṃ^eb^sadde ca niggahītalopaṃ katvā ^b^sa^eb^kāragatassa sarassa dīghaṃ katvā ^b^ya^eb^kāre pare saralopaṃ katvā tato ^b^thya^eb^kārasaññogassa ^b^ccha^eb^yugaṃ katvā visabhāgasaññoge eko ekassa sabhāgattamāpajjati. Tena ‘‘sākacchati taccha’’nti rūpāni sijjhanti. Tathā hi ‘‘aññamaññaṃ sākacchiṃsu. Kālena dhammasākacchā. Bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ. Yathātathiyaṃ viditvāpi dhammaṃ, sammā so loke paribbajeyyā’’ti ^a^M0.0080^ea^ savikapāni payogāni dissanti. ‘‘Najjā’’tiādīsupi ‘‘nadiyā’’tiādīni padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā vaṇṇasandhivasena ^b^ya^eb^kāre pare lopavidhi labbhatiyeva. Vividho hi sāsanānukūlo rūpanipphādanupāyo, upari ca etesaṃ sādhanatthaṃ ‘‘saralopo yamanarādīsū’’tiādīni lakkhaṇāni bhavissanti. Tattha –

[03]Atridaṃ vattabbaṃ, kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathācariyehi ‘‘mātaraṃ tena dosena, dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino’’ti ettha ^b^dajja^eb^nti padassa ‘‘dammī’’ti vattamānāvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tathāpi sattamīpayogoyeva. Ācariyā hi ‘‘sattamīpayogo aya’’nti jānantāpi ‘‘kadāci aññe parikappatthampi gaṇheyyu’’nti āsaṅkāya evaṃ vivaraṇamakaṃsu. Tathā kiñcāpi tehi ‘‘anāparādhakammantaṃ, na dajjaṃ dakarakkhino’’ti ettha ^b^na dajja^eb^nti padassa ‘‘nāhaṃ dakarakkhassa dassāmī’’ti bhavissantīvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tathāpi sattamīpayogoyeva, anāgataṃ pana paṭicca vattabbatthattā evaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ. ‘‘Neva dajjaṃ mahosadha’’nti ettha pana ‘‘na tveva dadeyya’’nti sattamīpayogavaseneva vivaraṇaṃ katanti. Evaṃ dajjaṃpadassa vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03]Idāni parokkhādivasena padakkamo kathiyati. ‘‘Dada, dadū. Dadū’’ti ca idaṃ ‘‘nārado iti nāmena, kassapo iti maṃ vidū’’tiādīsu ^b^vidū^eb^saddena samaṃ. Dade, dadittha, dadaṃ, dadimha. Dadittha, dadire. Dadittho, dadivho.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^dadittho^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘sañjagghittho mayā saha. Mā kisittho mayā vinā. Mā naṃ kalale akkamittho’’tiādīsu ‘‘sañjagghittho’’tiādīhi ^a^M0.0081^ea^ samaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbattha labbhamānavasena sadisatā upaparikkhitabbā. Dadaṃ, dadimhe. Parokkhāsahibharūpāni.

[03]Adadā, adadū. Adade, adadattha. Adadaṃ, adadamha. Adadattha, adadatthuṃ. Adadase, adadavhaṃ. Adadiṃ adadamhase. Iti anakārapubbampi rūpaṃ gahetabbaṃ ‘‘yesaṃ no na dadamhase’’ti dassanato. Hiyyattanīsahitarūpāni.
[03]Adadi, adaduṃ, adadiṃsu. Adado, adadittha. Adadiṃ, adadimhā. Adadā, adadū. Adadase, adadivhaṃ. Adadaṃ, adadimhe. Ajjatanīsahitarūpāni.
[03]‘‘Adadisā, dadissā, adadissaṃsu, dadissaṃsu’’ iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Kālātipattisahitarūpāni.

[03]Aparānipi vattamānādisahitarūpāni bhavanti. Deti, denti. Desi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma. Attanopadāni appasiddhāni. Sattamīnayo ca parokkhānayo ca appasiddho. Hiyuttanīnayo pana ajjatanīnayo ca koci koci pasiddho pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā, sakkā ca ‘‘adā, adū, ado, ada’’ntiādinā yojetuṃ. Tathā hi nayo dissati. Adā dānaṃ purindado. Varañceme ado sakka. Brāhmaṇānaṃ adaṃ gajaṃ. Adāsime. Adaṃsu te mamokāsaṃ. Adāsiṃ brāhmaṇe tadāti. ‘‘Dassati, dassanti’’ iccādi sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. ‘‘Adassā, dassā, adassaṃsu, dassaṃsu, dassiṃsu’’ iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ.

[03]Tathā ^a^M0.0082^ea^ ādadāti, ādadanti. Ādadāsi, ādadātha. Ādadāmi, ādadāma. ^b^Kaccāyanamate^eb^ ‘‘ādatte’’ti attanopadaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ ‘‘ādadātu, ādadeyya’’ iccādi sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Ādetu ādeyya iccādi yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Evameva ca ‘‘dāpeti, ādāpetī’’tiādīnipi yathārahaṃ yojetabbāni.

[03]^b^Dākucchite gamane^eb^. Dāti. Suddāti. Suddo, suddī. Tattha ^b^suddo^eb^ti suddātīti suddo, parapothanādiluddācārakammunā dārukammādikhuddācārakammunā ca lahuṃ lahuṃ kucchitaṃ gacchatīti attho. Tathā hi ^b^su^eb^ iti sīghatthe nipāto, ^b^dā^eb^ iti garahattho dhātu kucchitagativācakattā. Suddassa bhariyā ^b^suddī^eb^.
[03]^b^Du gatiyaṃ^eb^. Davati. Dumo. Ettha ca davati gacchati mūlakkhandhasākhāviṭapapattapallavapupphaphalehi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātīti ^b^dumo^eb^.
[03]^b^Desodhane. Sodhanaṃ^eb^ pariyodāpanaṃ. Dāyati. Dāyanaṃ. Yathā gāyati, gāyanaṃ. Dāyituṃ, dāyitvā, dhātāvayava^b^sse^eb^kārassa ^b^āyā^eb^deso. ‘‘Dātuṃ, datvā’’ iccapi rūpāni.

[03]Tatra ^b^dātu^eb^nti sodhetuṃ. ^b^Datvā^eb^ti sodhetvāti attho gahetabbo. Tathā hi ‘‘bālo abyatto nappaṭibalo anuyuñjiyamāno anuyogaṃ dātu’’nti ettha ^b^dātu^eb^nti padassa sodhetunti attho. Keci ‘‘dānattha’’nti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi yo parehi anuyuñjiyati, so anuyogaṃ deti nāmāti. Tasmā ‘‘ācariyassa anuyogaṃ datvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgacchī’’tiādīsupi ^b^anuyogaṃ datvā^eb^ti anuyogaṃ sodhetvāti atthoyeva gahetabbo. Tathā ^a^M0.0083^ea^ hi pubbācariyehi ‘‘anuyogadāpanattha’’nti etasmiṃ padese esoyevattho vibhāvito. Kathaṃ? ^b^Anuyogadāpanattha^eb^nti anuyogaṃ sodhāpetuṃ. Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato anuyogaṃ sodheti nāma, anuyuñjanto ca naṃ sodhāpeti nāmāti. Idampi ca tehi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dātu^eb^nti sodhetuṃ. Keci ‘‘dānattha’’nti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi yo sīhanādaṃ nadati, so eva tattha anuyogaṃ detīti. Samantapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇa saṃvaṇṇanāyampi pubbācariyehi ^b^‘‘dānaṃ datvā^eb^ti taṃ cetanaṃ pariyodāpetvā’’ti sodhanattho vutto. Dullabhā ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ citte ṭhapetabbā.

[03]^b^De pālane^eb^. Dīyati. Dānaṃ, uddānaṃ dāyituṃ, dāyitvā. Tattha ^b^dāna^eb^nti duggatito dāyati rakkhatīti dānaṃ, dānacetanā. ^b^Uddāna^eb^nti vuttassa atthassa vakkhamānassa vā vippakiṇṇabhāvena nassituṃ adatvā uddhaṃ dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ uddānaṃ, saṅgahavacananti attho. Atha vā ^b^uddāna^eb^nti pacchuddānādikaṃ uddānaṃ.
[03]^b^Khāda bhakkhane^eb^. Khādati. Khādikā, khādanaṃ, aññamaññakhādikā. Pubbaphalakhādikā, khajjaṃ, khādanīyaṃ, khandhā.

[03]Tattha ^b^khajja^eb^nti pūvo. ^b^Khādanīya^eb^nti pūvaphalāphalādi. ‘‘Khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā’’ti visuṃ bhojanīyassa vacanato khādanaṃ nāma khajjassa vā khādanīyassa vā bhakkhanaṃ. Apica hiṃsāpi ‘‘khādana’’nti vuccati. Jātijarābyādhidukkhādīhi khajjantīti ^b^khandhā,^eb^ rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇāni. ‘‘Cīvarāni nassantipi ḍayhantipi undūrehipi khajjantī’’ti ettha viya ^b^khajja^eb^nti saddo kammattho.
[03]^b^Bada^eb^^a^M0.0084^ea^^b^theriye^eb^. Thirabhāvo ^b^theriyaṃ,^eb^ yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Badati. Badarī, badaraṃ. Atridaṃ vuccati –
[03]^b^Gada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ^eb^. Gadati. Āgadanaṃ, tatho āgado etassāti tathāgato. Suṭṭhu gadatīti sugado.
[03]^b^Rada vilekhane^eb^. Radati. Radano, rado, dāṭhārado. Atra ^b^radano^eb^ti danto.
[03]^b^Nada abyattasadde^eb^. Sīho nadati, paṇadati. Nādo, nadī. Pabbatesu vanādīsu nadatīti ^b^nadī. Nada i^eb^ iti dhātudvayavasena pana ‘‘nadantī gacchatīti ^b^nadī’’^eb^tipi nibbacanaṃ vadanti.

[03]Kecettha vadeyyuṃ yā panesā ‘‘nada abyattasadde’ti dhātu tumhehi vuttā, sā kiṃniccamabyattasaddeyeva vattati, udāhu katthaci viyattiyampi vācāyaṃ vattatī’’ti? Niccamabyattasaddeyeva vattatīti. Yajjevaṃ ‘‘sīho nadatī’’tiādīsu tiracchānagatādisaddabhāvena avibhāvitatthatāya ^b^nada^eb^saddo abyattasaddo hotu, ‘‘sīho viya ayaṃ puriso nadatī’’tiādīsu pana manussabhāsāpi abyattasaddo siyāti? Tanna viyattāpi samānā manussabhāsā sīho viyāti evaṃ samupekkhāvasena ^b^sīha^eb^padatthassāpekkhanato ^b^nada^eb^saddena niddisiyati ^a^M0.0085^ea^, na purisāpekkhanavasena. Yathā hi valāhakūpamāvasena kathitaṃ, ‘‘kathañca puggalo gajjitā ca vassitā ca hotī’’ti pāḷiyaṃ gajjanaṃ vassanañca puggale alabbhamānampi valāhakassa gajjanavassanasadisatāya bhāsanakaraṇakriyāyūpalabbhanato vattabbameva hoti, evameva nibbhayabhāvena sīhanādasadisiyā vācāya niccharaṇato sīho viya nadatīti avibhāvitatthavantena ^b^nada^eb^saddena manussabhāsāpi niddisitabbā hoti.

[03]Ettha ca ambaphalūpamādayopi āharitvā dassetabbā. Na hi pakkāmakatādīni puggalesu vijjanti, atha kho ambaphalādīsu eva vijjanti, evaṃ santepi bhagavatā aññenākārena sadisattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ambaphalūpamādayo vuttā, evameva ^b^nada^eb^saddo abyattasaddabhāvena tiracchānagatasaddādīsu eva vattabbopi atthantaravibhāvanatthaṃ ‘‘sīho viya nadatī’’tiādīsu manussabhāsāyampi rūḷhiyā vutto, na sabhāvato. Tathā hi sabhāvato ^b^nada^eb^saddenapi ^b^vassita^eb^saddādīhipi manussabhāsā niddisitabbā na hotīti. Yadi evaṃ –

[03]Ettha kasmā ^b^vassita^eb^saddena manussabhāsā niddisiyatīti? Saccaṃ manussabhāsāpi ^b^vassita^eb^saddena niddiṭṭhā dissati, evaṃ santepi sā ‘‘suvijānaṃ siṅgālānaṃ, sakuṇānañca vassita’’nti ^b^vassita^eb^saddavasena payogassa vacanato tadanurūpaṃ niddisituṃ arahatīti mantvā ^b^vassita^eb^saddasadisī niddiṭṭhā. Na hi ‘‘manusso vassatī’’tiādinā visuṃ payogā dissanti, ‘‘sakuṇo vassati, kūjatī’’tiādinā pana payogā dissanti, tasmā ‘‘saṅgāmaṃ otaritvāna, sīhanādaṃ nadi kuso’’tiādīsu viya yathārahaṃ ^a^M0.0086^ea^ attho gahetabbo. Evaṃ ^b^nada^eb^dhātu sabhāvato abyattasaddeyeva hoti, na viyattiyaṃ vācāyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Khadda daṃsane. Daṃsana^eb^miha dantasukatakattikā kriyā abhidhīyate. Sabhāvattā dhātuyā sādhanappayogasamavāyī. Khaddati.

[03]^b^Adi bandhane^eb^. Andati. Andu. ^b^Andu^eb^saddopanettha itthiliṅgo gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgappayogadassanato ‘‘seyyathāpi vāseṭṭha ayaṃ aciravatī nadī pūrā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā, atha puriso āgaccheyya pāratthiko pāragavesī pāragāmī pāraṃ taritukāmo, so orimatīre daḷhāya anduyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanabandho’’ti. Tatra ^b^andū^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci bandhanaṃ vā. ‘‘Yathā andughare puriso’’ti hi vuttaṃ. Bandhanaviseso vā, ‘‘andubandhanādīni chinditvā palāyiṃsū’’ti hi vuttaṃ. Apica andanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena andu viyātipi ^b^andu,^eb^ pañca kāmaguṇā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ‘‘ime kho vāseṭṭha pañca kāmaguṇā ariyassa vinaye andūtipi bandhanantipi vuccantī’’ti. Niggahītāgamavasenāyaṃ dhātu vuttā. Katthaci pana vigataniggahītāgamopi hoti, taṃ yathā? ‘‘Avijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā anvadeva ahirika’’nti pāḷi. Ettha anuandati anubandhatīti anvadi. Anvadi eva ^b^anvadevā^eb^ti kitaviggaho sandhiviggaho ca ^a^M0.0087^ea^ veditabbo. Tathā hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘anvadevā^eb^ti anubandhamānamevā’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ avijjamahirikaṃ anubandhamānameva hotīti attho.
[03]Ettha ^b^indo^eb^ti adhipatibhūto yo koci. So hi indati paresu issariyaṃ pāpuṇātīti ^b^indo^eb^ti vuccati. Apica ^b^indo^eb^ti sakko. Sakkassa hi anekāni nāmāni –
[03]Evaṃ anekāni nāmāni. Ekopi hi attho anekasaddappavattinimittatāya anekanāmo. Tenāha bhagavā –

[08]Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno magho nāma māṇavo ahosi, tasmā ‘‘maghavā’’ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno pure dānaṃ adāsi, tasmā ‘‘purindado’’ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ adāsi, tasmā ‘‘sakko’’ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno āvāsaṃ adāsi, tasmā ‘‘vāsavo’’ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo sahassaṃ atthānaṃ muhuttena ^a^M0.0088^ea^ cinteti, tasmā ‘‘sahassakkho’’ti vuccati. Sakkassa mahāli devānamindassa sujā nāma asurakaññā pajāpati, tasmā ‘‘sujampatī’’ti vuccati. Sakko mahāli devānamindo devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreti, tasmā ‘‘devānamindo’’ti vuccatīti.

[03]Tathā hi yena pavattinimittena tāvatiṃsādhipatimhi ^b^inda^eb^saddo pavatto, na tena tattha ^b^sakkādi^eb^saddā pavattā, atha kho aññena. Tathā yena sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ ^b^paññā^eb^saddo pavatto, na tena tattha ^b^vijjādi^eb^saddā. Yena sampayuttadhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvena uppannadhammasmiṃ ^b^citta^eb^saddo pavatto, na tena tattha ^b^viññāṇādi^eb^saddā. Na hi vinā kenaci pavattinimittena saddo pavattatīti. Ekopi attho sammutyattho ca paramattho ca anekasaddappavttinimittatāya anekanāmoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Ettha siyā ‘‘nāmānīti vadatha, kiṃ nāmaṃ nāmā’’ti. Vuccate – īdise ṭhāne atthesu saddappavattinimittaṃ ‘‘nāma’’nti gahitaṃ, yaṃ ‘‘liṅga’’ntipi vuccati. Tathā hi ‘‘nāma’’nti ca ‘‘liṅga’’nti ca saddopi vuccati, ‘‘aññaṃ sobhanaṃ nāmaṃ pariyesissāmi. Liṅgañca nippajjate’’tiādīsu viya. Asabhāvadhammabhūtaṃ nāmapaññattisaṅkhātaṃ atthesu saddappavattinimittampi vuccati ‘‘nāmagottaṃ na jīrati. Sataliṅgo’’tiādīsu viya. Iti ^b^nāma^eb^saddenapi ^b^liṅga^eb^saddenapi saddappavattinimittassa kathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddappavattinimittañca nāma lokasaṅketasiddho taṃtaṃvacanatthaniyato sāmaññākāravisesoti gahetabbaṃ. So evaṃbhūtoyeva sāmaññākāraviseso nāma paññattīti pubbācariyā vadanti ^a^M0.0089^ea^. So hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe saddaṃ nāmeti tassa tassa atthassa nāmasaññaṃ karotīti ^b^nāmaṃ,^eb^ pakārehi ñāpanato ^b^paññatti^eb^ ca. Saviññattivikārassa pana saddassa sammutiparamatthasaccānaṃ pakārehi ñāpanato paññattibhāve vattabbameva natthi. Saddasseva hi ekantena paññattibhāvo icchitabbo ‘‘niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā’’ti ca ‘‘niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā’’ti ca ‘‘niruttipaṭisambhidā bahiddhārammaṇā’’ti ca pāḷidassanato. Idha pana saddappavattinimittādhikārattā nāmavasena attho pakāsito. Evaṃ anekavidhassa sāmaññākāravisesoti pubbācariyehi gahitassa nāmapaññattisaṅkhātassa saddappavattinimittassa vasena ekopi ñeyyattho anekaliṅgoti gahetabbo. Tenāha āyasmā suhemanto pabhinnapaṭisambhido –
[03]Evaṃ sabbābhidhānesupi iminā nayena yathārahaṃ attho vibhāvetabbo nayaññūhi.
[03]^b^Vidi avayave^eb^. Vindati. Yadi abhidhānamatthi, ‘‘vindo’’ti dissati. Yathā kaṇḍati. Kaṇḍo.
[03]^b^Khidi avayave^eb^ti candaviduno vadanti. Tesaṃ mate ‘‘khindatī’’ti rūpaṃ.

[03]^b^Nanda samiddhiyaṃ^eb^. Akammikā dhātu. Nandati puttehi puttimā. Nandāya nuna maraṇena. Nandasi sirivāhana. Nandanaṃ vanaṃ. ^b^Abhisaddayoge panāyaṃ sakammakopi. Abhinanda^eb^nti āgataṃ nābhinandanti maraṇaṃ.
[21]Sirīva rūpiniṃ disvā, nanditaṃ āsi taṃ kulaṃ;
[22]Tena nandāti me nāmaṃ, sundaraṃ pavaraṃ ahu.
[22]Na tena nandanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, iti maññe mahesayaṃ.
[03]^b^Cadi hilādane dittiyañca. Hilādanaṃ^eb^ sukhanaṃ. ^b^Ditti^eb^ sobhā. Candati. Candano, cando.

[03]Ettha ca candanassapi anekāni nāmāni – candanaṃ, gandhasāro, malayajo, suvaṇṇacandanaṃ, haricandanaṃ, rattacandanaṃ, gosītacandanaṃ. Candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasamaṅgitāya sattānaṃ paliḷāhaṃ vūpasamentaṃ sukhaṃ uppādetīti ^b^candanaṃ. Cando^eb^ti somo, sopi candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasampattiyā attano pabhāya sattānaṃ pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamento sukhaṃ uppādetīti ^b^cando^eb^ti vuccati. Atha vā candati dibbati siriyā virocatīti ^b^cando. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ pana ‘‘chandaṃ janetīti ^b^cando^eb^’’ti vuttaṃ. Tassāpi anekāni nāmāni –
[03]^b^Kadi kaladi avhāne rodane ca^eb^. Kandati, pakkandati. Pakkanduṃ, kandanto, kalandako.
[03]^b^Khanda gatisosanesu^eb^. Khandati. Khando. ^b^Khando^eb^ nāma eko devo, yo ‘‘kumāro sattidharo’’ti ca vuccati.
[03]^b^Sidi sītiye. Sītiyaṃ^eb^ sītibhāvo. Sindati. Sosindo, sotatto.
[03]^b^Vanda abhivādanathutīsu^eb^. Vandati, abhivandati. Abhivandanā, vandanaṃ, vandako.
[03]Ettha pana ^b^vandatī^eb^ti padassa namassati thometi vāti attho. Tathā hi ^b^suttantaṭīkā^eb^kāro ^b^‘‘vande^eb^ti vandāmi thomemi vā’’ti āha.
[03]^b^Bhadi kallāṇe sokhiye ca. Kallāṇaṃ^eb^ kalyāṇaṃ, ^b^sokhiyaṃ^eb^ sukhino bhāvo, sukhamiccevattho. Bhandati. Bhandako, bhaddo, bhadro.

[03]Ettha pana ^b^mando^eb^ti aññāṇīpi bāladārakopi vuccati. Tattha aññāṇī mandati aññāṇabhāvena appasaṃsitabbampi puggalaṃ thometīti ^b^mando^eb^. Mandati amoditabbaṭṭhānepi modatīti ^b^mando^eb^. Mandati dānasīlādipuññakriyāsu pamajjatīti ^b^mando^eb^. Mandati attano ca paresañca hitāhitaṃ acintento khādanīyabhojanīyādīhi attano kāyaṃ sañjātamedaṃ kurumāno supatīti ^b^mando^eb^. Mandati ayuttaṃ paresaṃ kriyaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena gacchati gaṇhātīti ^b^mando^eb^. Atha vā mandati punappunaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena gabbhaṃ gacchatīti ^b^mando^eb^. Vuttañhi bhagavatā ‘‘punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando’’ti. Bāladārako pana mandati yuttāyuttamajānanto uttānaseyyaṃparivattanaseyyaṃ vā supatīti ^b^mando^eb^. Tathā hi –
[22]Idaṃ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṃ hohi nāyakā’’ti

[07]Vuttaṃ, iti uttānasayanato paṭṭhāya yāva mandadasakaṃ, tāva ‘‘mando’’ti ‘‘dārako’’ti daṭṭhabbo. Appatthavācakopi pana ^b^manda^eb^saddo hoti, so pāṭipadikattā idha nādhippeto, atha vā mandati appabhāvena gacchati pavattatīti nipphannapāṭipadikavasenapi gahetabbo.
[03]^b^Muda hāse^eb^. Hasanaṃ ^b^hāso^eb^ tuṭṭhi. Modati, pamodati. Sammodati. Sammodako. Sammodamānā gacchanti muditā. Mudā.
[03]^b^Hada^eb^^a^M0.0093^ea^^b^karīsossagge. Karīsossaggo^eb^ nāma karīsassa ossajjanaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Hadati. Uhadati. Hadano.

[03]Ettha ca ‘‘yesaṃ no santhate dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipī’’ti ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ, tatra ^b^uhadantipī^eb^ti vaccampi karonti. ^b^Ummihantipī^eb^ti passāvampi karonti. Pacchimapadassattho ^b^miha secane^eb^ti dhātuvasena daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ pana ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇepi vattati dvigaṇikattā. Imasmiñhi ṭhāne ‘‘mutteti ohadeti cā’’ti ^b^cariyāpiṭakapāḷi^eb^ppadeso nidassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^muttetī^eb^ti passāvaṃ karoti. ^b^Ohadetī^eb^ti karīsaṃ vissajjeti.

[03]Tattha ^b^udāna^eb^nti kenaṭṭhena udānaṃ? Udānanaṭṭhena. Kimidaṃ udānanaṃ nāma? Pībhivegasamuṭṭhāpito udāhāro. Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃgahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā gacchati, taṃ ‘‘avaseko’’ti vuccati. Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā gacchati, taṃ ‘‘ogho’’ti vuccati, evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ hadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti, so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā vacīdvārena nikkhamanto paṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāraviseso ‘‘udāna’’nti vuccati. ^b^Udaggo^eb^ti sañjātasomanasso.
[03]^b^Kuda khuda guda kīḷāyameva^eb^. Kodati. Khodati. Godati.
[03]^b^Sūda paggharaṇe^eb^. Sūdati. Suttaṃ. Sūdo. Rañño sūdā mahānase.

[03]Ettha ^a^M0.0094^ea^ ca suttanti sūdati dhenu viya khīraṃ atthe paggharāpetīti ^b^suttaṃ,^eb^ tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Sakammikadhātuttā pana ‘‘paggharāpetī’’ti kāritavasena attho kathetuṃ labbhati. Tathā hi ‘‘karotī’’ti padassa ‘‘nipphādetī’’ti attho kathetuṃ labbhati. ^b^Sūdo^eb^ti bhattakāro. Yo ‘‘āḷāriko, odaniko, sūpakāro, rasako’’ti ca vuccati. ^b^Sūdati ^eb^‘‘evañcevañca kate khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sugandhaṃ manāpaṃ surasañca bhavissatī’’ti randhanakriyāya sukusalatāya rasaṃ paggharāpeti abhinibbattetīti ^b^sūdo^eb^.
[03]^b^Hilādi sukhe ca. Ca^eb^kāro pubbatthāpekkhako. Hilādati. Hilādanaṃ, hilādo, mettāsahāyakatasattamahāhilādo.
[03]^b^Mida snehe. Sneho^eb^ nāma vasāsaṅkhāto sneho pītisnehoti duvidho. Idha pana vasāsaṅkhāto sneho adhippeto, medati medo.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^medatī^eb^ti medasahito bhavati ayaṃ purisoti attho. ^b^Medo^eb^ nāma thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasineho, so vaṇṇena haliddivaṇṇo hoti. Kārite ‘‘medeti medayatī’’ti rūpāni. Tathā hi ‘‘te imaṃ kāyaṃ balaṃ gāhenti nāma brūhenti nāma medenti nāmā’’ti pāḷi dissati. Tattha ^b^medentī^eb^ti sañjātamedaṃ karontīti attho. Imissā pana dhātuyā ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pattāya pītisinehatthe ‘‘mejjatī’’ti suddhakatturūpaṃ bhavati. ^b^Curādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pana ^a^M0.0095^ea^ pattāya ‘‘medeti medayatī’’ti suddhakatturūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Sanda pasavane. Pasavanaṃ^eb^ sandanaṃ avicchedappavatti. Sandati udakaṃ. Mahanto puññābhisando.
[03]^b^Madda maddane^eb^. Maddabhi, pamaddati. Mārasenappamaddano. Kaṇṭakaṃ maddati.

[03]^b^Sīda visaraṇagatyāvasānesu. Visaraṇaṃ^eb^ vippharaṇaṃ. ^b^Gatyāvasānaṃ^eb^ gamanassa avasānaṃ osānaṃ abhāvakaraṇaṃ, nisīdananti attho. Sīdati, lābūni sīdanti. Saṃsīdati, osīdati, pasīdati, vippasīdati. Pasādo. Pasanno. Vippasanno. Pasādako. Pasādito. Pāsādo. Osīdāpako. Kusīto. Āsīno. Nisinno. Nisinnako. Sannisīvesu pakkhisu. Nisīdanaṃ, nisinnaṃ. Nisajjā. Gonisādo, upanisā. Sīdeti. Sīdayati. Sīdāpeti. Sīdāpayati. Pasādeti. Nisīdituṃ. Nisīdāpetuṃ, nisādetuṃ, nisīdāpeti, nisīdāpetvā. Ucchaṅge maṃ nisādetvā, pitā atthānusāsati. Nisīditvātipi pāṭho. Nisīditvā. Nisīditvāna. Nisīdituna ^a^M0.0096^ea^. Nisīdiya. Nisīdiyāna. Saṃsīditvā. Avasīditvā. Osīditvā.

[03]Tattha ^b^kusīto^eb^ti vīriyenādhigantabbassa atthassa alābhato kucchitenākārena sīdatīti kusīto. Atha vā sayampi kucchitenākārena sīdati aññepi sīdāpeti taṃ nissāya aññesaṃ sīdanassa sambhavatoti ^b^kusīto^eb^. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –

[03]^b^Kusīto^eb^ti cettha ^b^da^eb^ssa ^b^ta^eb^ttaṃ ‘‘sugato’’ti ettha viya ‘‘satasmīti hotī’’ti ettha viya ca. Tathā hi sīdatīti sataṃ, aniccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Iminā ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttā. ^b^Sata^eb^iti cettha avibhattiko niddeso. ^b^Sannisīvesū^eb^ti parissamavinodanatthaṃ sabbaso nisīdantesu, vissamamānesūti attho, ^b^da^eb^kārassa ^b^va^eb^kāraṃ katvā niddeso. ^b^Nisīdana^eb^nti nisīdanakriyā. Mañcapīṭhādikaṃ vā āsanaṃ. Tañhi nisīdanti etthāti ^b^nisīdana^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^Nisinna^eb^nti nisīdanakriyā eva. Ettha pana ‘‘gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti. Mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe tayā nisinnanti kukkuccaṃ upadahatītiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo. Ettha hi gamanaṃ gabhaṃ, ṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṃ, nisīdanaṃ nisannaṃ, supanaṃ suttaṃ, jāgaraṇaṃ jāgaritaṃ, bhāsanaṃ bhāsitanti vuccati. ^b^Nisajjā^eb^ti nisīdanā. ^b^Gonisādo^eb^ti gonisajjanā. ^b^Upanisā^eb^ti upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti upanisā, kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Nisādetu^eb^nti nisīdāpetuṃ. ^b^Nisādetvā^eb^ti nisīdāpetvā.
[03]^b^Nida neda kucchāsannikarisesu. Kucchā^eb^ garahā. ^b^Sannikarisaṃ^eb^ vohāraviseso. Nidati. Nedati.
[03]^b^Bundi nisāne. Nisānaṃ^eb^ tejanaṃ tikkhatā. Bundati. Bondi.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^bondī^eb^ti sarīraṃ. Tañhi bundāni tikkhāni pisuṇapharusavācādīni vā paññāvīriyādīni vā ettha santīti ^b^bondī^eb^ti vuccati, saññogaparattepi ^b^u^eb^kāra^b^sso^eb^kārādeso, pāpakalyāṇajanavasenesa attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Bondi^eb^saddassa sarīravācakatā pana –
[21]‘‘Nāhaṃ puna na ca puna, na cāpi apunappunaṃ;

[03]^b^Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ^eb^. Vadati, vajjati. Vadeti, ovadati, ovadeti, paṭivadati. Abhivadati, anuvadati, upavadati, apavadati. Nivadati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni. Tattha ‘‘vajjantu bhonto amma’’nti pāḷidassanato ^b^vajjatī^eb^ti padaṃ vuttaṃ. Keci pana garū ‘‘vajjetī’’ti rūpaṃ icchanti, taṃ upaparikkhitvā yuttañce gahetabbaṃ, ‘‘upāsako bhikkhuṃ vadeti. Tena yogena janakāyaṃ, ovadeti mahāmunī’’ti ca dassanato ^b^vadeti ovadetī^eb^ti ca vuttaṃ. Sabbānetāni suddhakattupadāni.
[03]Ovādeti ^a^M0.0098^ea^, vādayati, vādāpeti, vādāpayati. Vajjento, vajjayanto, imāni hetukattupadāni.

[03]Kamme ‘‘vadiyati, ovadiyati, vajjiyati. Vadiyamāno, vajjamāno, ovadiyamāno, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ’’ iccādīni bhavanti. ‘‘Vādo, ovādo, paṭivādo, pavādo, abhivādanaṃ, anuvādo, upavādo, apavādo, vivādo, nivādanaṃ, vajjaṃ, vadanaṃ’’ iccevamādīni nāmikapadāni yojetabbāni.

[03]Tattha ^b^vādo^eb^ti kathā. Vaditabbaṃ vattabbanti ^b^vajjaṃ,^eb^ kiṃ taṃ? Vacanaṃ. Etena saccavajjena, samaṅginī sāmikena homīti ettha hi vacanaṃ ‘‘vajja’’nti vuccati. Vadanti etenāti ^b^vadanaṃ,^eb^ mukhaṃ. Mukhassa hi imāni nāmāni –
[03]Tatra ^b^vadatī^eb^ti pitā puttaṃ vadati. Apica ^b^vadatī^eb^ti bherī vadati, nādaṃ muñcatīti attho. Esa nayo ^b^vajjatī^eb^ti etthāpi.
[03]Tatrāyaṃ padamālā, vadati, vadanti. Vadasi, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadate, vadante. Vadase, vadavhe. Vade, vadamhe.
[03]Vadatu, vadantu. Vadāhi, vada, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadataṃ, vadantaṃ. Vadassu, vadavho. Vade, vadāmase.
[03]Vajjati, vajjanti. Vajjasi, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjate, vajjante. Vajjase, vajjavhe. Vajje, vajjamhe.

[03]Vajjatu ^a^M0.0099^ea^, vajjantu. Vajjāhi, vajja, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjataṃ, vajjantaṃ. Vajjassu, vajjavho. Vajje, vajjāmhase. Imā dve padamālā ^b^vada^eb^dhātussa ^b^vajjā^eb^desavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atrāyaṃ sukhumatthavinicchayo, ‘‘mānussakā ca dibbā ca, tūriyā vajjanti tāvade’’ti pāḷi. Ettha ^b^vajjantī^eb^ti idaṃ suddhakattupadaṃ taddīpakattā. Kiṃ viya?

[07]Ettha ‘‘udīrayantu vadantu’’ādīni viya. Tathā hi ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘vajjantī^eb^ti vajjiṃsūti atītavacane vattamānavacanaṃ veditabba’’nti suddhakattuvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ, tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu ^b^vada^eb^dhātussa ^b^vajjā^eb^deso daṭṭhabbo.
[21]‘‘Saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi diṇḍimā bahū;

[07]Ettha pana ^b^vajjantī^eb^ti hetukattupadaṃ taddīpakattā. Tañca kho vaṇṇasandhivisayattā ^b^vādayantī^eb^ti kāritapadarūpena siddhaṃ. Tathā hi ‘‘vādayantī’’ti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā ^b^ya^eb^kāre pare saralopo kato, ^b^dya^eb^kārasaññogassa ^b^jja^eb^kāradvayaṃ pubbakkharassa rassattañca bhavati. Tenāha ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘vajjantī^eb^ti vādayantī’’ti hetukattuvasena vivaraṇaṃ. Tathā hi ‘‘devatā nabhe accherakaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā antalikkhe etāni saṅkhapaṇavādīni tūriyāni vādayantī’’ti hetukattuvasena attho gahetabbo bhavati, tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu ^b^vada^eb^ssa ^b^vajjā^eb^deso na bhavati.

[03]Kecettha vadeyyuṃ ‘‘antalikkhamhi vajjanti, disvānaccherakaṃ nabhe’’ti etthāpi ‘‘vajjantī’’ti padaṃ suddhakattupadameva, na hetukattupadaṃ ^a^M0.0100^ea^^b^‘‘vajjantī^eb^ti vādayantī’’ti vivaraṇe katepi, tathā hi ‘‘ye kecime diṭṭhiparibbasānā, ‘‘idameva sacca’nti vivādayantī’’ti ca ‘‘evampi viggayha vivādayantī’’ti ca evamādīsu ^b^vadanti^eb^padena samānatthaṃ ‘‘vādayantī’’ti padañca sāsane diṭṭha’’nti? Tanna, ‘‘disvā’’ti dassanakriyāvacanato. Na hi saṅkhapaṇavādīnaṃ pāṭihāriyādidassanaṃ upapajjati dassanacittassa abhāvatoti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi –
[07]Ettha viya upacaritattā upapajjateva dassanavacanaṃ. Tasmā ‘‘vajjantīti vādayantī’’ti vivaraṇaṃ suddhakattuvasena katanti? Tanna, heṭṭhā –

[07]Iminnā gāthāya ^b^‘‘vādentī^eb^ti vādayanti devatā’’ti sapāṭhasesassa atthavivaraṇassa hetukattuvasena katattā. Athāpi vadeyyuṃ ‘‘saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi diṇḍimā bahū’ti paccattavacanavasena vuttattā ^b^vajjantī^eb^ti padaṃ kammavācakapada’’nti ce? Tampi na, kammavasena vivaraṇassa akatattā, kattuvasena pana katattāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.

[03]Ayamettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Dvigaṇiko ^b^vada^eb^dhātu ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇiko ca ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇiko ca. So hi ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe vattanto ‘‘vadati vajjatī’’ti suddhakatturūpāni janetvā ‘‘vādeti, vādayati, vādāpeti, vādāpayatī’’ti cattāri hetukatturūpāni janeti, ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇe pana ‘‘vādeti, vādayatī’’ti ^a^M0.0101^ea^ suddhakatturūpāni janetvā ‘‘vādāpeti, vādāpayatī’’ti ca dve hetukatturūpāni janeti, tasmā sāsane ‘‘vādenti vādayantī’’ti suddhakattupadāni dissanti. ‘‘Vadeyya, vadeyyuṃ’’ iccādi sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. ‘‘Vajjeyya, vajjeyyuṃ’’ iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ ^b^vajjā^eb^desavasena.

[03]Atha vā vadeyya, vadeyyuṃ, vajjuṃ. Pitā mātā ca te dajjunti padamiva. Ettha ca ‘‘vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Vadeyyuṃ vāna vadeyyuṃvāti attho. Vadeyyāsi, vajjāsi, vajjesi iccapi. Vutto vajjāsi vandanaṃ. Vajjesi kho tvaṃ vāmūraṃ. Vadeyyātha, vajjātha. Ammaṃ arogaṃ vajjātha. Vadeyyāmi, vajjāmi, vadeyyāma, vajjāma. Vadetha, vaderaṃ. Vadetho, vadeyyāvho, vajjāvho. Vadeyyaṃ, vajjaṃ, vadeyyāmhe, vajjāmhe. Pubbe viya idhāpi ^b^ya^eb^kāre pare saralopo daṭṭhabbo. Aññānipi upaparikkhitvā gahetabbāni.

[03]Idāni parokkhādirūpāni kathayāma. Vada, pāvada, yathā babhuva. ^b^Da^eb^kāralope ‘‘pāva’’ itipi rūpaṃ bhavati, ‘‘paṭipaṃ vadehi bhaddante’’ti ettha ‘‘paṭipa’’nti padaṃ viya. Tathā hi ‘‘yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāva’’ iti pāḷi dissati. Ettha pasaddo upasaggo dīghaṃ katvā vutto ‘‘pāvadati pāvacana’’ntiādīsu viya, ^b^pāvā^eb^ti ca idaṃ atītavacanaṃ, ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana atītavacanaṃ idanti jānantopi garu vattamānavacanavasena ‘‘pāvāti vadatī’’ti vivaraṇamakāsi īdisesu ṭhānesu kālavipallāsavasena atthassa vattabbattā.

[03]^b^Āyasmāpi^eb^ ca ^b^sāriputto niddese^eb^ ‘‘yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā’’ti padaṃ nikkhipitvā ^b^ātumā^eb^ vuccati attā, ^b^sayameva pāvā^eb^ti sayameva attānaṃ pāvadati, ‘‘ahamasmi ^a^M0.0102^ea^ sīlasampanno’’ti vā ‘‘vatasampanno’’ti vāti vattamānavacanena atthaṃ niddisi. Atha vā ^b^pāvā^eb^ti idaṃ na kevalaṃ ^b^vada^eb^dhātuvaseneva nipphannaṃ, atha kho ^b^u^eb^dhātuvasenapi. Tathā hi idaṃ ^b^pa^eb^pubbassa ^b^u^eb^sadde iti dhātussa payoge ^b^u^eb^kārassa ^b^o^eb^kārādesaṃ katvā tato parokkhābhūte ^b^a^eb^kāre pare ^b^o^eb^kārassa ^b^āvā^eb^desaṃ tato ca sandhikiccaṃ katvā sijjhati, tasmā ^b^u^eb^dhātussa ^b^vada^eb^dhātuyā samānatthattā tannipphannarūpassa ca ^b^vada^eb^dhātuyā nipphannarūpena samānarūpattā ‘‘sayameva attānaṃ pāvadatī’’ti ^b^vada^eb^dhātuvasena niddisīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Idāni vicchinnā padamālā ghaṭīyati. Vada, vaduṃ. Vade, vadittha, vadaṃ, vadimha. Vadittha, vadire. Vadittho, vadivho. Vadiṃ, vadimhe. Pāvada, pāva iccapi. Pāvadu. Pāvade, pāvadittha. Pāvadaṃ, pāvadimha. Pāvadittha, pāvadire. Pāvadittho, pāvadivho. Pāvadiṃ, pāvadimhe. Tathā ‘‘vajja, vajju’’ iccādīni parokkhārūpāni.
[03]‘‘Avadi, vadi, avaduṃ, vaduṃ, avadiṃsu, vadiṃsu. Avajji, vajji’’ iccādīni ajjatanīrūpāni.

[03]‘‘Avadissā, vadissā, avajjissā, vajjissā’’ iccādīni kālātipattirūpāni. Sesāni sabbānipi yathāsambhavaṃ vitthāretabbāni. Yā panettha ^b^vada^eb^dhātu viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ vuttā, sā katthaci ‘‘vadantaṃ ekapokkharā. Bherivādako’’tiādīsu abyattasaddepi vattati upacaritavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vida^eb^^a^M0.0103^ea^^b^ñāṇe. Ñāṇaṃ^eb^ jānanaṃ. Vidati. Vedo. Vidū. Kārite ‘‘vedeti. Vedayati. Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti. Vedayanti ca te tuṭṭhiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho’’ti payogā. Tattha ^b^pavedetī^eb^ti bodheti ñāpeti pakāseti. ^b^Vedo^eb^ti vidati sukhumampi kāraṇaṃ ājānātīti vedo, paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. ‘‘Vedehamunī’’ti ettha hi ñāṇaṃ ^b^vedo^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Vedo^eb^ti vā vedaganthassapi nāmaṃ vidanti jānanti etena uccāritamattena tadādhāraṃ puggalaṃ ‘‘brāhmaṇo aya’’nti, vidanti vā etena brāhmaṇā attanā kattabbakiccanti ^b^vedo^eb^. So pana iruvedayajuvedasāmavedavasena tividho. Āthabbaṇavedaṃ pana paṇītajjhāsayā na sikkhanti parūpaghātasahitattā. Tasmā ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū’’ti vuttaṃ. Eteyeva ‘‘chando, manto, sutī’’ti ca vuccanti.
[03]^b^Vidū^eb^ti paṇḍitamanusso. So hi yathāsabhāvato kammañca phalañca kusalādibhede ca dhamme vidatīti ‘‘vidū’’ti vuccati.
[03]^b^Ruda assuvimocane,^eb^ sakammikavasenimissā attho gahetabbo. Rodati, rudati iccapi. Ruṇṇaṃ. Ruditaṃ. Rodanaṃ. Rodanto. Rodamāno. Rodantī. Rodamānā. Rudamukhā. Rudaṃ. Rudanto.

[03]Tattha ^a^M0.0104^ea^^b^rodatī^eb^ti kiṃ rodati? Mataṃ puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā rodati. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘nāhaṃ bhante etaṃ rodāmi, yaṃ maṃ bhante bhagavā evamāha’’. Ayaṃ panettha attho – ‘‘yaṃ maṃ bhante bhagavā evamāha, ahaṃ etaṃ bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ na parodāmi na paridevāmi na anutthunāmī’ti evaṃ sakammikavasenattho veditabbo, na assumuñcanamattena.
[21]‘Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
[22]Jīvantaṃ amma passanti, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī’ti

[07]Ayañcettha payogo’’ti ida^b^maṭṭhakathā^eb^vacanaṃ. Idaṃ pana ^b^ṭīkā^eb^vacanaṃ – ‘‘yathā sakammakā dhātusaddā atthavisesavasena akammakā honti ‘vibuddho puriso vibuddho kamalasaṇḍo’ti, evaṃ atthavisesavasena akammakāpi sakammakā hontīti dassetuṃ ‘na paridevāmi na anutthunāmī’ti āha. ^b^Anutthuna^eb^saddo sakammakavasena payujjati ‘purāṇāni anutthuna’ntiādīsu. ^b^Ayañcettha payogo^eb^ti iminā gāthāya anutthunanaṃ rudanaṃ adhippetanti dassetī’’ti.

[03]^b^Dalidda duggatiyaṃ^eb^. Dukkhassa gati patiṭṭhāti ^b^duggatī^eb^ti ayaṃ attho ‘‘apāyaṃ duggatiṃvinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī’’tiādīsu yujjati, idha pana idaṃ atthaṃ aggahetvā añño attho gahetabbo. Kathaṃ ^b^duggatī^eb^ti? Dukkhena kicchena gati gamanaṃ annapānādilābho duggatīti. Daliddati. Daliddo, daliddī, dāliddiyaṃ. Tattha ^b^daliddatī^eb^ti sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ paraṃ yācitvā eva dukkhena adhigacchati, na ayācitvāti attho. ^b^Duliddo^eb^ti duggatamanusso. ^b^Daliddī^eb^ti duggatā nārī. Daliddassa bhāvo ^b^dāliddiyaṃ^eb^. Ettha ca sabbameva ‘‘daliddatī’’ti lokikappayogadassanato ‘‘daliddatī’’ti kriyāpadaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. Sāsane pana ^a^M0.0105^ea^ taṃ kriyāpadaṃ na āgataṃ, ‘‘daliddo daliddī’’ti nāmapadāniyeva āgatāni. Anāgatampi taṃ ‘‘nāthatī’’ti padamiva sāsanānulomattā gahetabbameva. Garū pana kaccāyanamatavasena ^b^dala duggatimhī^eb^ti duggativācaka^b^dala^eb^dhātuto ^b^idda^eb^paccayaṃ katvā ‘‘daliddo’’ti nāmapadaṃ dassesuṃ.
[03]^b^Tuda byathane^eb^. Tudati, vitudati. Kammani ‘‘tujjati, vitujjamāno, vedanābhibhunno’’ti rūpāni.
[03]^b^Nuda peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ^eb^ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ, nudati, panudati. Panudanaṃ.
[03]^b^Vidi lābhe^eb^. Vindati. Uṭṭhātā vindate dhanaṃ. Govindo.

[03]^b^Dhā dhāraṇe^eb^. Dadhāti, vidadhāti. Yaṃ paṇḍito nipuṇaṃ saṃvidheti. Nidhiṃ nidheti. Nidhi nāma nidhīyati. Tāva sunihito santo. Yato nidhiṃ parihari. Nidahati. Kuhiṃ deva nidahāmi. Paridahati. Yo vattaṃ paridahissati. Dhassati. Paridhassati. Bāloti paraṃ padahati. Sakyā kho ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ ^a^M0.0106^ea^ ukkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti. Saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ. Saddhā, saddahanā, saddhātabbaṃ, saddahitabbaṃ, saddhāyiko, paccayiko. Saddheyyavacasā upāsikā. Saddahituṃ, saddahitvā. Visesādhānaṃ. Sotāvadhānaṃ. Sotaṃ odahati. Ohitasoto. Sotaṃ odahitvā. Maccudheyyaṃ, māradheyyaṃ, nāmadheyyaṃ, dhātu, dhātā, vidhātā. Vidhi. Abhidhānaṃ, abhidheyyaṃ, nidhānavatī vācā, ādhānagāhī, sandhi. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.

[03]Imasmā pana ^b^dhā^eb^dhātuto pubbassa ^b^api^eb^ iccupasaggassa ^b^a^eb^kāro kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ pappoti, kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ na pappoti. Atra lopo vuccate, dvāraṃ pidahati, dvāraṃ pidahanto, pidahituṃ, pidahitvā, evaṃ ^b^a^eb^kāralopo bhavati. Dvāraṃ apidahitvā, evaṃ ^b^a^eb^kāralopo na bhavati. Ettha hi ^b^a^eb^kāro ^b^api^eb^upasaggassa avayavo na hoti. Kinti ce? Paṭisedhatthavācako nipātoyeva, upasaggāvayavo pana adassanaṃ gato, ayaṃ niccālopo. Evaṃ ^b^dhā^eb^dhātuto pubbassa ^b^api^eb^ iccupasaggassa ^b^a^eb^kāro kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ pappoti, kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ na pappoti. Idaṃ acchariyaṃ idaṃ abbhutaṃ. Yatra hi nāma bhagavato pāvacane evarūpapopi nayo sandissati viññūnaṃ hadayavimhāpanakaro, yo ekasmiṃyeva dhātumhi ekasmiṃyeva upasagge ekasmiṃyevatthe kvaci lopālopavasena vibhajituṃ labbhati. Idāni mayaṃ sotūnaṃ paramakosallajananatthaṃ tadubhayampi ākāraṃ ekajjhaṃ karontā tadākāravatiṃ jinavarapāḷiṃ ānayāma –
[21]‘‘Gaṅgaṃ ^a^M0.0107^ea^ me pidahissanti, na taṃ sakkomi brāhmaṇa;
[22]Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
[03]^b^Dhu gatitheriyesu. Gati^eb^ gamanaṃ, ^b^theriyaṃ^eb^ thirabhāvo. Dhavati. Dhuvaṃ.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^dhuva^eb^nti thiraṃ. ‘‘Nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’’tiādīsu viya, tasmā ^b^dhuva^eb^nti thiraṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ. Atha vā ^b^dhuva^eb^nti idaṃ gatitheriyatthavasena nibbānasseva adhivacanaṃ bhavitumarahati. Tañhi jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokādito muccitukāmehi dhavitabbaṃ gantabbanti ^b^dhuvaṃ,^eb^ uppādavayābhāvena vā niccasabhāvattā dhavati thiraṃ sassataṃ bhavatīti ^b^dhuvaṃ^eb^. Yañhi sandhāya bhagavatā ‘‘dhuvañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi dhuvagāminiñca paṭipada’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhuva^eb^saddo ‘‘vacanaṃ dhuvasassata’’nti ettha thire vattati. ‘‘Dhuvañca bhikkhave desessāmī’’ti ettha nibbāne. ‘‘Dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasī’’ti ettha pana ekaṃse nipātapadabhāvena vattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Dhū vidhūnane. Ū^eb^kārassa ^b^ū^eb^vattaṃ. Dhūvati. Dhūvitā, dhūvitabbaṃ. Rassatte ‘‘dhuto, dhutavā’’ iccapi rūpāni bhavanti.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^dhenū^eb^ti dhayati pivati ito khīraṃ potakoti dhenu, ‘‘godhenu, assadhenu, migadhenū’’ti ^b^dhenu^eb^saddo sāmaññavasena sapotikāsu tiracchānagatitthīsu vattati, evaṃ santepi yebhuyyena gāviyaṃ vattati. Tathā hi ‘‘satta dhenusate datvā’’ti pāḷi dissati.

[03]^b^Sidhu^eb^^a^M0.0108^ea^^b^gatiyaṃ^eb^ sedhati, nisedhati, paṭisedhati. Siddho, pasiddho, nisiddho, paṭisiddho, paṭisedhito, paṭisedhako, paṭisedho, paṭisedhituṃ, paṭisedhitvā. Idha acinteyyabalattā upasaggānaṃ taṃyoge ^b^sidhu^eb^dhātussa nānappakārā atthā sambhavanti, aññesampi evameva.
[03]^b^Sidhu satthe maṅgalye ca. Satthaṃ^eb^ sāsanaṃ, ^b^maṅgalyaṃ^eb^ pāpavināsanaṃ vuddhikāraṇaṃ vā. Sedhati. Siddho, pasiddho, pasiddhi.

[03]^b^Dadha dhāraṇe^eb^. Janassa tuṭṭhiṃ dadhateti ^b^dadhi^eb^. Dhakārassa ^b^ha^eb^kāratte ‘‘dahatī’’ti rūpaṃ. Ayaṃ itthī imaṃ itthiṃ ayyikaṃ dahati. Ime purisā imaṃ purisaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti. Cittaṃ samādahātabbaṃ. Samādahaṃ cittaṃ.
[03]^b^Edha vuddhiyaṃ lābhe ca^eb^. Edhati. Edho, sukhedhito. Gambhīre gādhamedhati.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^edho^eb^ti edhati. Vaḍḍhati etena pāvakoti edho. Indanaṃ, upādānaṃ. ^b^Sukhedhito^eb^ti sukhena edhito, sukhasaṃvaḍḍhitoti attho. ^b^Gādhamedhatī^eb^ti gādhaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ edhati labhati.
[03]^b^Baddha saṃharise. Saṃhariso^eb^ vinibaddhakriyā. Baddhati, vinibaddhati. Vinibaddhā.
[03]^b^Gādha patiṭṭhānissayagandhesu^eb^. Gādhati. Gādhaṃ kattā. Gambhīrato agādhaṃ.
[03]^b^Bādha viloḷane^eb^ bādhati, vibādhati. Ābādho. Ābādhati cittaṃ viloḷetīti ^b^ābādho^eb^.
[03]^b^Bandha bandhane^eb^ bandhati. Bandhanako, bandho, bandhāpito, paṭibandho, bandhanaṃ, bandho, sambandhanaṃ, sambandho, pabandho, bandhu.

[03]Tattha ^b^bandhana^eb^nti bandhanti satte etenāti bandhanaṃ, saṅkhalikādi. ‘‘Ayaṃ amhākaṃ vaṃso’’ti sambandhitabbaṭṭhena ^b^bandhu, theragāthāsaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘pemabandhanena bandhū’’ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Dadhi asīghacāre. Asīghacāro^eb^ asīghappavatti. Dandhati. Dandho, dandhapañño. Yo dandhakāle tarati, taraṇīye ca dandhati.
[03]^b^Vaddha vaddhane^eb^. Vaddhati. Vaddhi, vuddhi, vaddho, vuddho, jātivuddho, guṇavuddho, vayovuddho.

[03]^b^Medha hiṃsāyaṃ saṅgame ca^eb^. Medhati. Medhā, medhāvī. Atra ^b^medhā^eb^ti asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā. Medhati vā siriyā sīlādīhi ca sappurisadhammehi saha gacchati na ekikā hutvā tiṭṭhatīti ^b^medhā,^eb^ paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tathā hi –

[03]^b^Budha bodhane^eb^. Bodhati. Buddho. Abhisambuddhāno. Sambuddhaṃ. Asambuddhaṃ. Bodhi. ^b^Divādi^eb^gaṇepi ayaṃ dissati. Tatrahi ‘‘bujjhatī’’ti rūpaṃ, idha pana ‘‘bodhatī’’ti rūpaṃ. ‘‘Yo nindaṃ apabodhatī’’ti pāḷi dissati. Kārite pana ‘‘bodheti’’ iccādīni.
[03]^b^Yudha sampahāre^eb^. Yodhati. Yodho. Yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena. Yuddhaṃ. Caraṇāyudho, caraṇāvudho vā. Āvudhaṃ. ^b^Divādi^eb^gaṇikassa panassa ‘‘yujjhatī’’ti rūpaṃ.
[03]^b^Dīdhi dittivedhanesu^eb^. Dīdhati. Dīdhiti. Ettha ca ^b^dīdhitī^eb^ti rasmi. Anekāni hi rasmināmāni.
[21]Rasmi ābhā pabhā raṃsi, ditti bhā ruci dīdhiti;

[03]^b^Nī naye^eb^. Neti, nayati, vineti. Vineyya hadaye daraṃ. Āneti. Ānayati. Netā. Vinetā. Nāyako. Neyyo ^a^M0.0111^ea^. Veneyyo. Venayiko. Vinīto puriso. Nīyamāne pisācena, kinnu tāta udikkhati. Nīyanto. Nettaṃ. Netti. Bhavanetti samūhatā. Nettiko. Udakañhi nayanti nettikā. Nettā. Nette ujuṃ gate sati. Nayo. Vinayo. Āyatanaṃ. Netuṃ. Vinetuṃ. Netvā. Vinetvā iccādīni.

[03]Tattha ^b^netta^eb^nti samavisamaṃ dassentaṃ attabhāvaṃ netīti nettaṃ, cakkhu. ^b^Nettī^eb^ti nenti etāya satteti netti, rajju. ^b^Bhavanettī^eb^ti bhavarajju, taṇhāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tāya hi sattā goṇā viya gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ niyyanti, tasmā bhavanettīti vuccati. ^b^Nettikā^eb^ti kassakā. ^b^Nettā^eb^ti gavajeṭṭhako yūthapati. ^b^Nayo^eb^ti nayanaṃ gamanaṃ nayo, pāḷigati. Atha vā tattha tattha netabboti ^b^nayo,^eb^ sadisabhāvena netabbākāro. Nīyatīti ^b^nayo,^eb^ tathattanayādi. Nīyati etenāti ^b^nayo,^eb^ antadvayavivajjananayādi.

[03]Tathā hi chabbidho nayo tathattanayo pattinayo desanānayo antadvayavivajjananayo acinteyyanayo adhippāyanayoti. Tesu ^b^tathattanayo^eb^ antadvayavivajjananayena nīyati, ^b^pattinayo^eb^ acinteyyanayena, ^b^desanānayo^eb^ adhippāyanayena nīyati. Etthādimhi tividho nayo kammasādhanena nīyatīti ‘‘nayo’’ti vuccati, pacchimo pana tividho nayo karaṇasādhanena nīyati etena tathattādinayattayamiti ‘‘nayo’’ti vuccati. Imasmiṃ atthe papañciyamāne ganthavitthāro siyāti vitthāro na dassito.
[03]Aparopi ^a^M0.0112^ea^ catubbidho nayo ekattanayo nānattanayo abyāpāranayo evaṃdhammatānayoti.

[03]Vineti satte ettha, etenāti vā ^b^vinayo^eb^. Kāyavācānaṃ vinayanatopi vinayo. ^b^Āyatana^eb^nti anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayateva pavattatevāti āyatanaṃ.
[03]Ayaṃ panettha atthuddhāro. ‘‘Āyatananti assānaṃ kambojo āyatanaṃ, gunnaṃ dakkhiṇāpatho āyatana’’nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyānaṃ nāma. ‘‘Manorame āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā.
[03]Chāyaṃ chāyatthino yanti, phalatthaṃ phalabhojino’’ti ettha samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. ‘‘Pañcimāni bhikkhave vimuttāyatanānī’’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ. Aññepi pana payogā ^b^yata patiyatane^eb^ti ettha pakāsitā.
[03]^b^Thana pana dhana sadde^eb^. Thanati. Panati. Dhanati.

[03]Ettha ca yobbanibhāve ṭhitattā rūpavilāsena kanati dippati virocatīti ^b^kaññā^eb^. Atha vā kaniyati kāmiyabhi abhipatthiyati purisehītipi ^b^kaññā,^eb^ yobbanitthī. ^b^Kanaka^eb^nti kanati, kanīyatīti vā ^b^kanakaṃ,^eb^ suvaṇṇaṃ. Suvaṇṇassa hi anekāni nāmāni.
[03]Tattha vananti. Taṃ sambhajanti mayūrakokilādayo sattāti ^b^vanaṃ,^eb^ araññaṃ. Vanati sambhajati saṃkilesapuggalanti ^b^vanaṃ,^eb^ taṇhā.
[03]Ettha ca ‘‘kasmā te eko bhujo janati, eko te na janatī bhujo’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^janatī^eb^ti sunati saddaṃ karoti.
[03]^b^Khanu avadāraṇe^eb^ khanati. Sukhaṃ. Dukkhaṃ. Khato āvāṭo.

[03]Tattha ^b^sukha^eb^nti suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ. Duṭṭhu khanati kāyikacetasikasukhanti ^b^dukkhaṃ^eb^. Aññamaññapaṭipakkhā hi ete dhammā. Dvidhā cittaṃ khanatīti vā ^b^dukkhaṃ. Curādi^eb^gaṇavasena pana ‘‘sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, dukkhayatīti dukkha’’nti nibbacanāni gahetabbāni. Samāsapāvasena ‘‘sukaraṃ khamassāti ^b^sukhaṃ,^eb^ dukkaraṃ khamassāti ^b^dukkha’’^eb^nti nibbacanānipi vividhā hi saddānaṃ byuppatti pavatti nimittañca.

[03]^b^Hana hiṃsāgatīsu^eb^. Ettha pana ^b^hiṃsā^eb^vacanena pharusāya vācāya pīḷanañca daṇḍādīhi paharaṇañca gahitaṃ, tasmā ^b^hana hiṃsāpaharaṇagatīsū^eb^ti attho gahetabbo. Tathā hi ‘‘rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā’’ti. Pāṭhassa atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇentehi ^b^‘‘haneyyu^eb^nti potheyyuñceva chindeyyuñcā’’ti ^a^M0.0114^ea^ vuttaṃ. Ettha ca chedanaṃ nāma hatthapādādichedanaṃ vā sīsacchedavasena māraṇaṃ vā. ^b^Hana^eb^ssa ^b^vadhā^eb^deso ^b^ghātā^eb^deso ca bhavati, hanti hanati, hananti. Hanasi, hanatha. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ neyyaṃ.

[03]^b^Hiṃsā^eb^dayo cattāro atthā labbhanti. ‘‘Hanti hatthehi pādehī’’ti ettha pana ^b^hantī^eb^ti paharatīti attho. ‘‘Kuddho hi pitaraṃ hanti. Vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ vara’’nti. Ettha ^b^hantī^eb^ti mārentīti attho. ‘‘Vadhati, vadheti, ghāteti’’ iccapi rūpāni bhavanti. Tattha ‘‘vadhati na rodati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī’’tiādīsu vadho paharaṇaṃ. Pāṇaṃ vadheti. Pāṇavadho. ‘‘Esa vadho khaṇḍahālassa. Satte ghātetī’’ti ca ādīsu vadho māraṇaṃ.

[03]‘‘Upāhanaṃ, vadhū’’ti ca ettha ^b^hanavadha^eb^saddatthogamanaṃ. ‘‘Purisaṃ hanati. Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ paṭihanati’’ iccādīni kattupadāni. Devadatto yaññadattena haññati. Tato vātātape ghore, sañjāte paṭihaññati. Paccattavacanassekārattaṃ, yathā ‘‘vanappagumbe’’ti. Vihārenāti padaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ, iccādīni kammapadāni. Hantā. Hato. Vadhako. Vadhū. Āghāto. Upaghāto. Ghātako. Paṭigho. Saṅgho. Byaggho. Sakuṇagghi. Hantuṃ, hanituṃ, hantvā, hanitvā. Vajjhetvā, vadhitvā iccādīni sanāmikāni tumantādipadāni.

[03]Tattha ^b^upāhana^eb^nti taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upahananti upagacchanti tato ca āhananti āgacchanti etenāti upāhanaṃ. ^b^Vadhū^eb^ti kilesavasena sunakhampi upagamanasīlāti vadhū, sabbāsaṃ itthīnaṃ ^a^M0.0115^ea^ sādhāraṇametaṃ. Atha vā ^b^vadhū^eb^ti suṇisā. Tathā hi ‘‘tena hi vadhu yadā utunī ahosi, pupphaṃ te uppannaṃ, atha me āroceyyāsī’’ti ettha vadhūti suṇisā vuccati. Sā pana ‘‘ayaṃ no puttassa bhariyā’’ti sassusasurehi adhigantabbā jānitabbāti ^b^vadhū^eb^ti vuccati. Gatyatthānaṃ katthaci buddhiyatthakathanato ayamattho labbhateva. ‘‘Suṇhā, suṇisā, vadhū’’ iccete pariyāyā. ^b^Saṅgho^eb^ti bhikkhusamūho. Samaggaṃ kammaṃ samupagacchatīti saṅgho, suṭṭhu vā kilese hanti tena tena maggāsinā māretītipi saṅgho, puthujjanāriyavasena vuttānetāni. Vividhe satte āhanati bhuso ghātetīti ^b^byaggho^eb^. So eva ‘‘viyaggho, vaggho’’ti ca vuccati. Aparampi puṇḍarīkoti tassa nāmaṃ. Dubbale sakuṇe hantīti ^b^sakuṇagghi,^eb^ seno, ayaṃ pana ^b^hana^eb^dhātu ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇe ‘‘paṭihaññatī’’ti akammakaṃ kattupadaṃ janeti. Tathā hi ‘‘buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatī’’tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti.

[03]^b^Ana pāṇane. Pāṇanaṃ^eb^ sasanaṃ. Anati. Ānaṃ, pānaṃ. ‘‘Tattha ^b^āna^eb^nti assāso. ^b^Pāna^eb^nti passāso. Etesu ^b^assāso^eb^ti bahi nikkhamanavāto. ^b^Passāso^eb^ti anto pavisanavāto’’ti ^b^vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ, ^b^suttantaṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ pana uppaṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ. Tattha yasmā sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ mātukucchito nikkhamanakāle paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto bahi nikkhamati, pacchā bāhiravāto sukhumaṃ rajaṃ gahetvā abbhantaraṃ pavisanto tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyati, tasmā ^b^vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘assāsoti bahi nikkhamanavāto, passāsoti anto pavisanavāto’’ti vuttaṃ. Etesu ^a^M0.0116^ea^ dvīsu nayesu vinayanayena anto uṭṭhitasasanaṃ ^b^assāso,^eb^ bahi uṭṭhitasasanaṃ ^b^passāso^eb^. Suttantanayena pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato ^b^assāso^eb^. Anto uṭṭhahitvāpi bahi sasanato ^b^passāso^eb^. Ayameva ca nayo ‘‘assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā’’ti, ‘‘passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā’’ti imāya ^b^pāḷiyā^eb^ sametīti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Dhana dhaññe^eb^. Dhananaṃ ^b^dhaññaṃ,^eb^ siripuññapaññānaṃ sampadāti attho. Dhātuattho hi yebhuyyena bhāvavasena kathiyati ṭhapetvā ^b^vakkarukkhatace^eb^ti evamādippabhedaṃ. Yathā bhāvatthe vattamānena ^b^ya^eb^paccayena saddhiṃ ^b^na^eb^kārassa ^b^yya^eb^kāraṃ katvā thenanaṃ ^b^theyya^eb^nti vuccati, evamidha ^b^ya^eb^paccayena saddhiṃ ^b^na^eb^kārassa ^b^ñña^eb^kāraṃ katvā dhananaṃ ^b^dhañña^eb^nti vuccati. Dhanino vā bhāvo ^b^dhaññaṃ,^eb^ tasmiṃ dhaññe. Dhanti, dhanati. Dhanitaṃ. Dhaññaṃ. Yasmā pana ^b^dhañña^eb^saddena siripuññapaññāsampadā gahitā, tasmā ‘‘dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampannaṃ puttaṃ vijāyī’’tiādīsu ^b^dhañña^eb^saddena siripaññāva gahetabbā puññassa visuṃ vacanato.
[22]Ye te dakkhanti vadanaṃ, dhaññā te narapuṅgava.

[07]Evamādīsu ^a^M0.0117^ea^ pana ^b^dhañña^eb^saddena puññasampadā gahetabbā, puññasampadāya vā saddhiṃ siripaññāsampadāpi gahetabbā. Idamettha nibbacanaṃ ‘‘dhaññaṃ siripuññapaññāsampadā etesaṃ atthīti ^b^dhaññā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Dhaññaṃ maṅgalasammata’’nti ettha tu ‘‘uttamaratanaṃ ida’’nti dhanāyitabbaṃ saddhāyitabbanti ^b^dhaññaṃ,^eb^ sirisampannaṃ puññasampannaṃ paññāsampannantipi attho yujjati. ‘‘Dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpa’’nti ca ādīsu ‘‘natthi dhaññasamaṃ dhana’’nti vacanato dhanāyitabbanti ^b^dhaññaṃ,^eb^ kiṃ taṃ? Pubbaṇṇaṃ. Apica osadhivisesopi ^b^dhañña^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^Dhana^eb^saddassa ca pana samāsavasena ‘‘adhano, niddhano’’ti ca natthi dhanaṃ etassāti atthena daliddapuggalo vuccati. ‘‘Nidhanaṃ yātī’’tiettha tu kampanatthavācakassa ^b^dhū^eb^dhātussa vasena vināso ^b^nidhana^eb^nti vuccatīti.
[03]^b^Cine maññanāyaṃ^eb^. Aluttantoyaṃ dhātu, yathā gile, yathā ca mile. Cināyati, ocināyati. ‘‘Sabbo taṃ jano ocināyatū’’ti idamettha pāḷi nidassanaṃ. ^b^Ocināyata^eb^ti avamaññatūti.
[03]^b^Pā pāne. Pānaṃ^eb^ pivanaṃ. ‘‘Pāti, pānti. Pātu, pāntu’’ iccādi yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
[21]Khippaṃ gīvaṃ pasārehi, na te dassāmi jīvitaṃ;

[03]Atra ^a^M0.0118^ea^ hi ^b^pāssatī^eb^ti pivissati. ‘‘Pāssati, pāssanti. Pāssasi, pāssatha. Pāssāmi, pāssāma’’ iccādinā, ‘‘apassā, apassaṃsu’’ iccādinā ca nayena sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ nayaññūhi. Ko hi samattho sabbāni buddhavacanasāgare vicitrāni vippakiṇṇarūpantararatanāni uddharitvā dassetuṃ, tasmā sabbāsupi dhātūsu saṅkhepena gahaṇūpāyamattameva dassitaṃ. Pivati, pivanti. Pivaṃ, pivanto, pivamāno, pivaṃ bhāgirasodakaṃ. Kārite kumāraṃ khīraṃ pāyeti. Muhuttaṃ taṇhāsamanaṃ, khīraṃ tvaṃ pāyito mayā. Kamme pīyati, pītaṃ. ^b^Tu^eb^mādīsu ‘‘pātuṃ, pivituṃ, pitvā, pivitvā, pāyetvā’’ iccādīni yojetabbāni. Aññesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena saddarūpāni evameva yojetabbāni.

[03]^b^Vippo^eb^ti brāhmaṇo. So hi vippeti pūreti visiṭṭhena veduccāraṇādinā attano brāhmaṇakammena lokassa ajjhāsayaṃ attano ca hadaye vedānīti ^b^vippo^eb^ti vuccati. ‘‘Jāto vippakule aha’’nti ettha hi brāhmaṇo ‘‘vippo’’ti vuccati. Tassa kulaṃ ^b^vippakula^eb^nti.
[03]^b^Pū pavane^eb^. Pavati. Putto, puññaṃ. Ettha ^b^putto^eb^ti attano kulaṃ pavati sodhetīti putto. ^b^Kiyā^eb^digaṇaṃ pana patvā ‘‘punātī’’ti vattabbaṃ.

[07]Ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ. ‘‘Puttī, dhītā, duhitā, attajā’’ti iccete pariyāyā. Evaṃ atrajāti itthivācakassa itthiliṅgassa dassanato ^b^suta^eb^saddādīsupi itthiliṅganayo labbhamānālabbhamānavasena upaparikkhitabbo. Tathā hi loke ‘‘vesso, suddo, naro, kiṃpuriso’’ iccādīnaṃ yugaḷabhāvena ‘‘vessī, suddī, nārī, kiṃpurisī’’tiādīni itthivācakāni liṅgāni dissanti. ‘‘Puriso pumā’’ iccādīnaṃ pana yugaḷabhāvena itthivācakāni itthiliṅgāni na dissanti. ^b^Puñña^eb^nti ettha pana attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ. ^b^Kiyādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pana patvā punātīti ^b^puñña^eb^nti vattabbaṃ.
[03]Paraṃ pujjabhavaṃ janetīti ^b^puññaṃ^eb^. Sadā pūjitaṃ vā janetīti ^b^puññaṃ^eb^. Janaṃ attakāraṃ punātīti ^b^puññaṃ^eb^. Asesaṃ apuññaṃ punātīti ^b^puññaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Pe gatiyaṃ^eb^. Peti, penti. Pesi, petha. Idha bhikkhave ekacco assakhaḷuṅko pehīti vutto viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭisakkati, piṭṭhito rathaṃ paṭivatteti. Ummaggaṃ gaṇhāti, ubbaṭumaṃ rathaṃ karoti.

[03]^b^Pe^eb^^a^M0.0120^ea^^b^vuddhiyaṃ^eb^ payati. Pāyo, apāyo. Ettha ^b^apāyo^eb^ti natthi pāyo vuddhi etthāti apāyo. ^b^Aya^eb^dhātuvasenapi attho netabbo, ayato vuddhito, sukhato vā apetoti ^b^apāyo,^eb^ nirayatiracchānayonipettivisayāsurakāyā.
[03]^b^Pe sosane^eb^. Pāyati, payati vā. Nipako. Ettha ^b^nipako^eb^ nipayati visoseti paṭipakkhaṃ, tato vā attānaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako, sampajāno.
[03]Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā.
[03]^b^Gupa gopanajigucchanesu^eb^. Gopati, jigucchati. Jigucchaṃ, jigucchamāno. Jegucchī. Jigucchitvā iccādīni.
[03]^b^Kapu sāmatthiye^eb^. Idaṃ amhākaṃ kappati. Netaṃ amhesu kappati.
[03]^b^Kapa karuṇāyaṃ^eb^. Kapati. Kapaṇo, kāpaññaṃ. Tattha ^b^kapatī^eb^ti karuṇāyati, ^b^kāpañña^eb^nti kapaṇabhāvo.
[03]^b^Vapa bījanikkhepe^eb^. Bījaṃ vapati. Vāpako. Vāpitaṃ dhaññaṃ. Vuttaṃ bījaṃ purisena. Bījaṃ vappati. Vappamaṅgalaṃ.
[03]^b^Supa sayane^eb^. Supati. Sukhaṃ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhare. Sutto puriso, supanaṃ, suttaṃ.
[03]^b^Khipa peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ^eb^ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ. Khepati. Khepako.
[03]^b^Khipa abyattasadde^eb^. Khipati. Khipitasaddo. Yadā ca dhammaṃ desento, khipi lokagganāyako.
[03]^b^Khipa chaḍḍano^eb^. Khipati, ukkhipati, vikkhipati, avakhipati, saṃkhipati. Khittaṃ, ukkhittaṃ, pakkhittaṃ, vikkhittaṃ iccādīni.
[03]^b^Opa niṭṭhubhane. Niṭṭhubhanaṃ^eb^ kheḷapātanaṃ. Opati. Osadhaṃ saṅkharitvā mukhe kheḷaṃ opi.

[03]^b^Nidapi nidampane. Nidampanaṃ^eb^ nāma sassarukkhādīsu vīhisīsaṃ vā varakasīsaṃ vā acchinditvā khuddakasākhaṃ vā abhañjitvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva vā paṇṇamattasseva vā gahaṇaṃ. Puriso vīhisīsaṃ nidampati, rukkhapattaṃ nidampati. Nidampako, nidampitaṃ, nidampituṃ, nidampitvā.
[03]^b^Tapa ubbege. Ubbego^eb^ utrāso bhīrutā. Tapati, uttapati. Ottappaṃ, ottappiyaṃ dhanaṃ.
[03]^b^Tapa dhūpa santāpe^eb^. Tapati. Tapodhanaṃ, ātāpo. Ātāpī. Ātapaṃ. Dhūpati, sandhūpano, kamme tāpiyati. Dhūpiyati. Bhāve tāpanaṃ, tāpo, paritāpo, santāpo. Dhūpanaṃ.

[03]^b^Puppha vikasane^eb^. Akammako cāyaṃ sakammako ca. Pupphati. Pupphaṃ, pupphanaṃ, pupphito, pupphituṃ, pupphitvā. Pupphanti pupphino dumā. Thalajā dakajā pupphā, sabbe pupphanti tāvade. Mañjūsako nāma rukkho yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni, sabbāni pupphati.
[03]^b^Dapha daphi vappha gatiyaṃ^eb^. Daphati. Damphati. Vapphati.
[03]^b^Pabba vabba mabba kabba khabba gabba sabba cabba gatiyaṃ^eb^. Pabbati. Vabbati. Mabbati. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati. Sabbati. Cabbati.
[03]^b^Lubi tubi addane^eb^. Lumbati. Tumbati. Lumbinīvanaṃ. Udakatumbo. Athopi dve ca tumbāni.

[03]^b^Cubi vadanasaṃyoge^eb^. Puttaṃ muddhani cumbati. Mukhe cumbati. Ettha siyā ‘‘yadi vadanasaṃyoge ^b^cubi^eb^dhātu vattati, kathaṃ ^b^ambudharabinducumbitakūṭo^eb^ti ettha avadane aviññāṇake pabbatakūṭe ambudharabindūnaṃ cumbanaṃ vutta’’nti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhavaṃ cetasi ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ, yathā adassanasambhavepi dassanasadisenākārena sambhūtattā ‘‘rodante dārake disvā, ubbiddhā vipulā dumā’’ti acakkhukānampi rukkhānaṃ dassanaṃ vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhūtattā avadanānampi ambudharabindūnaṃ cumbanaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabhāvato pana aviññāṇakānaṃ dassanacumbanādīni ca natthi, saviññāṇakānaṃyeva tāni hontīti. Ayaṃ nayo ^b^kamu padavikkhepe^eb^tiādīsupi netabbo.

[03]^b^Ubbi tubbi thubbi dubbi dhubbi hiṃsatthā^eb^. Ubbati. Tubbati. Thubbati. Dubbati. Dubbā. Dhubbati. Ettha ^b^dubbā^eb^ti dabbatiṇaṃ, yaṃ ‘‘tiriyā nāma tiṇajātī’’ti pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ. Ettha ca ^b^dubbā^eb^ti itthiliṅgaṃ, ^b^dabba^eb^nti napuṃsakaliṅganti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Pubba pabba sabba pūraṇe^eb^. Pubbati. Pabbati. Sabbati. Etta siyā ‘‘nanu bho ^b^pubbasabba^eb^saddā sabbanāmāni, kasmā panete dhātucintāyaṃ gahitā’’ti? Vuccate – sabbanāmesu ca ^b^tu^eb^mantādivirahitesu ca nipātesu upasaggesu ca dhātucintā nāma natthi, imāni pana sabbanāmāni na honti. Kevalaṃ sutisāmaññena sabbanāmāni viya upaṭṭhahanti, tena te tabbhāvamuttattā dhātucintāyaṃ pubbācariyehi gahitā ‘‘pubbati sabbatī’’ti payogadassanatoti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā buddhavacane etāni rūpāni na santīti? Anāgamanabhāvena na santi, na avijjamānabhāvena. Kiñcāpi buddhavacanesu etāni rūpāni na santi, tathāpi porāṇehi anumatā purāṇabhāsāti gahetabbāni, yathā ‘‘nāthatīti nātho’’ti ettha ‘‘nāthatī’’ti rūpaṃ buddhavacane avijjamānampi gahetabbaṃ hoti, evaṃ imānipi. Tasmā vohāresu viññūnaṃ kosallatthāya sāsane avijjamānāpi sāsanānurūpā lokikappayogā gahetabbāti ‘‘pubbati sabbatī’’ti rūpāni gahitāni. Esa nayo aññesupi ṭhānesu veditabbo.
[03]^b^Kabba khabba gabba dabbe. Dabbo^eb^ ahaṅkāro. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati.
[03]^b^Abi dabi sadde^eb^. Ambati. Ambā, ambu. Dambati.

[03]^b^Labi avasaṃsane. Avasaṃsanaṃ^eb^ avalambanaṃ. Lambati, vilambati, byālambati. Nīce co’lambate sūriyo. Ālambati ^a^M0.0125^ea^. Ālambanaṃ, tadālambanaṃ, tadālambaṇaṃ, tadālambaṃ vā. Lābu. Alābu vā, ^b^a^eb^kāro hi tabbhāve.
[03]^b^Bhā dittiyaṃ^eb^. Cando bhāti, pañhā maṃ paṭibhāti. Ratti vibhāti. Bhāṇu, paṭibhānaṃ. Vibhātā ratti.
[03]^b^Bhī bhaye^eb^. Bhāyati. Bhayaṃ, bhayānako, bhīmo, bhīmaseno, bhīru, bhīruko, bhīrukajātiko. Kārite ‘‘bhāyeti, bhāyayati, bhāyāpeti, bhāyāpayatī’’ti rūpāni.
[03]^b^Sumbha bhāsane ca. Ca^eb^kāro hiṃsāpekkhako. Sumbhati. Sumbho. Kusumbho.
[03]Ettha ^b^sumbho^eb^ti āvāṭo. ‘‘Sumbhaṃ nikkhanāhī’’ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. ^b^Kusumbho^eb^ti khuddakaāvāṭo, ‘‘pabbatakandarapadarasākhāparipūrā kusumbhe paripūrentī’’ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
[03]^b^Abbha vabbha mabbha gatiyaṃ^eb^. Abbhati. Abbho. Vabbhati. Mabbhati.

[03]Ettha ^b^abbho^eb^ti megho. So hi abbhati anekasatapaṭalo hutvā gacchatīti ‘‘abbho’’ti vuccati. ‘‘Vijjumālī satakkakū’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Satakkakū^eb^ti ca anekasatapaṭalo. Ettha ca ^b^abbha^eb^saddo tiliṅgiko daṭṭhabbo. Tathā ^a^M0.0126^ea^ hi ayaṃ ‘‘abbhuṭṭhitova sa yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī’’ti ettha pulliṅgo. ‘‘Abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo, rāhū’’ti ettha itthiliṅgo. ‘‘Abbhāni candamaṇḍalaṃ chādentī’’ti ettha napuṃsakaliṅgo.
[03]^b^Yabha methune^eb^. Mithunassa janadvayassa idaṃ kammaṃ ^b^methūnaṃ,^eb^ tasmiṃ methune ^b^yabha^eb^dhātu vattati. Yabhati. Yābhassaṃ.

[03]Ettha ca ‘‘methuna’’nti esā sabbhivācā, lajjāsampannehi puggalehi vattabbabhāsābhāvato. Tathā hi ‘‘methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo’’ti ca ‘‘na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti methuno’’ti ca sobhane vācāvisaye ayaṃ bhāsā āgatā. ‘‘Yabhatī’’tiādikā pana bhāsā ‘‘sikharaṇī’’tiādikā bhāsā viya asambhivācā. Na hi hirottappasampanno lokiyajanopi īdisiṃ vācaṃ bhāsati. Evaṃ santepi adhimattukkaṃsagatahirottappopi bhagavā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditahadayo lokānukampāya parisamajjhe abhāsi. Aho tathāgatassa mahākaruṇāti.
[03]^b^Debha^eb^^a^M0.0127^ea^^b^abhi dabhi sadde^eb^. Debhati. Ambhati. Ambho. Dambhati.
[03]Ettha ca ^b^ambho^eb^ vuccati udakaṃ. Tañhi nijjīvampi samānaṃ oghakālādīsu vissandamānaṃ ambhati saddaṃ karotīti ^b^ambho^eb^ti vuccati.
[21]Pānīyaṃ udakaṃ toyaṃ, jalaṃ pāto ca ambu ca;
[22]Dakaṃ kaṃ salilaṃ vāri, āpo ambho papampi ca.
[03]Ettha ca ‘‘vālaggesu ca kepuke. Pivitañca tesaṃ bhusaṃ hoti pānī’’tiādayo payogā dassetabbā.
[03]^b^Thabhi khabhi paṭibaddhe^eb^ thambhati, vitthambhati. Khambhati, vikkhambhati. Thambho. Thaddho, upatthambho. Upatthambhinī. Vikkhambho. Vikkhambhitakileso.
[03]^b^Jabha jabhi gattavināme^eb^. Jabhati. Jambhati, vijambhati. Vijambhanaṃ, vijambhitā. Vijambhanto, vijambhamāno, vijambhito.

[03]Ettha ^b^gabbho^eb^ti mātukucchipi vuccati kucchigataputtopi. Tathā hi ‘‘yamekarattiṃ paṭhamaṃ, gabbhe vasati māṇavo’’ti ettha mātukucchi ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuccati. ‘‘Gabbho me deva patiṭṭhito. Gabbho ca patito chamā’’ti ca ettha pana kucchigataputto. Apica ^b^gabbho^eb^ti āvāsaviseso. ‘‘Gabbhaṃ ^a^M0.0128^ea^ paviṭṭho’’tiādīsu hi ovarako ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuccati.
[03]^b^Rabha rābhasse. Ā^eb^pubbo ^b^rabha hiṃsākaraṇavāyamanesu. Rābhassaṃ^eb^ rābhasabhāvo. Taṃsamaṅgino pana pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘caṇḍā ruddhā rabhasā’’ti evaṃ āgatā.

[03]Tattha ^b^rabhasā^eb^ti karaṇuttariyā. Rabhati, ārabhati, samārabhati, ārambhati. Rabhaso. Ārambho. Samārambho, ārabhanto. Samārabhanto. Āraddhaṃ me vīriyaṃ. Sārambhaṃ. Anārambhaṃ. Sārambho te na vijjati. Pakāraṇārambho. Vīriyārambho. Ārabhituṃ. Ārabhitvā. Ārabbha.
[03]Ettha ^b^vīriyārambho^eb^ti vīriyasaṅkhāto ārambho. ^b^Ārambha^eb^saddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kriyāya vīriye hiṃsāya vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.

[07]Ettha hi kammaṃ ārambhoti āgataṃ. ‘‘Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī’’ti ettha āpatti. ‘‘Mahāyaññā mahārambhā, na te honti mahapphallā’’ti ettha yūpussāpanādikriyā. ‘‘Ārambhatha nikkamatha, yuñjatha buddhasāsane’’ti ettha vīriyaṃ. ‘‘Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārambhantī’’ti ettha hiṃsā. ‘‘Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī’’ti ettha chedanabhañjanādikaṃ vikopanaṃ. Iccevaṃ –
[03]^b^Labha lābhe^eb^. Labhati, labbhati. Lābho, laddhaṃ, alattha, alatthuṃ.
[03]^b^Khubha sañcalane^eb^. Khobhati, saṅkhobhati. Hatthināge padinnamhi, khubbhittha nagaraṃ tadā. Khobhā, saṅkhobho.

[03]^b^Lubha vimohane^eb^. Lobhati, palobhati. Thullakumārīpalobhanaṃ. Kārite pana ‘‘lobheti, palobheti, palobhetvā’’ti rūpāni bhavanti. ^b^Divādi^eb^gaṇaṃ pana patvā giddhiyatthe ‘‘lubbhatī’’ti rūpaṃ bhavati.
[03]^b^Ubha ubbha umbha pūraṇe^eb^. Ubhati. Ubbhati. Umbhati. Ubhanā. Ubbhanā. Umbhanā. Obho. Keṭubhaṃ. Ubbhaṃ. Kumbho. Kumbhī. Kārite ‘‘obheti. Ubbheti. Umbhetī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.

[03]Tattha ^b^keṭubha^eb^nti kriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakāriyasatthaṃ. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ kiṭeti gameti kriyādivibhāgaṃ, taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato keṭento gamento obheti pūretīti keṭutaṃ ^b^kiṭaubha^eb^dhātuvasena. Ubbhati ubbheti ^a^M0.0130^ea^ pūretīti ^b^ubbhaṃ,^eb^ pūraṇanti attho. ^b^Cariyāpiṭakepi^eb^ hi īdisī saddagati dissati, taṃ yathā? ‘‘Mahādānaṃ pavattesi, accubbhaṃ sāgarūpama’’nti. Tattha ca ^b^accubbha^eb^nti ativiya yācakānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pūraṇaṃ. ^b^Akkhumbha^eb^ntipi pāṭho. ^b^Kumbho^eb^ti kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena ubbhetabboti kumbho, so eva itthiliṅgavasena kumbhī. Ettha ca ‘‘kumbhī dhovati onato’’ti payogo.
[03]^b^Mā māne sadde ca^eb^. Māti. Mātā. Ettha ^b^mātā^eb^ti janikā vā cūḷamātā vā mahāmātā vā.

[03]Ettha ^b^medhā^eb^ti paññā. Sā hi sukhumampi atthaṃ dhammañca khippameva meti ca dhāreti cāti medhāti vuccati. Ettha pana ^b^metī^eb^ti gaṇhāti. Tathā hi ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā, khippaṃ gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā’’ti. Saṅgamatthavācakassa pana ^b^medha^eb^dhātussa vasena medhati sīlasamādhiādīhi saddhammehi siriyā ca saṅgacchatīti ^b^medhā^eb^ti attho gahetabbo. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
[03]^b^Omā sāmatthiye. Sāmatthiyaṃ^eb^ samatthabhāvo. Aluttantoyaṃ dhātu, omāti, omanti.
[03]Atrāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘omāti bhante bhagavā iddhiyā manomayena kāyena brahmalokaṃ upasaṅkamitu’’nti. Tattha ^b^omātī^eb^ti pahoti sakkoti.
[03]^b^Timu addabhāve. Addabhāvo^eb^ tintabhāvo. Temati. Tinto, temiyo. Temitukāmā temiṃsu.
[03]Ettha ^b^temiyo^eb^ti evaṃnāmako kāsirañño putto bodhisatto. So hi rañño ceva mahājanassa ca hadayaṃ temento addabhāvaṃ pāpento sītalabhāvaṃ janento jātoti ‘‘temiyo’’ti vuccati.
[03]^b^Camu chamu japu jhamu umu jimu adane^eb^. Camati. Camū. ^b^Camū^eb^ti senā. Chamati. Jamati. Jhamati. Umati. Jemati.

[03]^b^Kamu padavikkhepe. Padavikkhepo^eb^ padasā gamanaṃ. Idaṃ pana vohārasīsamattaṃ vacanaṃ, tasmā ‘‘nāssa kāye aggi vā visaṃ vā satthaṃ vā kamatī’’tiādīsu apadavikkhepatthopi gahetabbo. Kamati. Caṅkamati, atikkamati. Abhikkamati. Paṭikkamati. Pakkamati. Parakkamati. Vikkamati. Nikkamati. Saṅkamati. Saṅkamanaṃ. Saṅkanti. Kamanaṃ. Caṅkamanaṃ. Atikkamo. Abhikkamo. Paṭikkamo. Pakkamo. Vikkamo. Nikkamo. Atikkanto puriso. Abhikkantā ratti. Nikkhamati. Abhinikkhamati. Kārite ^a^M0.0132^ea^ nikkhāmeti. Aññānipi yojetabbāni. Yasmā panāyaṃ dhātu ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇaṃ patvā icchākanti yatthesu vattati, tasmā tepi atthe upasaggavisesite katvā idha ^b^abhikkanta^eb^saddassa atthuddhāraṃ vattabbampi avatvā upari ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇeyeva kathessāma.
[03]^b^Yamu uparame. Uparamo^eb^ viramanaṃ. Yamabhi. Yamo. ‘‘Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase’’ti idamettha nidassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^yamāmase^eb^ti uparamāma, nassāma, marāmāti attho.
[03]^b^Nama bahutte sadde. Bahutto saddo^eb^ nāma uggatasaddo. Namati.
[03]^b^Ama dama hamma mima chama gatimhi^eb^. Amati. Damati. Hammati. Mimati. Chamati. Chamā.

[03]^b^Chamā^eb^ti pathavī. ^b^Chamā^eb^saddo itthiliṅgo daṭṭhabbo, ‘‘na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā’’ti ca ‘‘chamāyaṃ parivattāmi vāricarova ghamme’’ti ca payogadassanato. So ca kho sattahi aṭṭhahi vā vibhattīhi dvīsu ca vacanesu yojetabbo. Chamanti gacchanti etthāti chamā.

[03]^b^Dhama saddaggisaṃ yogesu. Dhama^eb^dhātu sadde ca mukhavātena saddhiṃ aggisaṃyoge ca vattati. Tattha paṭhamatthe ‘‘saṅkhaṃ dhamati. Saṅkhadhamako. Bheriṃ dhamati. Bheridhamako. Dhame dhame nātidhame’’ti payogo. Dutiyatthe ‘‘aggiṃ dhamati. Samuṭṭhāpeti attānaṃ, aṇuṃ aggiṃva sandhama’’nti payogo.

[03]^b^Namu^eb^^a^M0.0133^ea^^b^namane^eb^. Namati. Namo. Nataṃ, namanaṃ. Nati. Namaṃ. Namamāno. Namanto. Namito. Nāmaṃ. Nāmitaṃ. Namituṃ. Natvā, natvāna. Namitvā, namitvāna, namituna. Kārite ‘‘nāmeti, nāmayati. Nāmetvā. Nāmayitvā’’ti rūpāni bhavanti. Tatra hi ‘‘namati namitvā’’ti evaṃpakārāni padāni namanatthe vandanāyañca daṭṭhabbāni, ‘‘namo natvā’’ti evaṃpakārāni pana vandanāyameva. Atrāyamupalakkhaṇamattā payogaracanā –

[03]Ettha ^b^namo^eb^ti padaṃ nipātesupi labbhati. Tena hi paccattopayogavacanāni abhinnarūpāni dissanti ‘‘devarāja namo tyatthu. Namo katvā mahesino’’ti. Upasaggehipi ayaṃ yojetabbā ‘‘paṇamati, paṇāmo, uṇṇamati, uṇṇati’’ iccādinā.
[03]^b^Khamu sahane^eb^. Khamati. Khanti. Khamo, khamanaṃ, evaṃ bhāve. Kattari pana ‘‘khantā. Khamitā. Khamo hoti sītassapi uṇhassapī’’ti payogā.
[03]^b^Gamu^eb^^a^M0.0134^ea^^b^gatiyaṃ^eb^. Gacchati. Gamako. Gato. Gati. Gamanaṃ. Kārite ‘‘gameti, gamayati, gacchāpetī’’tiādīni bhavanti.
[03]^b^Ramu kīḷāyaṃ^eb^. Ramati. Viramati. Paṭiviramati. Uparamati. Ārati. Virati. Paṭivirati. Uparati. Veramaṇi. Viramaṇaṃ. Rati. Ramaṇaṃ. Rato. Ārato virato paṭivirato. Uparato, uparamo. Ārāmo.

[03]Tattha ^b^vammiko^eb^ti vamatīti, vantakoti, vantussayoti, vantasinehasambandhoti vammiko. So hi ahinakulaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko. Upacikāhi vantakoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena ukkhittapaṃsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṃ deve vassantepi na vippakirayati, nidāghepi tato paṃsumuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ muṭṭhinā pīḷiyamāne sinehova nikkhamati, evaṃ vantasinehasambandhoti vammiko.

[03]Ettha pana ‘‘bhagavā, himavā’’tiādīni padāni na kevalaṃ ^b^vantu^eb^paccayavaseneva nipphādetabbāni, atha kho ^b^vamu^eb^dhātuvasenapi nipphādetabbāni, tenāha ^b^visuddhimaggakārako^eb^ ‘‘yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ, tasmā ‘‘bhavesu vantagamano’ti vattabbe ^b^bhava^eb^saddato ^b^bha^eb^kāraṃ, ^b^gamana^eb^saddato ^b^ga^eb^kāraṃ, ^b^vanta^eb^saddato ^b^va^eb^kārañca dīghaṃ katvā ādāya ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti vuccati, yathā loke ‘mehanassa ^a^M0.0135^ea^ khassa mālā’ti vattabbe mekhalā’’ti vadatā niruttinayena saddasiddhi dassitā.

[03]Ettha, siyā ‘‘visamamidaṃ nidassanaṃ, yena ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti ettha ^b^me^eb^kāra^b^kha^eb^kāra^b^lā^eb^kārānaṃ kamato gahaṇaṃ dissati, ‘‘bhavesu vantagamano’ti ettha pana ^b^bha^eb^kāra^b^va^eb^kāra^b^ga^eb^kārānaṃ kamato gahaṇaṃ na dissatī’’ti? Saccaṃ, idha pana ‘‘aggāhito, vijjācaraṇasampanno’’tiādīsu viya guṇasaddassa paranipātavasena ‘‘bhavesu gamanavanto’’ti vattabbepi evamavatvā saddasatthe yebhuyyena guṇasaddānaṃ pubbanipātabhvassa icchitattā saddasatthavidūnaṃ kesañca viññūnaṃ manaṃ tosetuṃ ‘‘bhagavā’’ti pade akkharakkamaṃ anapekkhitvā atthamattanidassanavasena ‘‘āhitaggi, sampannavijjācaraṇo’’tiādīni viya pubbanipātavasena ‘‘bhavesu vantagamano’’ti vuttaṃ. Īdisasmiñhi ṭhāne ‘‘āhitaggī’’ti vā ‘‘aggāhito’’ti vā ‘‘chinnahattho’’ti vā ‘‘hatthacchinno’’ti vā padesu yathā tathā ṭhitesupi atthassa ayutti nāma natthi aññamaññaṃ samānatthattā tesaṃ saddānaṃ.

[03]^b^Vedajāto^eb^tiādīsu pana ṭhānesu atthevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ visuddhimagge ‘‘bhagavā’’ti padassa ^b^vamu^eb^dhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā, ^b^taṭṭīkāyampi^eb^ ca dassitā ‘‘bhage vamīti bhagavā. Bhāge vamīti bhagavā’’ti. Nibbacanaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ – bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti ^b^bhagavā^eb^. Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā, sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanalokā, visesasannissayasobhākappaṭṭhiyabhāvato. Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsisattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti ^b^bhagavā^eb^.

[03]Tathā khandhāyatanadhātādibhede dhammakoṭṭhāse sabbaṃ papañca sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvamīti ^b^bhagavā^eb^. Atha vā sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnappaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho pariccaji pajahīti ^b^bhagavā^eb^.

[03]^b^Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^himavā^eb^ti padassa ^b^vamu^eb^dhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā. Tathā hi ^b^sambhavajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘himavā^eb^ti himapātasamaye himayuttoti himavā. Gimhakāle himaṃ vamatīti himavā’’ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘himavā’’ti padassa ^b^vamu^eb^dhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā, ayaṃ nayo īdisesu ṭhānesupi netabbo. ‘‘Guṇavāgaṇavā’’tiādīsu pana na netabbo. Yadi nayeyya, ‘‘guṇavā gaṇavā’’ti padānaṃ ‘‘nigguṇo parihīnaguṇo’’ti evamādiattho bhaveyya, tasmā ayaṃ nayo sabbatthapi na netabbo. Ettha siyā ‘‘yadi ‘‘bhagavā’tiādipadānaṃ ^b^vamu^eb^dhātuvasena nipphatti hoti, kathaṃ ‘‘bhagavanto, bhagavanta’’ntiādīni sijjhantī’’ti? Yathā ‘‘bhagavā’’ti padaṃ niruttinayena sijjhati, tathā tānipi teneva sijjhanti. Acinteyyo hi niruttinayo kevalaṃ atthayuttipaṭibandhamattova, atthayuttiyaṃ sati nipphādetumasakkuṇeyyānipi rūpāni aneneva sijjhanti. Ettha ca ^a^M0.0137^ea^ yaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ āharitvā dassetabbaṃ siyā, taṃ upari rūpanipphādanādhikāre udāharaṇehi saddhiṃ pakāsessāma.

[03]^b^Yā gatipāpuṇesu^eb^. Yāti, yanti. Yātu, yantu. Yeyya, yeyyuṃ, anupariyeyyuṃ. Yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā yojetabbā. Yanto puriso. Yantī itthī. Yantaṃ kulaṃ. Yānaṃ, upayānaṃ, uyyānaṃ iccādīni. ^b^Divādi^eb^gaṇikassa panassa ‘‘yāyati, yāyantī’’tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti.

[03]Tatra ^b^yāna^eb^ntiādīsu yanti etenāti yānaṃ, rathasakaṭādi. Upayanti etena issarassa vā piyamanāpassa vā santikaṃ gacchantīti ^b^upayānaṃ,^eb^ paṇṇākāraṃ. ‘‘Upayānāni me dajjuṃ, rājaputta tayi gate’’ti ettha hi paṇṇākārāni ‘‘upayānānī’’ti ^a^M0.0138^ea^ vuccanti. Sampannadassanīyapupphaphalāditāya uddhaṃ olokentā yanti gacchanti etthāti ^b^uyyānaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Byā ummīsane^eb^. Byāti, byanti. Byāsi, byātha. Byāmi, byāma. Yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā yojetabbā. Tatra panāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘yāva byāti nimmīsati, tatrāpi rasatibbayo’’ti. Tattha ^b^yāva byātī^eb^ti yāva ummīsati, purāṇabhāsā esā, ayañhi yasmiṃ kāle bodhisatto cūḷabodhiparibbājako ahosi, tasmiṃ kāle manussānaṃ vohāro.
[03]^b^Yu missane gatiyañca^eb^. Yoti, yavati. Āyu, yoni.

[03]Tattha ‘‘āyū’’ti ^b^ā^eb^saddo upasaggo. Āyavanti missībhavanti sattā etenāti ^b^āyu^eb^. Atha vā āyavanti āgacchanti pavattanti tasmiṃ sati arūpadhammāti ^b^āyu^eb^. Tathā hi ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘āyavanaṭṭhena āyu. Tasmiñhi sati arūpadhammā āyavanti āgacchanti pavattanti, tasmā ^b^āyū^eb^ti vuccatī’’ti. ‘‘Āyu, jīvitaṃ, pāṇo’’ iccete pariyāyā lokavohāravasena. Abhidhammavasena pana ‘‘ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā jīvitindriyaṃ’’ iccetepi teheva saddhiṃ pariyāyā. ^b^Yonī^eb^ti aṇḍajādīnaṃ aṇḍajādīhi saddhiṃ yāya missībhāvo hoti, sā yoni. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ ‘‘yavanti ettha sattā ekajātisamanvayena aññamaññaṃ missakā hontīti ^b^yoni’’^eb^ iti. Ettha ca ^b^yoni^eb^saddassa atthuddhāro nīyate. ^b^Yonī^eb^ti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi nāmaṃ. ‘‘Catasso nāgayoniyo. Catasso supaṇṇayoniyo’’ti ettha hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāma. ‘‘Yoni ^a^M0.0139^ea^ hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā’’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ. ‘‘Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhava’’nti ettha passāvamaggo. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
[03]Ettha ^b^sahabyo^eb^ti saha byeti saha pavattatīti sahabyo, sahāyo, ekabhavūpago vā. Tathā hi ‘‘tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapanno’’tiādīsu ekabhavūpago ‘‘sahabyo’’ti vuccati.
[03]^b^Haya gatiyaṃ^eb^. Hayati. Hayo. ^b^Hayo^eb^ti asso. So hi hayati sīghaṃ gacchatīti hayoti vuccati. Imāni panassa nāmāni –
[21]Asso turaṅgo turago, vājī vāho hayopi ca;

[03]^b^Aya vaya paya maya taya caya raya gatiyaṃ^eb^. Ayati. Vayati. Payati. Mayati. Tayati. Cayati. Rayati. Ayo, samayo, vayo, payo, rayo. ^b^Mayatayacaya^eb^dhātūnaṃ nāmikapadāni upaparikkhitabbāni.

[03]Tattha ^a^M0.0140^ea^^b^ayo^eb^ti kāḷalohaṃ, ayati nānākammārakiccesu upayogaṃ gacchatīti ayo. ^b^Vayo^eb^ti paṭhamavayādiāyukoṭṭhāso, vayati parihāniṃ gacchatīti vayo. ^b^Payo^eb^ti khīrassapi udakassapi nāmaṃ, payati janena pātabbabhāvaṃ gacchatīti payo. ^b^Rayo^eb^ti vego, yo ‘‘javo’’tipi vuccati, tasmā rayanaṃ javanaṃ rayo. Ettha ^b^samaya^eb^saddassa atthuddhāro vuccate aha nibbacanena. ^b^Samaya^eb^saddo –

[03]Tathā hi ‘‘appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā’’ti evamādīsu samavāyo attho. ‘‘Ekova kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā’’tiādīsu khaṇo. ‘‘Uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo’’tiādīsu kālo. ‘‘Mahāsamayo pavanasmi’’ntiādīsu samūho. ‘‘Samayopi kho te bhaddāli appaṭividdho ahosī’’tiādīsu hetu. ‘‘Tena samayena uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme paṭivasatī’’tiādīsu diṭṭhi.
[21]‘‘Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;

[07]Ādīsu ^a^M0.0141^ea^ paṭilābho. ‘‘Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā’’tiādīsu pahānaṃ. ‘‘Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho’’tiādīsu paṭivedho. Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako ^b^samaya^eb^saddo evāti ^b^samaya^eb^saddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo ^b^abhisamaya^eb^saddo vutto.

[03]Tattha sahakārīkāraṇatāya sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti ^b^samayo,^eb^ samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyaṃ ettha tadādhārapuggaloti ^b^samayo,^eb^ khaṇo. Samenti ettha, etena vā saṅgacchanti dhammā sahajātadhammehi uppādādīhi vāti ^b^samayo,^eb^ kālo. Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena vohariyatīti. Samaṃ, saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti ^b^samayo,^eb^ samūho, yathā ‘‘samudāyo’’ti. Avayavasahāvaṭṭhānameva hi samūho. Paccayantarasamāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti ^b^samayo,^eb^ hetu, yathā ‘‘samudayo’’ti. Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandhā eti attano visaye pavattati, daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti ^b^samayo,^eb^ diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhanti. Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti ^b^samayo,^eb^ paṭilābho. Samassa nirodhassa yānaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo appavattīti ^b^samayo,^eb^ pahānaṃ. Ñāṇena abhimukhaṃ sammā etabbo adhigantabboti ^b^samayo,^eb^ dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo, abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti ^b^samayo^eb^. Yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe ^b^samaya^eb^saddassa pavatti veditabbā.

[03]Nanu ^a^M0.0142^ea^ ca atthamattaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantīti na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyantīti? Saccametaṃ saddavisese apekkhite. Saddavisese hi apekkhamāne ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati. Na hi yo kālattho ^b^samaya^eb^saddo, soyeva samūhādiatthaṃ vadati. Ettha pana tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ ^b^samaya^eb^ saddavacanīyatā sāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā ^b^samaya^eb^saddassa vuttā. Evaṃ sabbattha atthuddhāre adhippāyo veditabbo.
[03]^b^Naya rakkhaṇe ca. Ca^eb^kāro gatipekkhako. Nayati. Nayo. ^b^Nayo^eb^ti nayanaṃ gamananti nayo, pāḷigati. Nayanti vā rakkhanti atthaṃ etenāti ^b^nayo,^eb^ tathattanayādi.

[03]^b^Dayā^eb^ti mettāpi vuccati karuṇāpi. ‘‘Dayāpanno’’ti ettha hi mettā ‘‘dayā’’ti, mettacittataṃ āpannoti hi attho. ‘‘Adayāpanno’’ti ettha pana karuṇā ‘‘dayā’’ti vuccati. Nikkaruṇataṃ āpannoti hi attho. Evaṃ ^b^dayā^eb^saddassa mettākaruṇāsu pavatti veditabbā. Tathā hi ^b^abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dayā^eb^saddo yattha yattha pavattati, tattha tattha adhippāyavasena yojetabbo. ^b^Dayā^eb^saddo hi anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya ca karuṇāya ca pavattatī’’ti.

[03]Vacanattho panettha evaṃ veditabbo – dayati dadāti sattānaṃ abhayaṃ etāyāti ^b^dayā^eb^. Dayati gacchati vibhāgaṃ akatvā ^a^M0.0143^ea^ pāpakalyāṇajanesu samaṃ vattati, sītena samaṃ pharantaṃ rajomalañca pavāhentaṃ udakamivātipi ^b^dayā,^eb^ mettā. Dayati vā hiṃsati kāruṇikaṃ yāva yathādhippetaṃ parassa hitanipphattiṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāvāti ^b^dayā^eb^. Dayati anuggaṇhāti pāpajanampi sajjano etāyātipi ^b^dayā^eb^. Dayati attano sukhampi pahāya khedaṃ gaṇhāti sajjano etāyāti ^b^dayā^eb^. Dayanti gaṇhanti etāya mahābodhisattā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhārakaraṇakāle hatthagatampi arahattaphalaṃ chaḍḍetvā saṃsārasāgarato satte samuddharitukāmā anassāsakaraṃ atibhayānakaṃ mahantaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ, pacchimabhave ca saha amatadhātupaṭilābhena anekaguṇasamalaṅkataṃ sabbaññutaññāṇañcātipi ^b^dayā,^eb^ karuṇā. Karuṇāmūlakā hi sabbe buddhaguṇā.

[03]Aparo nayo – dayanti anurakkhanti satte etāya, sayaṃ vā anudayati, anudayamattameva vā etanti ^b^dayā,^eb^ mettā ceva karuṇā ca. Kiñci payogamettha kathayāma ‘‘seyyathāpi gahapati gijjho vā kaṅko vā kulalo vā maṃsapesiṃ ādāya dayeyya. Puttesu maddī dayesi, sassuyā sasuramhi ca. Dayitabbo rathesabha’’. Tattha ^b^dayeyyā^eb^ti uppatitvā gaccheyya, gatyatthavasenetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Dayesī^eb^ti mettacittaṃ kareyyāsi. ^b^Dayitabbo^eb^ti piyāyitabbo. Ubhayampetaṃ vivaraṇaṃ rakkhaṇatthaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā adhippāyatthavasena katanti veditabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Pūyī visaraṇe duggandhe ca^eb^. Pūyati. Pūto, pūtavā. Pūtimacchaṃ kusaggena, yo naro upanayhati.

[03]Tattha ^b^tatavantu^eb^paccayā, ^b^ya^eb^kāralopo, dhātvantassa sarassa ^b^i^eb^kārādeso ca daṭṭhabbo. Esa nayo ‘‘pūto pūtavā’’tiādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ daṭṭhabbo. Pāyati. Pāyo. Apāyo. Ettha ca natthi pāyo vuddhi etthāti ^b^apāyo^eb^. Atha vā pana ayato sukhato apetoti ^b^apāyo^eb^tipi nibbacanīyaṃ. ^b^Apāyo^eb^ti ca nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asurakāyoti cattāro apāyā.

[03]^b^Tāyu santānapālanesu^eb^. Tāyati. Tāyanaṃ. ^b^Divādi^eb^gaṇe pana ^b^tā pālane^eb^ti dhātuṃ passatha, tassa ‘‘tāyati tāṇa’’nti rūpāni. Ubhayesaṃ kriyāpadaṃ samaṃ. ^b^A^eb^kāra^b^ya^eb^kārapaccayamatteneva nānattaṃ, nāmikapadāni pana visadisāni ‘‘tāyanaṃ, tāṇa’’nti.

[03]^b^Cāyu pūjānisāmanesu. Pūjā^eb^ pūjanā. ^b^Nisāmanaṃ^eb^ olokanaṃ savanañca vuccati. ‘‘Iṅgha maddi nisāmehi. Nisāmayatha sādhavo’’ti ca ādīsu hi olokanasavanāni ^b^nisāmana^eb^saddena vuttāni. Apica ñāṇena upaparikkhaṇampi nisāmanamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Cāyati, apacāyati. Anagāre pabbajite, apace brahmacāriye. Ye vuddhamapacāyanti. Apacitiṃ dasseti. Niccaṃ vuddhāpacāyino.
[03]^b^Ru sadde^eb^. Roti, ravati. Ravo, uparavo. Rutamanuññaṃ ruciyā ca piṭṭhi. ^b^Ruta^eb^nti ravanaṃ rutaṃ, saddo.
[03]^b^Re sadde^eb^. Rāyati. Rā. Ratti. Ettha ca ^b^rā^eb^ti saddo. ^b^Rattī^eb^ti nisāsaṅkhāto sattānaṃ saddassa vūpasamakālo. Rā tiyyati ucchijjati etthāti ^b^ratti^eb^.
[03]^b^Brū viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ^eb^. Api hantvā hato brūti.
[03]Bravīti, brunti. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūte, bruvante. Brūse, bruvhe. Bruve, brumhe.
[03]Brūtu, bruvitu, bruvantu. Brūhi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūtaṃ, bruvantaṃ.
[03]Ettha ca ^b^ambaṭṭhasutte^eb^ ‘‘puna bhavaṃ gotamo bruvitū’’ti pāḷidassanato ‘‘bruvitū’’ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sabbatthāpi upaparikkhitvā nayo gahetabbo.
[03]Bruveyya, bruve, bruveyyuṃ. Bruveyyāsi, bruveyyātha. Bruveyyāmi, bruveyyāma. Bruvetha, bruveraṃ. Bruvetho, bruveyyāvho. Bruveyyaṃ. Bruveyyāmhe.
[03]Pabrūti. Anubrūti. Pabrūtu, anubrūtu. Pabruveyya, anubruveyya. Evaṃ sabbattha ^b^pānu^eb^upasaggehipi yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā yojetabbā.
[03]Āha, āhu. Brave, bravittha, bravire. Bravittho, bravivho. Braviṃ, bravimhe. Parokkhāvasena vuttāni.
[03]Abravā ^a^M0.0146^ea^, abravū. Abravo, abravattha. Abravaṃ, abravamhā. Abravattha, abravatthuṃ. Abravase, abravhaṃ. Abraviṃ, abravimhase. Hiyyattanīvasena vuttāni.
[03]Abravi, abravuṃ. Abravo, abravittha. Abraviṃ, abravimhā. Abravā, abravū. Abravase, abravivhaṃ. Abravaṃ, abravimhe. Ajjatanīvasena vuttāni.
[03]Bruvissati, bruvissanti. Abravissā, abravissaṃsu. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ netabbaṃ. Kammapadaṃ appasiddhaṃ. Sace pana siyā, ‘‘brūyatī’’ti siyā ‘‘luyati, lūyatī’’ti padāni viya.
[03]^b^Jīra brūhane. Brūhanaṃ^eb^ vaḍḍhanaṃ. Jīrati. Jīraṃ. Jīramāno. Jīraṇaṃ. Appassutāyaṃ puriso, balibaddova jīrati.

[03]^b^Pūra pūraṇe^eb^. Pūrati. Pūratova mahodadhi. Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā. Pūrituṃ, pūritvā, pūraṃ, pūritaṃ. Puṇṇaṃ, paripuṇṇaṃ. Sampuṇṇaṃ, pūraṇaṃ. Pūraṇo kassapo. Kārite ‘‘pāramiyo pūreti, pūrayati, pūrāpeti, pūrāpayati. Pūretvā, pūrayitvā, pūrāpetvā, pūrāpayitvā, paripūretvā’’ iccādīni bhavanti.
[03]^b^Sara gatiyaṃ^eb^. Sarati, visarati, ussarati. Ussāraṇā. Saro. Saṃsāro iccādīni. Tattha ^b^saro^eb^ti rahado. ^b^Saṃsāro^eb^ti vaṭṭaṃ, yo ‘‘bhavo’’tipi vuccati.

[03]^b^Cara^eb^^a^M0.0147^ea^^b^gatibhakkhanesu^eb^. Carati, vicarati, anucarati, sañcarati, paṭicarati. Cariyā. Caritā. Cāro. Vicāro. Anuvicāro. Upavicāro. Caraṇaṃ. Cārako. Ocarako. Brahmacariyaṃ iccādīni.

[03]Tattha ^b^caratī^eb^ti gacchati, bhakkhati vā. Tathā hi ^b^cara^eb^nti padassa gacchanto khādanto cāti atthaṃ vadanti garū. ^b^Paṭicaratī^eb^ti paṭicchādeti. ^b^Cārako^eb^ti taṃpavesitānaṃ sattānaṃ sukhaṃ carati bhakkhatīti cārako, rodho. ^b^Ocarako^eb^ti adhocārī. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti dānampi veyyāvaccampi sikkhāpadampi brahmavihāropi dhammadesanāpi methunaviratipi sadārasantosopi uposathopi ariyamaggopi sakalaṃ sāsanampi ajjhāsayopi vuccati.

[07]Imasmiṃ ^b^aṅkurapetavatthumhi^eb^ veyyāvaccaṃ ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Idaṃ kho taṃ bhikkhave tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī’’ti imasmiṃ ^b^tittirajātake^eb^ sikkhāpadaṃ ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Taṃ kho pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya…pe… yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā’’ti imasmiṃ ^b^mahāgovindasutte^eb^ brahmavihārā ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttā. ‘‘Ekasmiṃ brahmacariyasmiṃ, sahassaṃ maccuhāyino’’ti ettha dhammadesanā ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttā. ‘‘Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha brahmacārino bhavissāmā’’ti ^b^sallekhasutte^eb^ methunavirati ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttā.
