[03]Ettha sākuṇiko ‘‘kitavā’’ti vutto. Tassa idaṃ ketavaṃ, tasmiṃ ketave ayaṃ dhātu vattatīti attho.
[03]^b^Paṭi parihāse^eb^. Paṇḍeti, paṇḍayati. Uppaṇḍeti, uppaṇḍayati. Manussānaṃ naṃ bhikkhuniṃ uppaṇḍiṃsu.
[03]^b^Khaḍi kaḍi chede^eb^. Khaṇḍeti, khaṇḍayati. Kaṇḍeti, kaṇḍayati. Khaṇḍo, kaṇḍo.
[03]Ettha ca ^b^piṇḍo^eb^ti samūhasaṅkhāto kalāpopi ‘‘coḷaṃ piṇḍo rati khiḍḍā’’ti ettha vutto āhārasaṅkhāto piṇḍopi piṇḍoyeva.
[03]^b^Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ hasane ca^eb^. Maṇḍeti, maṇḍayati. Maṇḍo, maṇḍanaṃ, maṇḍito.
[03]^b^Bhaḍi kalyāṇe. Kalyāṇaṃ^eb^ kalyāṇatā. Bhaṇḍeti, bhaṇḍayati. Bhaṇḍo.
[03]Ettha ca ^b^bhaṇḍo^eb^ti dhanaṃ, alaṅkāro vā. ‘‘Bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti. Samalaṅkaritvā bhaṇḍenā’’ti ca ādīsu viya.
[03]^b^Chaḍḍa chaḍḍane^eb^. Chaḍḍeti, chaḍḍayati. Chaḍḍanako. Chaḍḍiyati, chaḍḍito. Chaḍḍituṃ, chaḍḍayituṃ, chaḍḍetvā, chaḍḍayitvā.
[03]^b^Vaḍḍha ākiraṇe^eb^. Kaṃsapātiyā pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍheti, vaḍḍhayati. Bhattaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adāsi.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇa vaṇṇakriyāvitthāraguṇavacanesu. Vaṇṇo^eb^ pasaṃsā. ^b^Kriyā^eb^ karaṇaṃ. ^b^Vitthāro^eb^ vitthinnatā. ^b^Guṇo^eb^ sīlādidhammo. ^b^Vacanaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0300^ea^ vācā. Vaṇṇeti, vaṇṇayati. Vaṇṇo, vaṇṇaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ, saṃvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇa^eb^saddo chavithutikulavaggakāraṇasaṇṭhānapamāṇarūpāyatanādīsu dissati. Tattha ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā’’ti evamādīsu chaviyaṃ. ‘‘Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā’’ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ. ‘‘Cattārome bho gotama vaṇṇā’’tievamādīsu kulavagge. ‘‘Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī’’ti evamādīsu kāraṇe. ‘‘Mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā’’tievamādīsu saṇṭhāne. ‘‘Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā’’ti evamādīsu pamāṇe. ‘‘Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā’’ti evamādīsu rūpāyataneti.

[03]Tattha ^b^chaviya^eb^nti chavigatā vaṇṇadhātu eva ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇo’’ti ettha ^b^vaṇṇa^eb^ggahaṇena gahitāti apare. Vaṇṇanaṃ kittiyā ugghosananti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ thuti. Vaṇṇiyati asaṅkarato vavatthapiyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ kulavaggo. Vaṇṇiyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāviyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ kāraṇaṃ, vaṇṇaṃ dīgharassādivasena saṇṭhahananti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ saṇṭhānaṃ. Vaṇṇiyati aḍḍhamahantādivasena pamiyatīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ pamāṇaṃ. Vaṇṇeti vikāramāpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti ^b^vaṇṇo,^eb^ rūpāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ tena tena pavattinimittena ^b^vaṇṇa^eb^saddassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe pavatti veditabbā.

[03]Aparampi ^a^M0.0301^ea^^b^vaṇṇa^eb^saddassa atthuddhāraṃ vadāma. ^b^Vaṇṇa^eb^saddo saṇṭhānajāti rūpāyatanakāraṇapamāṇaguṇapasaṃsājātarūpapuḷinakkharādīsu dissati. Ayañhi ‘‘mahantaṃ sapparājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā’’tiādīsu saṇṭhāne dissati, ‘‘brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīno añño vaṇṇo’’tiādīsu jātiyaṃ. ‘‘Paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato’’tiādīsu rūpāyatane.
[21]‘‘Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;

[07]Ādīsu kāraṇe. ‘‘Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā’’tiādīsu pamāṇe. ‘‘Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā’’tiādīsu guṇe. ‘‘Vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī’’tiādīsu pasaṃsāyaṃ. ‘‘Vaṇṇaṃ añjanavaṇṇena, kāliṅgamhi vanimhase’’ti ettha jātarūpe. ‘‘Akilāsuno vaṇṇapathe khaṇantā’’ti ettha puḷine. ‘‘Vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyāyo’’tiādīsu akkhare dissati. Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi –

[03]^b^Suvaṇṇa^eb^saddo chavisampattigaruḷajātarūpesu āgato. Ayañhi ‘‘suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate’’ti, ‘‘suvaṇṇatā sussaratā’’ti ^a^M0.0302^ea^ ca evamādīsu chavisampattiyaṃ āgato. ‘‘Kākaṃ suvaṇṇā parivārayantī’’tiādīsu garuḷe. ‘‘Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco’’tiādīsu jātarūpeti.
[03]^b^Cuṇṇa peraṇe^eb^. Cuṇṇeti, cuṇṇayati. Cuṇṇaṃ. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karoti.
[03]^b^Kuṇa saṅkocane^eb^. Kuṇeti, kuṇayati. Kuṇo. Kuṇahattho. Hatthena kuṇī.
[03]Ettha ^b^tūṇī^eb^ti sarakalāpo. Sā hi tūṇenti pūrenti sare etthāti tūṇī.

[03]Ettha ^b^kāṇo^eb^ti ekena vā dvīhi vā akkhīhi parihīnakkhi. ^b^Aṭṭhakathācariyā^eb^ pana ^b^‘‘kāṇo^eb^ nāma ekakkhinā kāṇo, ^b^andho^eb^ nāma ubhayakkhikāṇo’’ti vadanti, taṃ ^b^kāṇandha^eb^saddānaṃ ekatthasannipāte yujjati. Itarathā ^b^kāṇakacchapopamasutte^eb^ vutto kacchapo ekasmiṃ kāṇo siyā, ekakkhikāṇo ca pana puriso ‘‘andho’’ti na vattabbo siyā, tasmā tesamayugaḷatte ekekassa yathāsambhavaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnamākārānaṃ vācakatā daṭṭhabbā. Tathā hi ^b^kosalasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘kāṇo^eb^ti ekacchikāṇo vā ^a^M0.0303^ea^ ubhayacchikāṇo vā’’ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā ‘‘ovadeyyānusāseyyā’’ti ettha ovādānusāsanānaṃ viya savisesatā avisesatā ca daṭṭhabbā.
[03]Ettha ^b^gaṇanā^eb^ti saṅkhyā. ^b^Gaṇo^eb^ti bhikkhusamūho. Yesaṃ vā kesañci samūho. Samūhassa ca anekāni nāmāni. Seyyathidaṃ –

[03]Kiñcāpi ete ^b^saṅghagaṇasamūhā^eb^dayo saddā samūhatthavācakā, tathāpi ^b^saṅghagaṇa^eb^saddāyeva vināpi visesakapadena bhikkhusamūhe vattanti, nāññe, aññe pana ^b^saṅghagaṇa^eb^saddehi saddhiṃ aññamaññañca kadāci samānatthavisayā honti, kadāci asamānatthavisayā, tasmā yathāpāvacanaṃ asammuyhantena yojetabbā. ‘‘Eko, dve’’tiādinā gaṇetabboti ^b^gaṇo^eb^.
[03]^b^Kaṇṇa^eb^^a^M0.0304^ea^^b^savane^eb^. Kaṇṇeti, kaṇṇayati. Kaṇṇo. Kaṇṇayanti saddaṃ suṇanti etenāti ^b^kaṇṇo,^eb^ yo loke ‘‘savanaṃ, sota’’nti ca vuccati.
[03]^b^Kuṇa guṇa āmantane^eb^. Kuṇeti, kuṇayati. Guṇeti, guṇayati. Guṇo. Goṇo.

[03]Ettha ^b^guṇo^eb^ti sīlādayo dhammā, kenaṭṭhena te guṇā. Goṇāpiyati āmantāpiyati attani patiṭṭhito puggalo daṭṭhuṃ sotuṃ pūjituñca icchantehi janehīti guṇo. Ettha kiñcāpi sīlādidhammānaṃ āmantāpanaṃ natthi, tathāpi taṃhetuāmantanaṃ nimantanañca teyeva karonti nāmāti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā hi –

[07]Ettha kassakassa tuṭṭhiuppattikāraṇattā hetuvasena niccetanassapi phalassa tosanaṃ vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi āmantāpanakāraṇattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññe pana ‘‘guñjante abyayante iti guṇā’’ti atthaṃ vadanti. Tadanurūpaṃ pana dhātusaddaṃ na passāma, ^b^‘‘guṇa^eb^ āmantane’’ icceva passāma, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
[03]Ettha ^b^vaṇo^eb^ti aru. Sā hi sarīraṃ vaṇayati vicuṇṇeti chiddāvachiddaṃ karotīti vaṇoti vuccati.
[03]Ettha ^a^M0.0305^ea^ ca haritabhāvavigatepi vatthusmiṃ paṇṇabhāvo rūḷhito pavattoti daṭṭhabbo. ‘‘Paṇṇaṃ, pattaṃ, palāso, dalaṃ’’ iccete samānatthā.
[03]^b^Paṇa byavahāre^eb^. Paṇeti, paṇayati. Rājā ca daṇḍaṃ garukaṃ paṇeti.
[03]^b^Cinta cintāyaṃ^eb^. Cinteti, cintayati. Cittaṃ, cintā, cintanā, cintanako. Kārite ‘‘cintāpeti, cintāpayatī’’ti rūpāni.

[03]Tattha ^b^citta^eb^nti ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti cittaṃ, vijānātīti attho, sabbacittasādhāraṇavasenetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha siyā – kasmā ‘‘ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti citta’’nti vatvāpi ‘‘vijānātīti attho’’ti vuttaṃ, nanu cintanavijānanā nānāsabhāvā. Na hi ‘‘cintetī’’ti padassa ‘‘vijānātī’’ti attho sambhavati, duppaññassa hi nānappakārehi cintayatopi sukhumatthādhigamo na hotīti? Saccaṃ, ‘‘vijānātī’’ti idaṃ padaṃ cittassa saññāpaññākiccehi visiṭṭhavisayaggahaṇaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ sabbacittasādhāraṇattā ^b^citta^eb^saddassa. Yañhi dhammajātaṃ ‘‘citta’’nti vuccati, tadeva viññāṇaṃ, tasmā vijānanatthaṃ gahetvā saññāpaññākiccāvisiṭṭhavisayaggahaṇaṃ dīpetuṃ ‘‘vijānātī’’ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Idāni aññagaṇikadhātuvasenapi nibbacanaṃ pakāsayāma – sabbesu cittesu yaṃ lokiyakusalākusalamahākriyacittaṃ, taṃ javanavīthivasena attano santānaṃ cinotīti ^b^cittaṃ,^eb^ vipākaṃ kammakilesehi citanti ^b^cittaṃ,^eb^ idaṃ ^b^ci^eb^dhātuvasena nibbacanaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci loke vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ, sabbassa tassa ^a^M0.0306^ea^ citteneva karaṇato citteti vicitteti vicittaṃ kariyati etenāti ^b^cittaṃ,^eb^ cittakaraṇatāya cittanti vuttaṃ hoti, idaṃ ^b^citta^eb^dhātuvasena nibbacanaṃ. Cittatāya cittaṃ, idaṃ pāṭipadikavasena nibbacanaṃ. Tenāhu ^b^aṭṭhakathācariyā^eb^ ‘‘sabbampi yathānurūpato cittatāya cittaṃ, cittakaraṇatāya cittanti evamettha attho veditabbo’’ti.

[03]Ettha hi cittassa sarāgasadosādibhedabhinnattā sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṃ vasena cittassa cittatā veditabbā. Kiñcāpi ekassa cittassa evaṃ vicittatā natthi, tathāpi vicittānaṃ antogadhattā samudāyavohārena avayavopi ‘‘citta’’nti vuccati, yathā pabbatanadīsamuddādiekadesesu diṭṭhesu pabbatādayo diṭṭhāti vuccanti. Tenāhu ^b^aṭṭhakathācariyā^eb^ ‘‘kāmañcettha ekameva evaṃ cittaṃ na hoti, cittānaṃ pana antogadhattā etesu yaṃ kiñci ekampi cittatāya ‘citta’nti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti.

[03]Ettha ca vuttappakārānamatthānaṃ vinicchayo bavati. Kathaṃ? Yasmā yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathā tathā gahetabbo. Tasmā yaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvena cinoti, yañca kammunā abhisaṅkhatattā citaṃ, taṃ tena kāraṇena cittanti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana tathā na hoti, taṃ parittakriyadvayaṃ antimajavanañca labbhamānacintanavicittatādivasena cittanti veditabbaṃ, hasituppādo pana aññajavanagatikoyevāti.

[03]^b^Citta^eb^saddo ^a^M0.0307^ea^ paññattiyaṃ viññāṇe vicitte cittakamme acchariyeti evamādīsu atthesu dissati. Ayañhi ‘‘citto gahapati. Cittamāso’’tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ dissati. ‘‘Cittaṃ mano mānasa’’ntiādīsu viññāṇe. ‘‘Vicittavatthābharaṇā’’tiādīsu vicitte. ‘‘Diṭṭhaṃ vo bhikkhave caraṇaṃ nāma citta’’ntiādīsu cittakamme. ‘‘Iṅgha maddi nisāmehi, cittarūpaṃva dissatī’’tiādīsu acchariyeti.

[03]^b^Cita sañcetane^eb^. Ceteti, cetayati. Ratto kho brāhmaṇa rāgena abhibhūto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti. Ākaṅkhati cetayati, taṃ nisedha jutindhara. Cetanā, sañcetanā. Cetayitaṃ, cetetvā, cetayitvā. Sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeti.

[03]Tattha ^b^cetanā^eb^ti cetayatīti cetanā, saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho. ^b^Sañcetanā^eb^ti upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. ^b^Cetayita^eb^nti cetanākāro. ^b^Sañciccā^eb^ti sayaṃ ñatvā, cecca abhivitaritvāti attho. Imāni cetanāya nāmāni –
[03]Atrāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘cetanāhaṃ bhikkhave kammaṃ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā’’ti.

[03]^b^Manta^eb^^a^M0.0308^ea^^b^guttabhāsane^eb^. Manteti, mantayati, nimanteti, nimantayati, āmanteti, āmantayati. Janā saṅgamma mantenti, mantayanti, mantayiṃsu rahogatā. Nimantayittha rājānaṃ. Āmantayittha devindo, visukammaṃ mahiddhikaṃ. Mantā, manto. Kārite ‘‘mantāpeti, mantāpayatī’’ti rūpāni.

[03]Ettha ^b^mantā^eb^ti paññā, ‘‘gavesanasaññā’’tipi vadanti. ^b^Manto^eb^ti guttabhāsanaṃ. ‘‘Upassutikāpi suṇanti mantaṃ, tasmā hi manto khippamupeti bheda’’nti ettha hi guttabhāsanaṃ ‘‘manto’’ti vuccati. Apica ^b^manto^eb^ti chaḷaṅgamanto. Vuttañca ‘‘ye mantaṃ parivattenti, chaḷaṅgaṃ brahmacintita’’nti. Ettha sikkhā nirutti kappa byākaraṇa jotisattha chandovicitivasena manto ‘‘chaḷaṅgo’’ti veditabbo. Etāni eva cha ‘‘vedaṅgānī’’ti vuccanti. Vedo eva hi ‘‘manto, sutī’’ti ca vutto. Atha vā ^b^manto^eb^ti vedādivijjā.
[03]^b^Yanta saṅkocane^eb^. Yanteti, yantayati. Yantaṃ, telayantaṃ yathācakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī.
[03]^b^Santa āmappayoge. Āmappayogo^eb^ nāma ussannakriyā. Santeti, santayati.
[03]^b^Kitta saṃsandane^eb^. Kitteti, kittayati. ‘‘Ye vohaṃ kittayissāmi, girāhi anupubbaso. Kittanā parikittanā’’tiādīsu pana katthanā ‘‘kittanā’’ti vuccati.
[03]^b^Tanta kuṭumbadhāraṇe^eb^. Tanteti, tantayati. Satanto, sappadhānoti attho.

[03]^b^Yata^eb^^a^M0.0309^ea^^b^nikāropakāresu^eb^. Yateti, yatayati. Nīto ca paṭidāne, ^b^yata^eb^dhātu ^b^ni^eb^upasaggato paro paṭidāne vattati, niyyāteti, niyyātayati. ^b^Ta^eb^kārassa pana ^b^da^eb^kāratte kate ‘‘niyyādeti, niyyādayati. Rathaṃ niyyādayitvāna, aṇaṇo ehi sārathī’’ti rūpāni.
[03]^b^Vāta gatisukhasevanesu^eb^. Gati sukhaṃ sevananti tayo atthā. Tattha sukhanaṃ ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^. Vāteti, vātayati. Vāto, vātapupphaṃ. Cīvarassa anuvāto.
[03]^b^Satta santānakriyāyaṃ. Santānakriyā^eb^ nāma pabandhakriyā avicchedakaraṇaṃ. Satteti, sattayati. Satto.

[03]Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘gatasattaṃ jaraggava’’nti pāṭhassa ‘‘vigatajīvitaṃ jiṇṇagoṇa’’nti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ. Iminā ^b^satta^eb^saddassa jīvitavacanaṃ viya dissati, ‘‘na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetu’’nti ettha ^b^paggaha^eb^saddassa pattakathanaṃ viya. Suṭṭhu vicāretabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Mutta pasavane^eb^. Mutteti, muttayati. Omutteti, omuttayati. Muttaṃ. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘mutteti ohadeti cā’’ti. Tattha ^b^muttetī^eb^ti passāvaṃ karoti. ^b^Ohadetī^eb^ti karīsaṃ vissajjeti. Kārite ‘‘muttāpeti, muttāpayatī’’ti rūpāni.

[03]Tattha ^b^kattaro^eb^ti jiṇṇo. Mahallakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kenaṭṭhena? Kattarayati aṅgānaṃ sithilabhāvena sithilo bhavatīti atthena. ^b^Kattaradaṇḍo^eb^ti kattarehi jiṇṇamanussehi ekantato gahetabbatāya kattarānaṃ daṇḍo kattaradaṇḍo. Tenāhu ^b^aṭṭhakathācariyā ‘‘kattaradaṇḍo^eb^ti jiṇṇakāle gahetabbadaṇḍo’’ti. ^b^Kattarasuppa^eb^nti jiṇṇasuppaṃ. Kattarañca taṃ suppañcāti kattarasuppanti samāso.
[03]^b^Citta cittakaraṇe,^eb^ kadāci ^b^dassanepi. Cittakaraṇaṃ^eb^ vicittabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Citteti, cittayati. Cittaṃ.
[03]^b^Katha kathane^eb^. Katheti, kathayati. Dhammaṃ sākacchati. Sākacchā, kathā, parikathā, aṭṭhakathā.
[03]Tattha ^b^sākacchatī^eb^ti saha kathayati. Attho kathiyati etāyāti ^b^aṭṭhakathā,^eb^ tthakārassa ṭṭhakārattaṃ.

[03]^b^Pathi gatiyaṃ^eb^. Panthenti, panthayanti. Pantho. ^b^Bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe ^b^‘‘patha^eb^ gatiya’’nti ^b^a^eb^kārantavasena kathitassa ‘‘pathati, patho’’ti ^a^M0.0311^ea^ niggahītāgamavajjitāni rūpāni bhavanti, idha pana ^b^i^eb^kārantavasena kathitassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni niccaṃ bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Putha pahāre^eb^. Potheti, pothayati. Kumāre pothetvā agamāsi.
[03]^b^Attha pattha yācanāyaṃ^eb^. Attheti, atthayati. Attho. Pattheti, patthayati. Patthanā. Paṭipakkhaṃ atthayanti icchantīti ^b^paccatthikā^eb^.
[03]^b^Santha gantha santhambhe^eb^. Santheti, santhayati. Gantheti, ganthayati. Gantho.
[03]^b^Hada^eb^^a^M0.0312^ea^^b^karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo^eb^ karīsassa ussaggo vissajjanaṃ. Hadeti, hadayati. Ohadeti, ohadayati.

[03]^b^Vida lābhe^eb^. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ^b^lābho^eb^ nāma anubhavanaṃ, tasmā ^b^vida^eb^dhātu anubhavane vattatīti attho gahetabbo. Sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti. Dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti. Vedayati. Vedanā, vitti. Vedayitaṃ. Sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno.
[03]^b^Mida sinehane^eb^. Atra ^b^sineho^eb^ nāma pīti. Medeti, medayati.
[03]^b^Chada saṃvaraṇe^eb^. Gehaṃ chādeti, chādayati. Dosaṃ chādeti, chādayati. Paṭicchādeti, paṭicchādayati. Chattaṃ. Channā kuṭi.
[03]^b^Cuda sañcodane āṇattiyañca^eb^. Codeti, codayati. Codako, cuditako, codanā. Ānando buddhacodito.
[03]^b^Vida cehanākhyānanivāsesu. Cehanā^eb^ saññāṇaṃ. ^b^Ākhyānaṃ^eb^ kathanaṃ. ^b^Nivāso^eb^ nivasanaṃ. Vedeti, vedayati. Paṭivedeti, paṭivedayati. Paṭivedayāmi te mahārāja.
[03]^b^Sadda^eb^^a^M0.0313^ea^^b^saddane^eb^. Saddeti, saddayati. Visaddeti, visaddayati. Saddo, saddito. Dīghatte ‘‘saddāyatī’’ti rūpaṃ.

[03]Ettha ca ‘‘maṃ saddāyatīti saññāya vegena udake patī’’ti ^b^aṭṭhakathāpāṭho^eb^ nidassanaṃ, idaṃ ‘‘pabbatāyatī’’ti rūpaṃ viya dhātuvasena nipphannaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ, dhātuvasena nipphannaṃyevāti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Saddo^eb^ti saddiyatīti saddo, yathāvuccatīti vacanaṃ. Atha vā saddiyati attho anenāti ^b^saddo^eb^. Garavo pana ‘‘sappatīti ^b^saddo^eb^. Udīriyati abhilapiyatīti attho’’ti vadanti.
[03]^b^Kanda sātacce. Sātaccaṃ^eb^ satatabhāvo nirantarabhāvo. Kandeti, kandayati.
[03]^b^Muda saṃsagge^eb^. Ekatokaraṇaṃ ^b^saṃsaggo^eb^. Modeti, modayati sattūni sappinā.

[03]^b^Nada bhāsāyaṃ^eb^. Nādeti, nādayati. Hetukatturūpānīti na vattabbāni pāḷidassanato ‘‘sīho ca sīhanādena, daddaraṃ abhinādayī’’ti. Aññatrāpi saṃsayo na kātabbo. Imasmiṃ ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇe hetukatturūpasadisānampi suddhakatturūpānaṃ sandissanato.
[03]^b^Sada assādane^eb^. Sādeti, sādayati. Assādeti, assādayati. Ettha ^b^ā^eb^upasaggo rassavasena ṭhito.
[03]^b^Gada devasadde^eb^. Devasaddo vuccati meghasaddo. Gadeti, gadayati.
[03]^b^Pada^eb^^a^M0.0314^ea^^b^gatiyaṃ^eb^. Padeti, padayati. Padaṃ. Imissā ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇe ‘‘pajjatī’’ti rūpaṃ bhavati, idha pana īdisāni.

[03]^b^Chida dvedhākaraṇe^eb^. Nanu bho yo catudhā vā pañcadhā vā anekasatadhā vā chindati, tassa taṃ chedanaṃ dvedhākaraṇaṃ nāma na hoti, evaṃ sante kasmā sāmaññena avatvā ‘‘dvedhākaraṇe’’ti dvidhā gahaṇaṃ katanti? Dvidhākaraṇaṃ nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ, anekasatadhā chedanampi dvidhākaraṇaṃyeva. Aparassa hi aparassa chinnakoṭṭhāsassa pubbena ekena koṭṭhāsena saddhiṃ apekkhanavasena dvidhākaraṇaṃ hotiyeva. Chedeti, chedayati.
[21]Yo te hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi;
[22]Tassa kujjha mahāvīra, mā raṭṭhaṃ vinassa idaṃ;
[21]Yo me hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi;
[22]Ciraṃ jīvatu so rājā, na hi kujjhanti mādisāti.
[03]^b^Chada apavāraṇe^eb^. Chādeti, chādayati. Chattaṃ. Purisassa bhattaṃ chādayati.
[03]^b^Īdī sandīpane^eb^. Īdeti, īdayati. Īkārantavasena niddiṭṭhattā saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti.

[03]Tattha ‘‘vādeti, vādayatī’’ti imesaṃ ‘‘vadatī’’ti suddhakattuvaseneva attho daṭṭhabbo, na hetukattuvasena. Tathā hi ‘‘saṅketaṃ katvā visaṃvādeti. Ovadeyyānusāseyya. Idameva saccanti ca vādayanti. Avisaṃvādako lokassā’’ti suddhakattudīpakapāḷinayā dissanti ^a^M0.0315^ea^, saddasatthe ca ‘‘vādayatī’’ti suddhakattupadaṃ dissati. Tattha ^b^visaṃvādetī^eb^ti musā vadeti, atha vā vippalambheti, ^b^vādo^eb^ti vacanaṃ. ‘‘Vādo jappo vitaṇḍā’’ti evaṃvidhāsu tīsu kathāsu vādasaṅkhātā kathā. ‘‘Vādāpeti, vādāpayatī’’ti dveyeva hetukattupadāni bhavanti.

[03]^b^Chadī icchāyaṃ^eb^. Īkārantoyaṃ dhātu, tasmā saniggahītāgamānissa rūpāni na bhavanti. Purisassa bhattaṃ chādeti, chādayati, ruccatīti attho. Purisassa bhattaṃ chādayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati chādentaṃ vā.

[03]^b^Vadī abhivādanathutīsu^eb^. Ayampi īkāranto dhātu, tasmā imassapi saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti. Vādeti, vādayati, vandati, thometi vāti attho. Imāni anupasaggāni rūpāni. Saddasatthepi ca ‘‘vādayatī’’ti anupasaggavandanathutiatthaṃ padaṃ vuttaṃ, sāsane pana ‘‘abhivādeti, abhivādayati, abhivādanaṃ, bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā’’tiādīni sopasaggāni rūpāni dissanti.

[03]Tattha ^b^abhivādetvā^eb^ti vanditvā, thometvā vā, ayamasmākaṃ ruci. ^b^Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^‘‘abhivādetvā^eb^ti ‘sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā, vandanto hi atthato evaṃ vadāpeti nāmā’’ti hetukattuvasena ^b^abhivādana^eb^saddattho vutto, amhehi pana ^b^vandana^eb^saddaṃ saddasatthanayamaggahetvā suddhakattuvasena attho kathito. Abhivādanañhi vandanaṃyeva, na vadāpanaṃ ^b^abhi^eb^saddena sambandhitattā ‘‘abhivādanasīlissā’’ti ettha viya. Idañhi ‘‘abhivādāpanasīlissā’’ti na vuttaṃ. Yadi ca saddasatthe vadāpanamadhippetaṃ siyā, ‘‘vadī vadāpanathutīsū’’ti nissandehavacanaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā ^a^M0.0316^ea^, evañca na vuttaṃ, evaṃ pana vuttaṃ ‘‘vadī abhivādanathutīsū’’ti, tena vadāpanamanadhippetanti ñāyati.

[03]Athāpi siyā ‘‘kassaci vuddhena visiṭṭhaṃ vadāpanaṃ abhivādana’’nti, evampi nupapajjati kāritavasena dhātuatthassa akathetabbato. Tathā hi ‘‘paca pāke, chidi dvidhākaraṇe’’tiādinā bhāvavasena atthappakāsanamatteyeva ‘‘pacati, paccati, pāceti. Chindati, chijjati, chedāpetī’’tiādīni sakammakāni ceva akammakāni ca sakāritāni ca rūpāni nipphajjanti, na ca tadatthāya visuṃ visuṃ dhātuniddeso kariyati. Tasmā ‘‘vadī abhivādanathutīsū’’ti ettha kāritavasena dhātuattho kathitotipi vattuṃ na sakkā kriyāsabhāvattā dhātūnaṃ. Yathā pana ‘‘takketi, vitakketi. Takko, vitakko’’tiādīni samānatthāni, tathā ‘‘vādeti, abhivādetī’’tiādīni samānatthāni. Ato saddasatthepi saddasatthavidūhi ‘‘takka vitakke, vadī abhivādanathutīsū’’tiādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ‘‘takkayati, vādayatī’’tiādīni anupasaggāniyeva rūpāni dassitāni, tāni ca kho suddhakattupadāniyeva, na hetukattupadāni, tasmā ‘‘abhivādanathutīsū’’ti etassa ‘‘vadāpanathutīsū’’ti attho nupapajjati.

[03]Kiñca bhiyyo – ‘‘abhivādeti, abhivādayati. Abhivādetvā, abhivādayitvā’’tiādīni samānatthāni, ^b^ṇeṇaya^eb^mattena hi savisesāni. Yadi ‘‘abhivādetvā’’ti imassa padassa ‘‘sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā’’ti attho siyā, ‘‘sirasā abhivādayi’’nti ettha ‘‘sirasā’’ti padaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā vadāpanena asambandhattā. Yasmā vuttaṃ taṃ padaṃ, tena ñāyati ‘‘abhivādetvā’’tiādīsu vadāpanattho na icchitabbo, vandanattho icchitabbo thomanattho ca. Yasmā ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe ‘‘vanda abhivādānathutīsū’’ti imassa dhātussa ‘‘vandatī’’ti ^a^M0.0317^ea^ padarūpassa ‘‘abhivandati, thometi cā’’ti atthoyeva icchitabbo, na vadāpanattho. Tathā hi ‘‘vande sugataṃ gativimutta’’nti padānamatthaṃ vadantena ^b^ṭīkācariyenapi ‘‘vande^eb^ti vandāmi, thomemi cā’’ti vandanathomanatthoyeva dassito, na ^b^abhivādana^eb^saddatthaṃ paṭicca vadāpanattho, tasmā ‘‘abhivādetvā’’ti etthāpi vandanathomanatthāyeva icchitabbā, na vadāpanattho.

[03]Athāpi siyā ‘‘vande’ti pade kāritapaccayo natthi, ‘abhivādetvā’ti imasmiṃ pana atthi, tasmā tattha vadāpanattho na labbhati, idha pana labbhatī’’ti. Tanna, ‘‘karotī’’tisuddhakattupadassapi ‘‘nipphādetī’’ti hetukattupadavasena vivaraṇassa viya ‘‘vande’’ti padassapi ‘‘sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā’’ti vivaraṇassa vattabbattā. ‘‘Abhivādetvā’’ti idañca ‘‘vande’’ti padamiva kāritapaccayantaṃ na hoti. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā ‘‘cinteti, cintayati. Manteti, mantayatī’’tiādīnaṃ ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇikānaṃ suddhakattupadānaṃ ‘‘cintāpeti, cintāpayatī’’tiādīniyeva hetukattupadāni dissanti, tasmā yadi hetukattupadaṃ adhippetaṃ siyā, ‘‘abhivādāpetvā’’ti vā ‘‘abhivādāpayitvā’’ti vā vattabbaṃ siyā, yasmā panevaṃ na vuttaṃ, tasmā taṃ kāritapaccayantaṃ na hotīti siddhaṃ.

[07]Ayaṃ tāva jātakapāḷi. Ayaṃ pana ^b^aṭṭhakathāpāṭho^eb^ ‘‘yañhi naro hantumiccheyya, so taṃ kathaṃ nu abhivādeyya, kathaṃ vā ^a^M0.0318^ea^ tena attānaṃ abhivādāpayetha ve. Tassa hi taṃ kammaṃ na upapajjatī’’ti. Tattha pāḷiyaṃ ^b^abhivādeyyā^eb^ti suddhakattupadaṃ tabbācakattā. ^b^Abhivādāpayetha ve^eb^ti hetukattupadaṃ tabbācakattā. Evaṃ vibhāgaṃ pana ñatvā pāḷiyā aṭṭakathāya ca adhippāyo gahetabbo ‘‘naro yaṃ puggalaṃ hantuṃ iccheyya, so hantā taṃ vajjhaṃ puggalaṃ kathaṃ nu abhivādeyya, so vā hantā, tena vajjhena maṃ vandāhīti attānaṃ kathaṃ vandāpeyyā’’ti. Ettha pana ‘‘rājāno coraṃ sunakhehipi khādāpentī’’tiādīsu viya karaṇavasena ‘‘tena vajjhenā’’ti padaṃ yojitaṃ, attho pana ‘‘taṃ vajjha’’nti upayogavacanavasena daṭṭhabbo dvikammakattā sakāritapaccayassa sakammakadhātuyāti. Nanu evaṃ sante ‘‘aṭṭhakathācariyā passitabbaṃ na passanti, atitthe pakkhandantī’’ti tesaṃ doso hotīti? Na hoti, suṇātha asmākaṃ sodhanaṃ, tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi ‘‘abhivādetvā’’ti ettha ‘‘vadī abhivādanathutīsū’’ti dhātuyā atthamaggahetvā vohāravisaye kosallasamannāgatattā saṇhasukhumamatthaṃ sotūnaṃ bodhetuṃ ‘‘vada viyattiyaṃ vācāya’’nti dhātuyevatthaṃ gahetvā kāritapaccayaparikappanena kāritatthamādāya ‘‘abhivādetvāti ‘sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā, vandanto hi atthato evaṃ vadāpeti nāmā’’ti hetukattuvasena ^b^abhivādana^eb^saddattho vuttoti na koci tesaṃ doso. Pūjārahā hi te āyasmanto, namoyeva tesaṃ karoma, idampi ṭhānaṃ sukhumaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ. Evañhi karoto paññā vaḍḍhatīti.

[03]^b^Randha^eb^^a^M0.0319^ea^^b^pāke^eb^. Sūdo bhattaṃ randheti, randhayati. Kākaṃ sokāya randhehi. Randhako. Sūdena odano randhiyati. Randhito. Randhanaṃ. Puriso sūdaṃ sūdena vā odanaṃ randhāpeti, randhāpayati. Randhetuṃ, randhayituṃ. Randhitvā, randhayitvā, randhiya iccādīni.
[03]^b^Gandha sūcane addane ca. Sūcanaṃ^eb^. Pakāsanaṃ. ^b^Addanaṃ^eb^ pariplutā. Gandheti, gandhayati, gandho.

[03]Ettha ^b^gandho^eb^ti gandheti attano vatthuṃ sūcayati pakāsetīti gandho. Paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphaphalādiṃ ‘‘idamettha atthī’’ti pesuññaṃ upasaṃharanto viya pakāsetīti gandho. ^b^Gamudhara^eb^dhātudvayavasenapi ^b^gandha^eb^saddattho vattabbo ‘‘gacchanto dhariyatīti gandho’’ iti, āha ca ‘‘gacchanto dhariyatīti gandho, sūcanatopi vā’’ti. ^b^Gandha^eb^saddo ca ‘‘uppalagandhatheno’’ti ettha chedane vattatīti daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Budhi hiṃsāyaṃ^eb^. Bundheti, bundhayati. Palibundheti, palibundhayati. Palibodho, ^b^pari^eb^saddo upasaggo, so vikāravasena aññathā jāto. Tattha ^b^palibodho^eb^ti āvāsapalibodhādi. Apica ^b^palibodho^eb^ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhittayañca.
[03]^b^Gaddha abhikaṅkhāyaṃ^eb^. Gaddheti, gaddhayati. Gaddho. ^b^Gaddho^eb^ti gijjho. ‘‘Gaddhabādhipubbo’’ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.

[03]^b^Andha diṭṭhūpasaṃhāre. Diṭṭhūpasaṃhāro^eb^ nāma cakkhusaññitāya diṭṭhiyā upasaṃhāro apanayanaṃ vināso vā. Cakkhu hi passanti etāyāti diṭṭhīti vuccati. Yaṃ sandhāya ^b^aṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ ‘‘sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe abhimukhaṃ ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūte diṭṭhimaṇḍale’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ṭīkāyampi^eb^ ca ‘‘diṭṭhimaṇḍaleti abhimukhaṭṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūte cakkhusaññitāya diṭṭhiyā maṇḍale’’ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃbhūtāya diṭṭhiyā upasaṃhāre ^b^andha^eb^dhātu vattati. Andheti, andhayati. Cakkhūni andhayiṃsu, andho. ^b^Andho^eb^ti andhetīti andho. Dvinnaṃ cakkhūnaṃ ekassa vā vasena naṭṭhanayano, evamidha ^b^andha^eb^dhātu vutto. Kaccāyane pana ‘‘khādāmagamānaṃ khandhandhagandhā’’ti vacanena ^b^ama^eb^dhātussa ^b^andhā^eb^desakaraṇavasena rūpanipphatti dassitā.
[03]^b^Badha bandhane^eb^. Migaṃ bādheti, bādhayati. Baddho migo, baddhosi mārapāsena.

[03]Tattha ^b^bādhetī^eb^ti bandhatīti suddhakattuvasena attho gahetabbo. Evaṃ ^b^bādhayatī^eb^ti etthāpi. Tathā hi ‘‘vātaṃ jālena bādhesi, yo anicchantimicchasī’’ti ettha ^b^bādhesī^eb^ti bandhasīti suddhakattuvasena attho. ^b^Bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe pana ^b^‘‘bādha^eb^ baddhāya’’nti ^b^bādha^eb^dhātussa vasena ‘‘bādhatī’’ti kattupadaṃ ‘‘bādheti, bādhayatī’’ti hetukattupadaṃ bhavati. ^b^Baddho^eb^ti bādhiyate bandhiyate soti baddho.
[03]^b^Māna^eb^^a^M0.0321^ea^^b^pūjāyaṃ pemane vīmaṃsāyaṃ^eb^. Māneti, mānayati. Mātā. Vimāneti, vimānayati, paṭimāneti, paṭimānayati. Mānanā, sammānanā, vimānanā, vimānaṃ, vimānanaṃ, mānito.

[03]Tattha ^b^mānetī^eb^ti pūjeti, ^b^aṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ pana ‘‘mānentī’’ti etasmiṃ ṭhāne ayamattho dassito ^b^‘‘mānentī^eb^ti manena piyāyanti. ^b^Pūjentī^eb^ti paccayehi ^b^pūjentī^eb^’’ti. So vevacanatthappakāsanavasena vuttoti gahetabbo. ^b^Mānanapūjana^eb^saddā hi pariyāyasaddattā vevacanasaddā eva. ^b^Vimānetī^eb^ti avamaññati. ^b^Vimā^eb^nanti sobhāvisesayogato visiṭṭhamāniyatāya vimānaṃ, visesato mānetabbanti hi ^b^vimānaṃ,^eb^ devānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ byamhaṃ.
[03]^b^Mana thambhe. Thambho^eb^ cittassa thaddhatā. Māneti, mānayati. Māno.
[03]^b^Dhana sadde^eb^. Dhaneti, dhanayati, dhaniyyati. Dhani, dhanaṃ.

[03]Tattha ^a^M0.0322^ea^^b^dhanī^eb^ti saddo. ^b^Dhana^eb^nti santakaṃ, tañhi mama idanti dhanāyitabbaṃ saddāyitabbanti dhananti. Ayaṃ pana dhātu icchāyampi vattati. ‘‘Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidhūrassa hadayaṃ dhaniyyatī’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^dhaniyyatī^eb^ti pattheti icchati.
[03]^b^Thena coriye^eb^. Corassa bhāvo ^b^coriyaṃ^eb^. Yathā sūriyaṃ, yathā ca dakkhiyaṃ. Theneti, thenayati. Theno, thenetvā.
[03]^b^Tanu saddopatāpesu^eb^. Tāneti, tānayati. Idhāyaṃ savuddhikā. ^b^Tanādi^eb^gaṇe vitthāratthavasena ‘‘tanoti, tanute’’ti avuddhikā.
[03]^b^Ñapa tosananisānesu^eb^. Ñāpeti, ñāpayati, paññāpeti, paññāpayati, paññatti.

[03]Ettha ca niddese ‘‘paññāpetī’’ti padaṃ nidassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^paññāpetī^eb^ti katanibbacanehi vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ buddhinisānañca karotīti attho. ^b^Pa^eb^pubbo nikkhipane. Āsanaṃ paññāpeti, paññāpayati. ‘‘Āsanaṃ paññapetī’’ti rassattampi dissati. Amatassa dvāraṃ paññapeti, paññā. Kārite ‘‘puriso purisena āsanaṃ paññapāpetī’’ti ekameva padaṃ. Tāni ‘‘paññāpeti, paññāpayatī’’ti rūpāni yadā ‘‘ñā avabodhane’’ti imissā rūpāni siyuṃ, tadā ^a^M0.0323^ea^ hetukatturūpāni bhavanti. Ettha pana suddhakatturūpāni tabbācakattā.
[03]^b^Lapa viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ^eb^. Lapeti, lapayati. Lāpo, lapanaṃ, ālāpo, sallāpo, kathāsallāpo, lapitaṃ.

[03]Tattha ^b^jhatto^eb^ti khuddāpareto pācanagginā jhāpitoti jhatto, ‘‘jhattā assu kilantā’’ti ca pāḷi. ^b^Jhāna^eb^nti nīvaraṇadhamme jhāpetīti jhānaṃ, savuddhikaṃ. Kārite pana – jhāpāpeti, jhāpāpayati.
[03]^b^Rūpa rūpakriyāyaṃ. Rūpakriyā^eb^ nāma pakāsanakriyā. Rūpeti, rūpayati. Rūpaṃ.
[03]Tattha ^b^rūpa^eb^nti rūpayatīti rūpaṃ. Vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti attho. ^b^Divādi^eb^gaṇe panāyaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpaṃ ruppane’’^eb^ti bhijjanādiatthaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā.
[03]^b^Kappa vidhimhi. Vidhi^eb^ kriyā. Sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti. Kappayati. Moro vāsamakappayi. Sīhaseyyaṃ pakappentaṃ, buddhaṃ vandāmi gotamaṃ.
[03]^b^Kappa vitakke vidhimhi chedane ca^eb^. Kappeti, kappayati, moro vāsamakappayi. Kappitamassu. Pakappeti, pakappayati. Saṅkappeti, saṅkappayati. Kappo, saṅkappo, vikappo. Kappasamaṇo iccādīni.

[03]Tattha ^b^kappo^eb^ti paricchedavasena kappiyatīti kappo. ^b^Saṅkappo^eb^ti saṅkappanaṃ. ^b^Vikappo^eb^ti vividhā kappanaṃ, atthassa anekantikabhāvo. Idha ^b^kappa^eb^saddassa atthuddhāro bhavati.

[03]^b^Kappa^eb^saddo ^a^M0.0324^ea^ abhisaddahanavohārakālapaññattichedanavikappalesasamantabhāvādianekattho. Tathā hissa ‘‘okappanīyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa, yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’’ti evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho. ‘‘Anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu’’nti evamādīsu vohāro. ‘‘Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī’’ti evamādīsu kālo. ‘‘Iccāyasmā kappo’’ti evamādīsu paññatti. ‘‘Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū’’ti evamādīsu chedanaṃ. ‘‘Kappati dvaṅgulakappo’’ti evamādīsu vikappo. ‘‘Atthi kappo nipajjitu’’nti evamādīsu leso. ‘‘Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā’’ti evamādīsu samantabhāvo.

[03]Atha vā ^b^kappa^eb^saddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca vitakkavidhānapaṭibhāgapaññattikālaparamāyuvohārasamantabhāvābhisaddahana chedana viniyoga vinaya kriyā lesantara kappataṇhādiṭṭhiasaṅkhyeyyakappamahākappādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa ‘‘nekkhammasaṅkappo abyāpādasaṅkappo’’tiādīsu vitakke āgato. ‘‘Cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyyā’’tiādīsu vidhāne, adhikavidhānaṃ āpajjeyyāti hi attho. ‘‘Satthukappena vata bho sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā’’tiādīsu paṭibhāge, satthusadisenāti ayañhi tattha attho. ‘‘Iccāyasmā kappo’’tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. ‘‘Yena ^a^M0.0325^ea^ sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī’’tiādīsu kāle. ‘‘Ākaṅkhamāno ānanda tathāgato kappaṃ vātiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā’’tiādīsu paramāyumhi. Āyukappo hi idha ‘‘kappo’’ti adhippeto. ‘‘Anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu’’ntiādīsu samaṇavohāre. ‘‘Kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā’’tiādīsu samantabhāve. ‘‘Saddhāsaddahanā okappanā abhippasādo’’tiādīsu abhisaddahane, saddhāyanti attho. ‘‘Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū’’tiādīsu chedane. ‘‘Evameva ito dinnaṃ, petānaṃ upakappatī’’tiādīsu viniyoge. ‘‘Kappakatena akappakataṃ saṃsibbitaṃ hotī’’tiādīsu vinayakriyāyaṃ. ‘‘Atthi kappo nipajjituṃ, handāhaṃ nipajjāmī’’tiādīsu lese. ‘‘Āpāyiko nerayiko, kappaṭṭho saṅghabhedako, kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī’’ti ca ādīsu antarakappe.

[07]Ādīsu taṇhādiṭṭhīsu. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^niddese^eb^ ‘‘kappoti uddānato dve kappā taṇhākappo diṭṭhikappo’’ti. ‘‘Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe’’tiādīsu asaṅkhyeyyakappe ^a^M0.0326^ea^. ‘‘Cattārimāni bhikkhave kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī’’tiādīsu mahākappe. Iccevaṃ –
[21]Vitakke ca vidhāne ca, paṭibhāge tatheva ca;

[03]^b^Kapi gatiyaṃ^eb^. Kampeti, kampayati, gacchatīti attho. Imāni calanatthe pavattahetukatturūpasadisāni bhavanti. Calanatthe hi ^b^‘‘kampa kampane’’^eb^ti dhātuyā ‘‘kampatī’’ti akammakasuddhakatturūpaṃ. ‘‘Kampetī’’tiādīni sakammakāni hetukatturūpāni ‘‘idampi dutiyaṃ sallaṃ, kampeti hadayaṃ mamā’’ti akammakāya dhātuyā sakammakarūpadassanato.
[03]^b^Thūpa samussaye. Samussayo^eb^ āroho ubbedho. Thūpeti, thūpayati. Thūpo, thūpikā.
[03]^b^Ḍapa ḍipa saṅghāte^eb^. Ḍāpeti. Ḍāpayati. Ḍepeti, ḍepayati.
[03]^b^Kapa^eb^^a^M0.0327^ea^^b^avakampane^eb^. Kapeti, kapayati. Kapaṇo. ^b^Kapaṇo^eb^ti karuṇāyitabbo. Aññattha pana ‘‘kappatī’’ti rūpaṃ vadanti.
[03]^b^Gupa kupa dhūpa bhāsāyaṃ^eb^. Gopeti, gopayati. Kopeti, kopayati. Dhūpeti, dhūpayati.
[03]^b^Tapa dāhe^eb^. Tapeti, tapayati. Tapo, tāpo. Ātāpo, santāpo. Kārite – tāpeti, tāpayati. Tattha ^b^tapo^eb^ti akusalānaṃ tāpanaṭṭhena tapo, sīlaṃ.
[03]^b^Opathapa thapane^eb^. Opeti, opayati. Na tesaṃ koṭṭhe openti. Thapeti, thapayati. Thapito. Thapayitvā paṭicchadaṃ vavaṭṭhapeti. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ.

[03]Ettha ca ‘‘vi ava thapeti, vi ava thapana’’nti chedo. Ettha purime saralopo ^b^tha^eb^ssa ^b^ṭha^eb^ttaṃ visadisabhāvena dvittañca. Pacchime pana saralopo, ^b^ava^eb^ssa ^b^o^eb^kārattaṃ, ^b^tha^eb^ssa ^b^ṭha^eb^ttaṃ, ^b^pa^eb^ssa ^b^va^eb^ttaṃ, ^b^va^eb^ssa dvittaṃ, ^b^va^eb^kāradvayassa ca ^b^ba^eb^kāradvayaṃ bhavati. ^b^Voṭṭhabbana^eb^nti ca byavatthāpakacittassa nāmaṃ. ^b^Na^eb^kāralope ‘‘voṭṭhabba’’nti aparampi rūpaṃ bhavati.
[03]^b^Māpa māpane^eb^. Paṇṇasālaṃ māpeti, māpayati. Yo pāṇamatimāpeti, paṇṇasālā sumāpitā.
[03]^b^Yapa yāpane. Yāpanaṃ^eb^ pavattanaṃ. Tena so tattha yāpeti. Yāpayati. Yāpanā.
[03]Tattha ^a^M0.0328^ea^^b^yāpetī^eb^ti idaṃ ^b^yā^eb^dhātussa payogatte sati kāritapadaṃ bhavati. Tathā hi ‘‘uyyāpenti nāmā’’ti pāḷi dissati.
[03]^b^Samba sambandhe. Sambandho^eb^ daḷhabandhanaṃ. Sambeti, sambayati. Sambalaṃ.
[03]^b^Lubi dubi addane. Addanaṃ^eb^ hiṃsā. Lumbeti, lumbayati. Dumbeti, dumbayati.
[03]^b^Gabba māne. Māno^eb^ ahaṃkāro. Gabbeti, gabbayati. Gabbanaṃ, gabbito. Tattha ^b^gabbatī^eb^ti na saṅkucati.
[03]^b^Bhū pattiyaṃ. Patti^eb^ pāpanaṃ. Sakammikā dhātu. Bhāveti, bhāvayati. Pabhāveti, pabhāvayati. Itthambhūto. Cakkhubhūto, ñāṇabhūto, dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto.

[03]Tattha ^a^M0.0329^ea^^b^bhāvetī^eb^ti puriso gacchantaṃ purisamanugacchanto pāpuṇātīti attho. Esa nayo sesakriyāpadesupi. Ettha ca ‘‘bhāvetī’’tiādīni yattha sace ^b^‘‘bhū sattāya’’^eb^nti dhātuyā rūpāni honti, tattha hetukatturūpāni nāma honti. ‘‘Bhāveti kusalaṃ dhamma’’ntiādīnettha nidassanapadāni. ^b^Bhāvetī^eb^ti hi vaḍḍhetīti attho. Idha pana suddhakatturūpattā pāpuṇātīti attho. ^b^Itthambhūto^eb^ti imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūto patto. ‘‘Cakkhubhūto’’tiādīni pana ^b^‘‘bhū sattāyaṃ, bhū pattiya’’^eb^nti dvigaṇikānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena aṭṭhakathāṭīkānayanissitaṃ atthaṃ pakāsayissāma āgamikānaṃ kosallatthāya. Tattha ^b^cakkhubhūto^eb^ti yathā cakkhu sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti, evaṃ lokassa yāthāvadassanasādhanato dassanakiccapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhubhūto. Atha vā cakkhu viya bhūtotipi ^b^cakkhubhūto^eb^. Paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhūñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti ^b^cakkhubhūto^eb^. Viditakaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^ñāṇabhūto,^eb^ asādhāraṇaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ bhūto pattoti ^b^ñāṇabhūto,^eb^ aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena, pariyattidhammappavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti ^b^dhammabhūto^eb^. Bodhipakkhiyadhammehi vā uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vā dhammaṃ bhūto pattoti ^b^dhammabhūto^eb^. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^. Atha vā brahmaṃ vuccati maggo tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanattā, tañca sayambhūñāṇena bhūto pattoti ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^. Evaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena vutto attho veditabbo.

[03]Aparāni cettha nidassanapadāni veditabbāni. ‘‘Tātā mayaṃ mahallakā suddhodanamahārājaputtaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ sambhāveyyāma vā no vā, tumhe tassa sāsane pabbajeyyāthā’’ti ca ‘‘atha ^a^M0.0330^ea^ kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ revataṃ sahajātiyaṃ sambhāviṃsū’’ti cāti. Aññānipi panettha ‘‘manussabhūto, devabhūto’’tiādīni yojetabbāni. Tathā hi ^b^saṃsāramocakapetavatthu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘manussabhūtā^eb^timanussesu jātā, manussabhāvaṃ vā pattā’’ti attho saṃvaṇṇito.
[03]^b^Bhū avakampane^eb^. Ayampi sakammako. Bhāveti, bhāvayati. Manobhāvanīyā bhikkhū.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^bhāvetī^eb^ti anukampati puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā yaṃkiñci. ^b^Manobhāvanīyā^eb^ti ‘‘dīghāyukā hontu bhadantā arogā abyāpajjā’’ti evamādinā bhāvetabbā anukampitabbāti manobhāvanīyā. Aññattha pana ^b^manobhāvanīyā^eb^ti manovaḍḍhanakāti attho. Yesu hi diṭṭhesu mano vaḍḍhati, ‘‘te manobhāvanīyā’’ti vuccanti.
[03]^b^Lābha pesane^eb^. Lābheti, lābhayati. ^b^‘‘Labha lābhe^eb^ti dhātussa rūpāni ce, kāritarūpāni bhavanti.
[03]^b^Dabhī bhaye^eb^. Īkārantāyaṃ dhātu, tena saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti. Dabheti, dabhayati.
[03]^b^Vambha viddhaṃsane^eb^. Vambheti, vambhayati. Vambhanā. Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ vambhenti.
[03]^b^Ā^eb^tena ^a^M0.0331^ea^^b^camu dhovane. Ā^eb^pubbo ^b^camu^eb^dhātu dhovane vattati. Ācameti, ācamayati. Ācamanakumbhī.

[03]Ettha pana ‘‘tato hi so ācamayitvā licchavī, therassa datvā yugāni aṭṭhā’’ti ^b^appasakkārapetavatthupāḷi^eb^ppadeso nidassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^ācamayitvā^eb^ti hatthapādadhovanapubbakaṃ mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā. Ayaṃ pana dhātu bhūvādigaṇikatte ‘‘camatī’’ti bhakkhanatthaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati.
[03]^b^Kamu icchākantīsu^eb^. Kāmeti, kāmayati. Kāmo, kanti, nikanti, kāmanā, kāmayamāno,kāmento, abhikkantaṃ. Abhikkantavaṇṇā.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^kāmo^eb^ti rūpādivisayaṃ kāmetīti kāmo. Kāmiyatīti vā ^b^kāmo,^eb^ kilesakāmavatthukāmavasenetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kileso hi tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātañca vatthu ‘‘kāmo’’ti vuccati. Māropi vā devaputto ‘‘kāmo’’ti vuccati. So hi accantakaṇhadhammasamaṅgitāya papañcasamatikkantepi buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvake attano vase ṭhapetuṃ kāmetīti ‘‘kāmo’’ti vuccati.
[03]Aññe ^a^M0.0332^ea^ aññānipi vadanti. Tāni sāsanānulomāni na hontīti idha na dassitāni. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ pana ‘‘māro, namuci, kaṇho, pamattabandhū’’ti cattāriyeva nāmāni āgatāni.

[03]Idāni ^b^abhikkanta^eb^saddassa ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe ^b^‘‘kamu padavikkhepe’’^eb^ti vohārasīsena vuttassa ^b^kamu^eb^dhātussa vasena idha ca ^b^‘‘kamu icchākantīsū’’^eb^ti vuttassa ^b^kamu^eb^dhātussa vasena atthuddhāraṃ kathayāma. ^b^Abhikkanta^eb^saddo khayasundarābhirūpābbhanumodanesu dissati. ‘‘Abhikkantā bhante ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho’’tiādīsu khaye dissati. ‘‘Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’’tiādīsu sundare.
[21]‘‘Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
[03]^b^Thoma silāghāyaṃ. Silāghā^eb^ pasaṃsā. Thometi, thomayati. Thomito, thomanā.
[03]^b^Sama^eb^^a^M0.0333^ea^^b^vitakke^eb^. Sāmeti, sāmayati. Samā. Nisāmeti, nisāmayati. Nisāmanaṃ. Paṭisāmeti, paṭisāmayati. Paṭisāmanaṃ.
[03]Tattha ^b^samā^eb^ti saṃvaccharo, so ‘‘samā’’ti itthiliṅgavasena vuccati. ‘‘Yo yajetha sataṃ sama’’nti ettha hi ^b^samā^eb^saddo itthiliṅgo, upayogavasena pana ‘‘sama’’nti vutto.

[03]Imāni saṃvaccharassa nāmāni ‘‘saṃvaccharo, vaccharo, samā, hāyano, sarado, vasso’’tiādīni bhavanti. ^b^Nisāmetī^eb^ti vitakketi upadhāreti. Ettha hi ‘‘iṅgha maddi nisāmehi, nigghoso yādiso vane’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^nisāmehī^eb^ti vitakkehi upadhārehīti attho. ^b^Paṭisāmetī^eb^ti bhaṇḍaṃ guttaṭṭhāne nikkhipati.
[03]^b^Sama ālocane. Ālocanaṃ^eb^ pekkhanaṃ. Sāmeti, sāmayati. Nisāmanaṃ.

[03]Ettha pana ^b^nisāmetī^eb^ti pekkhati oloketi. Tathā hi ‘‘iṅgha maddi nisāmehi, cittaṃ rūpaṃva dissatī’’ti pāḷi dissati. Tattha hi ^b^nisāmehī^eb^ti olokehīti attho. Dhātūnamatthātisayena yogoti vacanato pana upasaggayogato vā savanepi ayaṃ vattati. Tathā hi ‘‘tato kaṇhājināyāpi, nisāmehi rathesabhā’’tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti. Tattha ^b^nisāmehī^eb^ti suṇohīti attho.
[03]^b^Ama roge^eb^. Ameti, amayati. Andho. Bilaṅkapādo andhanakho.
[03]Tattha ^b^andho^eb^ti naṭṭhanayano vuccati. ^b^Andhanakho^eb^ti pūtinakho. Ubhayathāpi sarogattaṃ sūcitaṃ.
[03]^b^Sāma svāntane āmantane. Svāntanaṃ^eb^ sāmappayogo. ^b^Āmantanaṃ^eb^ avhāyanaṃ pakkosanaṃ. Sāmeti, sāmayati.

[03]^b^Saṅgāma yuddhe^eb^. Saṅgāmeti, saṅgāmayati. Dve rājāno saṅgāmesuṃ. Saṅgāmo. ^b^Ā^eb^to ^b^gamu^eb^ īsamadhivāsane. Āgameti, āgamayati, kāmāvacaradhamme nissāya rūpārūpadhammo samudāgameti, samudāgamayati. Upāsako dhammasavanantarāyaṃ anicchanto ‘‘āgametha āgamethā’’ti āha. Samudāgamanaṃ, āgamanaṃ. Āgamento, āgamayamāno.

[03]Tatra ^b^āgametī^eb^ti īsakaṃ adhivāseti. ^b^Samudāgametī^eb^ti sampavattati. ^b^Bhūvādigaṇe^eb^ ‘‘gamayatī’’ti hetukattuvasena vuttaṃ, idha pana upasagganipātapubbakāni katvā ‘‘āgametī’’tiādīni suddhakattuvasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Para gatiyaṃ^eb^. Pareti, parayati. Ettha ca ‘‘iti kho ānanda kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentī’’ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^aggāya parentī^eb^ti arahattatthāya gacchanti.
[03]^b^Vara icchāyaṃ^eb^. Vareti, varayati. Varo, varaṃ, varanto. Ete varānaṃ caturo varemi. Etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
[03]Tattha ^b^varo^eb^ti variyate varitabboti varo. ^b^Vara^eb^nti varetīti varaṃ, icchanto patthentoti attho.
[07]Purāṇakaviracanāyaṃ ‘‘vara’’nti padassa viya. Evaṃ varetīti ^b^varanto. Vare^eb^ti varemi icchāmi yācāmi. Kārite ‘‘pavāretī’’ti rūpaṃ, icchāpetīti attho. Nisedhanatthe panidaṃ kāritaṃ na hoti.
[03]^b^Sāra dubbalye^eb^. Sāreti, sārayati. Dubbalo bhavatīti attho.
[03]^b^Kumāra kīḷāyaṃ^eb^. Kumāreti, kumārayati. Kumāro, kumārako. Kumārī, kumārikā.
[03]Ettha ^a^M0.0336^ea^ kumārayati tattha tattha kīḷatīti ^b^kumāro^eb^. So eva atidaharattā ^b^kumārako^eb^. Esa nayo itaratrāpi.

[03]^b^Sūra vīra vikkantiyaṃ. Vikkanti^eb^ vikkamanaṃ. Sūreti, sūrayati. Vīreti, vīrayati. Sūro, vīro. Sāsanikehi pana saddhammavidūhi evaṃ dhātusabhāvānampi ^b^sūravīra^eb^saddānaṃ nibbacanaṃ na dassitaṃ, kevalaṃ pana tattha tattha ‘‘sūroti visiṭṭhauro’’ti ca ‘‘mahāvīroti mahāvikkanto’’ti ca ‘‘vīroti vīriyavā’’ti ca atthavivaraṇamattameva dassitaṃ.

[03]^b^Pāra tīra kammasampattiyaṃ. Kammasampatti^eb^ nāma kammassa parisamāpanaṃ niṭṭhāpanaṃ. Pāreti, pārayati. Tīreti, tīrayati. Pāraṃ. Tīraṃ. Vikkamāmi na pāremi, bhūmiṃ sumbhāmi vegasā. Taṃ kiccaṃ tīretvā gato. Santīraṇaṃ, tīraṇapariññāti ca ādīni ettha dassetabbāni.
[03]^b^Jara vayohānimhi^eb^. Jareti, jarayati. Jarā. ^b^Pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘jīratī’’ti pāṭho.
[03]^b^Vara āvaraṇe^eb^. Vāreti, vārayati. Nivāreti, nivārayati. Nivāretā. Parivāreti, parivārayati. Parivāro. Pavāreti, pavārayati. Pavāraṇaṃ. ^b^Pavāraṇa^eb^nti nisedhanaṃ vā kāmyadānaṃ vā.
[03]^b^Dhara dhāraṇe^eb^. Dhāreti, dhārayati. Ādhāro, ādhārako, dhammo iccādīni.

[03]Tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti anekavidhesu dhammesu lokuttaro uppādito sacchikato ca catūsu apāyesu saṃsāre vā ^a^M0.0337^ea^ satte apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo. Atha vā sotāpannādīhi ariyehi dhāriyati, nu puthujjanehītipi ^b^dhammo^eb^. Catubhūmiko pana sakalakkhaṇaṃ dhāretīti ^b^dhammo^eb^. Kakkhaḷattādinā phusanādinā santiādinā sakasakabhāvena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati sallakkhiyatītipi ^b^dhammo^eb^. Tepiṭako pana pāḷidhammo sakatthaparatthādibhee atthe dhāretīti ^b^dhammo^eb^. Keci tu vidū ‘‘pāpake akusale dhamme dhunāti kampeti viddhaṃsetīti ^b^dhammo^eb^’’ti dhūdhātuvasenapi nibbacanaṃ vadanti, taṃ maggadhamme atīva yujjati, phalanibbānapariyattidhammesu pana pariyāyena yujjati.
[03]^b^Dhamma^eb^saddo pariyattihetuguṇanissattanijjīvatādīsu dissati. Ayañhi ‘‘dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyya’’ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati. ‘‘Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu hetumhi.
[21]‘‘Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
[07]Ādīsu guṇe. ‘‘Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī’’tiādīsu nissattanijjīvatāyaṃ.

[03]Atha vā ^b^dhamma^eb^saddo sabhāvapaññāpuññapaññattiāpattipariyattinissattanijjīvatāvikāraguṇapacca- yapaccayuppannādīsu dissati. Ayañhi ‘‘kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā’’tiādīsu sabhāve dissati.
[22]Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī’’ti
[21]‘‘Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;

[03]Puññe. ‘‘Paññattidhammā, niruttidhammā, adhivacanādhammā’’tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. ‘‘Pārājikā dhammā, saṅghādisesā dhammā’’tiādīsu āpattiyaṃ. ‘‘Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇa’’ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ. ‘‘Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī’’tiādīsu nissattanijjīvatāyaṃ. ‘‘Jātidhammā jarādhammā maraṇadhammā’’tiādīsu vikāre. ‘‘Channaṃ buddhadhammāna’’ntiādīsu guṇe. ‘‘Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu paccaye. ‘‘Ṭhitāvasā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā’’tiādīsu paccayuppanne.

[03]Atha vā ^b^dhamma^eb^saddo pariyattisaccasamādhipaññāpakatipuññāpattiñeyyādīsu bahūsu atthesu diṭṭhappayogo. Tathā hi ‘‘idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī’’tiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati. ‘‘Diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo’’tiādīsu sacce. ‘‘Evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu’’ntiādīsu samādhimhi. ‘‘Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo’’ti evamādīsu paññāyaṃ. ‘‘Jātidhammānaṃ bhikkhave sattāna’’nti evamādīsu pakatiyaṃ. ‘‘Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāri’’nti evamādīsu puññe. ‘‘Cattāro pārājikā dhammā’’tiādīsu ^a^M0.0339^ea^ āpattiyaṃ. ‘‘Kusalā dhammā’’tiādīsu ñeyye. Evaṃ dhammasaddappavattivisayā vividhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassitā, tattha tattha pana ādisaddena yuttivisayādayo ca atthā gahetabbā. Tathā hi ^b^dhamma^eb^saddo –
[21]‘‘Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ tvaṃ gaccheyya ekako;

[07]Ādīsu yuttiyaṃ vattati. ‘‘Manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa’’ntiādīsu visaye. ‘‘Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upetī’’ti ettha nibbāne vattati. Tatra yā nissattatā, sā eva nijjīvatā. Yo ca hetu, so eva paccayo.
[03]Keci pana dhammasaddassa pavattivisayānaṃ dasadhāva paricchedaṃ vadanti.

[03]^b^Pāla^eb^^a^M0.0340^ea^^b^rakkhaṇe^eb^. ‘‘Rakkhaṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, gopanaṃ, avanaṃ, pālanaṃ, rakkhā, rakkhaṇā, gutti’’ iccete pariyāyā. Pāleti, pālayati. Pālako, buddhapālo. Ambapālī gaṇikā. Samo bhavatu pālinā. Pālito, pālanaṃ, pāḷi.

[03]Ettha ^b^pāḷī^eb^ti atthaṃ pāletīti pāḷi, ^b^la^eb^ssa ^b^ḷa^eb^ttaṃ. Atha vā antodakaṃ rakkhaṇaṭṭhena mahato taḷākassa thirā mahatīti pāḷi viyāti ^b^pāḷi,^eb^ pariyattidhammo. Aparo nayo pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttibhāvato buddhādīhi bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti ^b^pāḷi^eb^.

[07]Ayañhi ‘‘pāḷiyā atthamupaparikkhantī’’tiādīsu pariyattidhammasaṅkhāte pāḷidhamme dissati. ‘‘Mahato taḷākassa pāḷī’’tiādīsu taḷākapāḷiyaṃ. ‘‘Pāḷiyā nisīdiṃsū’’tiādīsu pantiyaṃ, paṭipāṭiyā nisīdiṃsūti attho. Imasmiṃ panatthe dhātuyā kiccaṃ natthi. Pāṭipadiko hi pantivācako ^b^pāḷi^eb^saddo.
[03]^b^Tila sinehane^eb^. Teleti, telayati. Telaṃ, tilo, tilaṃ.

[03]Tattha ^b^tilo^eb^ti tilagaccho. ^b^Tila^eb^nti tapphalaṃ. Tato pana nikkhanto sineho ^b^telaṃ^eb^. So hi ‘‘tilānaṃ idanti tela’’nti vuccati. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘sāsapatela’’ntiādivacanaṃ na yujjeyyāti? No na yujjati, ^b^‘‘tilasinehane’’^eb^ti evaṃ vuttāya ^b^tila^eb^dhātuyā sāmaññato yassa ^a^M0.0341^ea^ kassaci sinehassa vacanato. Tena ‘‘sāsapatelaṃ, madhukatela’’ntiādayo sāsane payogā dissanti. Mayaṃ pana ^b^tila^eb^dhātuvasena nipphannānaṃ tilagacchatapphalavācakānaṃ ‘‘tilo, tila’’nti saddarūpānaṃ pakāsanamukhena ‘‘tilānaṃ idanti tela’’nti vadāma, na pana tena vacanena sāsapādīnaṃ sinehassa atelattaṃ vadāma. Atha kiñcarahīti ce? Taddhitavidhāne viññunaṃ kosallatthaṃ ^b^tila^eb^saddaṃ paṭicca ‘‘tilānaṃ idanti tela’’nti vadāma. Sinehasaṅkhātassa sāsapādīnaṃ telassa vacanaṃ na jahāma, tasmā udāharaṇappakāsane ‘‘tilo, tilaṃ, tela’’nti avatvā ‘‘telaṃ, tilo, tila’’nti amhehi vuttaṃ. Idañhi vacanaṃ telassa sāmaññato sinehe pavattiṃ dīpeti. Teneva ca sāsane ‘‘tilatelaṃ, sāsapatela’’ntiādinā visesavacanampi dissatīti niṭṭhametthāvagantabbaṃ. Apica ^b^tela^eb^saddo yebhuyyena tilatele vattati, yathā ^b^miga^eb^saddo hariṇamigetipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Jala apavāraṇe^eb^. Jāleti, jālayati. Jālaṃ, jālā. ^b^Jāla^eb^nti macchajālaṃ. ^b^Jālā^eb^ti aggijālā.
[03]^b^Khala soceyye. Soceyyaṃ^eb^ sucibhāvo. Khāleti, khālayati. Pakkhāleti, pakkhālayati.
[03]Ettha ^b^tālo^eb^ti tiṇarājarukkho. ^b^Tala^eb^nti pāṇitalabhūmitalādi. Tañhi tālayati patiṭṭhāti ettha vatthujātanti ^b^talaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^Dula^eb^^a^M0.0342^ea^^b^ukkhepe. Ukkhepo^eb^ uddhaṃ khipanaṃ. Doleti, dolayati. Dolā.
[03]Ettha ca doliyati ukkhipiyati yattha nipanno dārako, yathānipannako vāti ^b^dolā^eb^.
[03]^b^Mīla nimīlane^eb^. Mīleti, mīlayati. Mīlanaṃ, ummīlanaṃ, nimīlanaṃ.
[03]^b^Mūla rohane^eb^. Mūleti, mūlayati. Mūlaṃ. Esā hi yadā patiṭṭhāyaṃ vattati, tadā ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇikā, ‘‘mūlatī’’ti cassā rūpaṃ.
[03]Tattha ^b^mūla^eb^nti mūlayati rūhati rukkhādi etenāti mūlaṃ. Atha vā mūlayati chinnopi koci etena acchinnena punadeva rūhatīti ^b^mūlaṃ^eb^. Vuttañhi –
[03]^b^Kala pila khepe^eb^. Kāleti, kālayati. Kālo. Pileti, pilayati.
[03]Ettha ^b^kālo^eb^ti samayopi maccupi. Tatra samayo tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āyuṃ kālayati khepeti divase divase appaṃ appaṃ karotīti kāloti vuccati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –

[03]Maccu ^a^M0.0343^ea^ pana kālayati tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ khepeti samucchedavasena nāsetīti kāloti vuccati. Tenāhu ^b^aṭṭhakathācariyā ‘‘kālo^eb^ti maccu. Kālayati sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ nāsetīti kālo. Kālena maccunā kato nāsitoti ^b^kālakato’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Maraṇaṃ hindaṃ maccu maṭṭu cuti kālo antako nikkhepo’’ti maraṇassābhidhānāni.
[03]^b^Dala vidāraṇe^eb^. Dāleti, dālayati, padāleti, padālayati. Kudālo.
[03]^b^Kala gatisaṅkhyānesu^eb^. Kāleti, kālayati. Kālo, kalā. ^b^Kalā^eb^ti avayavo. Sā hi kālayitabbā saṅkhāyitabbāti ^b^kalā^eb^.
[03]^b^Sīla upadhāraṇe. Upadhāraṇaṃ^eb^ bhuso dhāraṇaṃ, patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvo. Sīleti, sīlayati. Sīlaṃ, sīlanaṃ.

[03]Ettha ^b^sīla^eb^nti sīleti upadhāreti taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ apāyesu uppattinivāraṇavasena bhuso dhāretīti sīlaṃ. Atha vāsīliyati upacāriyati sappurisehi hadayamaṃsantaraṃ upanetvā dhāriyatīti ^b^sīlaṃ. Sīlana^eb^nti ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇe avippakiṇṇatāsaṅkhātaṃ samādhānaṃ vuccati. Tattha ‘‘sīlatī’’ti rūpaṃ, idha pana ādhārabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ upadhāraṇaṃ vuccati. Ettha ca ‘‘sīleti, sīlayatī’’ti rūpāni. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ hi ‘‘kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ^a^M0.0344^ea^ patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvo upadhāraṇa’’nti vutto.
[03]^b^Vela kālopadese^eb^. Veleti, velayati. Velā. Keci ^b^‘‘vela^eb^ iti dhātusaddo na hotī’’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ, porāṇehi saddasatthavidūhi ‘‘velayatī’’ti rūpassa dassitattā.

[03]^b^Pala mūla lavanapavanesu. Lavanaṃ^eb^ chedanaṃ, ^b^pavanaṃ^eb^ sodhanaṃ. Pāleti, pālayati. Palaṃ. ^b^Palaṃ^eb^ nāma mānaviseso. Lokassa vimatiṃ pāleti lunāti sodheti cāti ^b^palaṃ^eb^. Mūleti, mūlayati. Saddasatthavidū pana ‘‘mūlayati kedāraṃ, mūlayati dhañña’’nti payogaṃ vadanti.
[03]^b^Thūla paribrūhane. Paribrūhanaṃ^eb^ vaḍḍhanaṃ. Thūleti, thūlayati. Thūlo puriso. Thūlā javena hāyanti.
[03]^b^Pala gatiyaṃ^eb^. Paleti, palayati. Atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ. Paleti rasamādāya. Yathā suttaguḷaṃ yattakehi suttehi veṭhitaṃ, tattakehi eva palayati.

[03]^b^Ciṅgula paribbhamane^eb^. Ciṅguleti, ciṅgulayati. Ciṅgulayitvā. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati, tāvatikaṃ gantvā ciṅgulayitvā bhūmiyaṃ papatī’’ti. Tattha ^b^ciṅgulayitvā^eb^ti paribbhamitvā.
[03]^b^Divu parikūjane. Parikūjanaṃ^eb^ gajjanaṃ. Deveti, devayati. Devo ca paridevitvā. ^b^Devo^eb^ti megho.

[03]^b^Pusa posane^eb^. Poseti, posayati. Imāni rūpāni kiñcāpi ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇikaṃ ‘‘posetī’’ti rūpaṃ paṭicca hetukatturūpāni viya dissanti, tathāpi ‘‘aññepi devo posetī’’tiādikassa ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇikarūpassa dassanato suddhakattuvasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ pana kāritaṭṭhāne ‘‘posāpeti, posāpayatī’’ti hetukatturūpāni icchitabbāni.
[03]^b^Punsa abhimaddane. Na^eb^kāro niggahītatthaṃ. Puṃseti, puṃsayati. Napuṃsako. Dhātu^b^na^eb^kārassa lope ‘‘poso’’ iccapi rūpaṃ.

[03]Tattha ^b^na puṃsako^eb^ti itthibhāvapumbhāvarahito puggalo. So hi puriso viya sātisayaṃ paccāmitte na puṃseti abhimaddanaṃ ^a^M0.0346^ea^ kātuṃ na sakkotīti ^b^napuṃsako^eb^ti vuccati. Keci pana ‘‘na pumā, na itthī’’ti napuṃsakoti vacanatthaṃ vadanti. Tathā hi saddasatthavidū taṃ puggalaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgavasena napuṃsakanti vadanti.
[03]^b^Rusa rosane. Rosanaṃ^eb^ kopakaraṇaṃ. Roseti, rosayati. Roso. ^b^Roso^eb^ti kodho.
[03]^b^Daṃsa daṃsane^eb^. Daṃseti, daṃsayati. Daṃsano. ^b^Daṃsano^eb^ti danto. Daṃsanti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā etenāti ^b^daṃsano^eb^.
[03]^b^Dasi dassane ca. Ca^eb^kāro daṃsanaṃ apekkhati. Daṃseti, daṃsayati. Vidaṃseti, vidaṃsayati sūriyo ālokaṃ.
[03]^b^Pasa bandhane^eb^. Pāseti, pāsayati. Pāso. Pāsanti bandhanti satte etenāti ^b^pāso,^eb^ sakuṇapāsādi.
[03]^b^Ghusi visaddane. Visaddanaṃ^eb^ ugghosanaṃ. Ghoseti, ghosayati. Ghoso.

[03]^b^Lasa silyayoge. Silyayogo^eb^ lāsiyaṃ nāṭakanāṭanaṃ recakadānaṃ. Lāseti, lāsayati. Lāsento, lāsentī ^a^M0.0347^ea^. Atrāyaṃ pāḷi ‘‘vādentiyāpi lāsenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti, lāsentiyāpi naccantī’’ti. Tattha ^b^lāsentī^eb^ti yā uplavamānā viya uṭṭhahitvā lāsiyanāṭakaṃ nāṭenti, recakaṃ denti.
[03]^b^Bhūsa alaṅkāre^eb^. Bhūseti, bhūsayati. Vibhūseti, vibhūsayati. Bhūsanaṃ, vibhūsanaṃ.
[03]^b^Vasa sinehanachedāvaharaṇesu. Avaharaṇaṃ^eb^ corikāya gahaṇaṃ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vasā.
[03]^b^Pusa dhāraṇe^eb^. Poseti, posayati, ābharaṇaṃ dhāretīti attho.
[03]^b^Tusi pisi kusi dasi bhāsāyaṃ^eb^. Tuṃseti, tuṃsayati. Piṃseti, piṃsayati. Kuṃseti, kuṃsayati. Daṃseti, daṃsayati.
[03]^b^Gavesa maggane^eb^. Gaveseti, gavesayati. Gavesako, gavesito, gavesanā, gaveṭṭhi.
[03]^b^Nivāsa^eb^ acchādane. Vatthaṃ nivāseti, nivāsayati. Pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā.
[03]^b^Rasa assādane^eb^. Raseti, rasayati. Raso. Rasiyate assādiyate janehīti ^b^raso^eb^.
[03]Tattha ^b^rasetī^eb^ti sinehati. ^b^Raso^eb^ti sineho, sinehasambandho sāmaggirasoti vuccati, yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇā bhagavantaṃ ‘‘arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo’’ti avocuṃ.

[03]^b^Siya asabbappayoge^eb^. Seseti, sesayati. Seso. ^b^Vi^eb^pubbo atisaye, ^b^vi^eb^pubbo atisaye, ^b^vi^eb^pubbo ^b^sisa^eb^dhātu atisaye vattati, viseseti, visesayati. Viseso, visiṭṭho, visesanaṃ.

[03]^b^Missa sammisse^eb^. Misseti, missayati. Sammisseti, sammissayati. Misso, misso, missito, sammissito, sammisso iccādīni. ^b^Alambusājātake missā^eb^ti itthīnaṃ vattabbanāmaṃ, purisehi saddhiṃ sammissanatāya.
[03]^b^Ghusa^eb^^a^M0.0349^ea^^b^sadde^eb^. Ghoseti, ghosayati. Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā. Ghoso.
[03]^b^Disī uccāraṇe^eb^. Deseti, desayati. Desako, desetā, desito, desanā.
[03]^b^Vasa acchādane^eb^. Vāseti, vāsayati. Nivāseti, nivāsayati. Vatthaṃ.
[03]^b^Araha pūjāyaṃ^eb^. Araheti, arahayati. Arahā, arahaṃ. ‘‘Arahā, khīṇāsavo, asekkho’’ti arahato nāmāni.
[03]^b^Varāho^eb^ti sūkaropi hatthīpi vuccati. ‘‘Eṇeyyā ca varāhā cā’’ti ettha hi sūkaro ‘‘varāho’’ti vutto, ‘‘mahāvarāhassa…pe… nadīsu jaggato’’ti ettha pana hatthī ‘‘varāho’’ti.
[03]^b^Maha pūjāyaṃ^eb^. Maheti, mahayati. Mahito rājā mahārājā. Vihāramaho, cetiyamaho.
[03]^b^Piha icchāyaṃ^eb^. Piheti, pihayati. Pihā, pihālu, apiho, pihanīyā vibhūtiyo.
[03]^b^Kuha^eb^^a^M0.0350^ea^^b^vimhāpane^eb^. Kuheti, kuhayati. Kuhako. Kuhayati lokavimhāpanaṃ karotīti ^b^kuhako^eb^. Kuhanā.
[03]^b^Saha parisahane. Parisahanaṃ^eb^ khanti. Saheti, sahayati. Sahanaṃ. ^b^Bhūvādi^eb^gaṇikassa panassa ‘‘sahatī’’ti rūpaṃ.
[03]^b^Garaha vinindane^eb^. Garaheti, garahayati. Garahā. ^b^Bhūvādi^eb^gaṇikassa panassa ‘‘garahatī’’ti rūpaṃ.
[03]^b^Taḷa tāḷane^eb^. Tāḷeti, tāḷayati. Patāḷeti, patāḷayati. Tāḷaṃ. ^b^Tāḷa^eb^nti kaṃsatāḷādi.
[03]^b^Pīḷa avagāhane^eb^. Pīḷeti, pīḷayati. Nippīḷeti, nippīḷayati. Pīḷanako, pīḷito, pīḷā, pīḷanaṃ, nippīḷanako.
[03]^b^Laḷa upasevāyaṃ^eb^. Lāḷeti, lāḷayati. Upalāḷeti, upalāḷayati. ^b^Bhūvādi^eb^gaṇaṭṭhāya pana vilāsanatthe vattamānāya etissā ‘‘laḷatī’’ti rūpaṃ.
[03]^b^Siḷa seḷane^eb^. Seḷeti, seḷayati. Seḷento. Ettha ^b^seḷetī^eb^ti seḷitasaddaṃ karoti.

[03]Tattha paṭhamo ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇo, dutiyo ^b^rudhādi^eb^gaṇo, tatiyo ^b^divādi^eb^gaṇo, catuttho ^b^svādi^eb^guṇo, pañcamo ^b^kiyādi^eb^gaṇo, chaṭṭho ^b^gahādi^eb^gaṇo, sattamo ^b^tanādi^eb^gaṇo, aṭṭhamo ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇo, imasmiṃ bhagavato pāvacane aṭṭhavidhā dhātugaṇā bhavanti. Etesu vikaraṇapaccayavasena –
[22]Ḍeti yāti iti eti, avati koti saṅkati.
[21]‘‘Suṇoti ca suṇāti ca, vuṇoti ca vuṇāti ca;
[21]‘‘Kināti ca jināti ca, dhunāti ca munāti ca;
[21]‘‘Tanoti ca karoti ca, kayirati sanoti ca;
[22]Niyamo natthi so tasmā, na mayā ettha vuccati.
[22]^b^Vaca turā^eb^dayo na hi, vuddhikā kāritaṃ vinā;

[03]Tatra ^b^‘‘i^eb^gatiyaṃ, ^b^i^eb^ ajjhayane, ^b^u^eb^ sadde’’ iccete suddhassarā dhātavo. ^b^Yā rā lā^eb^ iccādayo ekassarā ^b^ā^eb^kārantā. ^b^Khijini^eb^iccādayo ekassarā ^b^i^eb^kārantā. ^b^Pī^eb^iccādayo ekassarā ^b^ī^eb^kārantā. ^b^Khu du ku^eb^ iccādayo ekassarā ^b^u^eb^kārantā, ^b^bhū hū^eb^ iccādayo ekassarā ^b^ū^eb^kārantā. ^b^Khe je se^eb^ iccādayo ekassarā ekārantā. ^b^So^eb^ iccādayo ekassarā ^b^o^eb^kārantā.

[03]^b^Kara paca saṅgāma^eb^ iccādayo anekassarā ^b^a^eb^kārantā, ^b^omā^eb^iccādayo anekassarā ^b^ā^eb^kārantā, ^b^saki^eb^ iccādayo anekassarā ^b^i^eb^kārantā. ^b^Cakkhī^eb^ iccādayo anekassarā ^b^ī^eb^kārantā. ^b^Andhu^eb^iccādayo anekassarā ^b^u^eb^kārantā. ^b^Kakkhū^eb^ iccādayo anekassarā ^b^ū^eb^kārantā. ^b^Gile mile^eb^ iccādayo anekassarā ^b^e^eb^kārantāti evaṃ ^b^pannarasavidhena^eb^ dhātusaṅgaho.

[03]Tathā hi sīho vātātapādiparissayampi sahati, ‘‘kiṃ me bahūhi ghāṭitehī’’ti attano gocaratthāya khuddake pāṇe agaṇhanto, ‘‘māhaṃ khuddake pāṇe visamagate saṅghātaṃ āpādesī’’ti anuddayavasena sahitabbe khuddakasattepi sahati. Hiṃsitabbe pana kāyūpapanne sūkaramahiṃsādayo satte hiṃsati, tasmāpi ‘‘sīho’’ti vuccati. Yathā pana kantanaṭṭhena ādiantavipallāsato takkaṃ vuccati, evaṃ hiṃsanaṭṭhenapi sīhoti veditabbo. Atha vā sabbiriyāpathesu daḷhavīriyattā suṭṭhu īhatīti ^b^sīho^eb^. Vuttañhi –
[03]Vuttañhi ^a^M0.0356^ea^^b^suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘saharā ca hananā ca sīghajavattā ca sīho’’ti.

[03]Idāni tadatthuddhāro vuccate, ^b^sīha^eb^saddo ‘‘sīho bhikkhave migarājā’’tiādīsu migarāje āgato. ‘‘Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī’’tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. ‘‘Sīhoti kho bhikkhave tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’’tiādīsu tathāgate. Tattha tathāgate sadisakappanāya āgato.

[03]Vuttañhetaṃ garūhi ‘‘rūpayatīti rūpaṃ, vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti attho’’ti. Vuttampi cetaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpa^eb^nti kenaṭṭhena rūpaṃ? Ruppanaṭṭhenā’’ti. Bhagavatā panetaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘kiñca bhikkhave rūpaṃ vadetha, ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccati. Kena ruppati, sītenapi ruppatī’’ti vitthāro. Atthuddhāro panassa heṭṭhā vuttova.

[03]Ettha ^a^M0.0357^ea^ hi ^b^samuddo^eb^ti aṭṭhahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgatattā samuddati attasannissitānaṃ macchamakarādīnaṃ pītisomanassaṃ pasavati janetīti samuddo. Ayamasmākaṃ khanti. ^b^Aṭṭhakathācariyā^eb^ pana ‘‘samuddanaṭṭhena samuddo, kiledanaṭṭhena tenamanaṭṭhenāti vuttaṃ hotī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Milindapañhe^eb^ pana āyasmā nāgaseno ‘‘bhante nāgasena samuddo samuddoti vuccati, kena kāraṇena āpaṃ udakaṃ samuddoti vuccatī’’ti milindena raññā puṭṭho āha ‘‘yattakaṃ mahārāja udakaṃ, tattakaṃ loṇaṃ, yattakaṃ loṇaṃ, tattakaṃ udakaṃ, udakasamattā samuddoti vuccatī’’ti. Tadā raññā milindena ‘‘kallosi bhante nāgasenā’’ti vuttaṃ. Ettha hi samaṃ udakena loṇaṃ etthāti samuddoti nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ ‘‘nīloda’’ntiādīsu viya. Tattha ^b^bhadantanāgasena^eb^matañca amhākaṃ matañca pakatisamuddaṃ sandhāya vuttattā na virujjhati, ^b^aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ^eb^ matampi ‘‘taṇhāsamuddo’’ti ca ‘‘samuddopeso’’ti ca āgatāni samuddasarikkhakāni ca taṇhācakkhusotādīni sandhāya vuttattā na virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Tattha ‘‘saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhāpi dukkhā’’ti vacanato sayampi dukkhadhammoyeva samāno jātijarābyādhimaraṇadukkhādīhi anekehi dukkhehi khajjati khādiyatīti ^b^khandho,^eb^ teheva dukkhehi khaññati avadāriyatītipi ^b^khandho,^eb^ khaniyati parikhaññatītipi ^b^khandho,^eb^ attena vā attaniyena vā tucchattā khaṃ suññākāraṃ dhāretītipi ^b^khandho,^eb^ rūpakkhandhādi. Atthuddhārato pana –

[03]Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ – ^b^khandha^eb^saddo sambahulesu ṭhānesu nipatati rāsimhi guṇe paṇṇattiyaṃ rūḷhiyanti. ‘‘Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mahāsamudde na sukaraṃ udakassa pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ ‘‘ettakāni udakāḷhakānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasatānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānī’ti vā, atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī’’tiādīsu hi rāsito khandho nāma. Na hi parittakaṃ udakaṃ udakakkhandhoti vuccati, bahukameva vuccati, tathā na parittakaṃ rajo rajakkhandho, na appamattakā gāvo gavakkhandho, na appamattakaṃ balaṃ balakkhandho, na appamattakaṃ puññaṃ puññakkhandhoti vuccati. Bahukameva hi rajo rajakkhandho, bahukā ca gavādayo gavakkhandho, balakkhandho, puññakkhandhoti vuccanti. ‘‘Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho’’tiādīsu pana guṇato khandho nāma. ‘‘Addasā khā bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna’’nti ettha paṇṇattito khandho nāma. ‘‘Yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho’’tiādīsu rūḷhīto khandho nāma. Svāyamidha rāsito adhippeto. Ayañhi khandhaṭṭho nāma piṇḍaṭṭho pūgaṭṭho ghaṭaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho, tasmā rāsilakkhaṇā khandhāti veditabbā. Koṭṭhāsaṭṭhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Lokasmiñhi iṇaṃ gahetvā codiyamānā ‘‘dvīhi khandhehi dassāma, tīhi khandhehi dassāmā’’ti ^a^M0.0359^ea^ vadanti. Iti koṭṭhāsalakkhaṇā khandhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Evamettha ^b^‘‘rūpakkhandho^eb^ti rūparāsi rūpakoṭṭhāso, ^b^vedanākkhandho^eb^ti vedanārāsi vedanākoṭṭhāso’’ti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ‘‘Khandhe bhāraṃ. Khandhato otāreti, mahāhanusabhakkhandho’’tiādīsu pana aṃso ‘‘khandho’’ti vuccati.

[03]Vuttampi cetaṃ – āyatanato, āyānaṃ vā tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti veditabbaṃ. Cakkhu rūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamantīti vā vuttaṃ hoti. Te ca pana āyabhūte dhamme etāni tananti vitthārentīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati, tāva nayanti, pavattayantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Iti sabbepime dhammā āyatanato, āyānaṃ vā tananato, āyatassa ca nayanato āyatananti vuccanti.

[03]Apica nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi ‘‘loke issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana’’ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati. ‘‘Suvaṇṇāyatanaṃ rajatāyatana’’ntiādīsu ākaro, sāsane pana ‘‘manorame āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā’’tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M0.0360^ea^. ‘‘Dakkhiṇāpatho gunnaṃ āyatana’’ntiādīsu sañjātideso. ‘‘Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane’’tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.

[03]Cakkhuādīsu cāpi cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Cakkhādīsu te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ ākaro. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ tattha tattha dvārārammaṇavasena samosaraṇato. Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ sañjātideso tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito, cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ tesaṃ abhāve abhāvato. Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhenāti imehi kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatananti vuccanti, tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti ^b^cakkhāyatanaṃ^eb^…pe… dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti ^b^dhammāyatana^eb^nti evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayoti. Iccevaṃ –

[03]Ettha pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi avindiyaṃ nāma, ^b^aladdhabba^eb^nti attho, taṃ avindiyaṃ vindatīti ^b^avijjā,^eb^ tabbiparītato kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma, taṃ vindiyaṃ na vindatīti ^b^avijjā^eb^. Khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ, indriyānaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti ^a^M0.0361^ea^^b^avijjā^eb^. Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti ^b^avijjā,^eb^ antavirahite saṃsāre sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu satte javāpetīti ^b^avijjā,^eb^ paramatthato avijjamānesu itthipurisādīsu javati, vijjamānesupi khandhādīsu na javatīti ^b^avijjā^eb^.

[03]Yaṃ pana ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘apica cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇapaṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannā naṃ dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā’’ti vuttaṃ, etaṃ na saddatthato vuttaṃ, atha kho avijjāya chādanakiccattā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi ^b^abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ idaṃ vuttaṃ –

[08]‘‘Byañjanatthaṃ dassetvā sabhāvatthaṃ dassetuṃ ‘apicā’tiādimāha, cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇāni ‘idaṃ vattu, idamārammaṇa’nti avijjāya ñātuṃ na sakkāti avijjā tappaṭicchādikā vuttā, vatthārammaṇasabhāvacchādanato eva avijjādīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppādabhāvassa, jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppannabhāvassa ca chādanato paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannachādanaṃ veditabbanti. Tattha duggatigāmikammassa visesappaccayattā avijjā ‘avindiyaṃ vindatī’ti vuttā, tathā visesapaccayo vindanīyassa na hotīti ‘vindiyaṃ na vindatī’ti ca, attanissitānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattāpanaṃ uppādanaṃ āyatanaṃ, sammohabhāveneva anabhisamayabhūtattā ‘aviditaṃ aññātaṃ karoti, antavirahite javāpetī’ti vaṇṇāgamavipariyāyavikāravināsadhātuatthavisesayogehi pañcavidhassa niruttilakkhaṇassa vasena tīsupi padesu ^b^a^eb^kāra^b^vi^eb^kāra^b^ja^eb^kāre gahetvā aññesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ lopaṃ katvā ^b^ja^eb^kārassa ca dutiyassa āgamaṃ katvā ^b^avijjā^eb^ti vuttā’’ti.
[03]Tathā hi ^b^araha^eb^nti aggadakkhiṇeyyattā cīvarādipaccaye arahati pūjāvisesañcāti arahaṃ. Vuttañca –

[03]Yañcetaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhiṃ puññādiabhisaṅkhārāraṃ jarāmaraṇanemiṃ āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā vibhavarathe samāyojitaṃ anādikālappavattaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ, tassa so bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇaparasuṃ gahetvā sabbe are hanītipi ^b^arahaṃ^eb^. Vuttañca –

[03]Tathā attahitaṃ parahitañca paripūretuṃ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā pariccajitabbā parihātabbāti rahā, rāgādayo pāpadhammā, na santi etassa rahāti ^a^M0.0363^ea^^b^arahaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Araho’’ti vattabbe ^b^o^eb^kārassa sānusāraṃ ^b^a^eb^kārādesaṃ katvā ‘‘arahaṃ’’nti vuttaṃ. Āha ca –
[03]Atha vā khīṇāsavehi sekkhehi kalyāṇaputhujjanehi ca na rahitabbo na pariccajitabbo, te ca bhagavāti ^b^arahaṃ^eb^. Āha ca –
[03]^b^Raho^eb^ti ca gamanaṃ vuccati, natthi etassa raho gamanaṃ gatīsu paccājātīti ^b^arahaṃ^eb^. Āha ca –
[21]‘‘Raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso;

[03]Pāsaṃsattā vā bhagavā ^b^arahaṃ^eb^. Akkharacintakā hi pasaṃsāyaṃ ^b^araha^eb^sadaṃ vaṇṇenti. Pāsaṃsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito. Iti pāsaṃsattāpi bhagavā ^b^arahaṃ^eb^. Āha ca –

[03]Imāni ^a^M0.0364^ea^ nibbacanāni ^b^‘‘araha pūjāyaṃ, hana hiṃsāyaṃ, raha cāge, rahi gatiya’’^eb^nti imesaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena idha vuttāni kilesehi ārakattā ‘‘araha’’nti ca pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā ‘‘araha’’nti ca asappurisānaṃ ārakā dūreti ‘‘araha’’nti ca sappurisānaṃ ārakā āsanneti ‘‘araha’’nti ca. Nibbacanāni pana dhātusaddanissitāni na hontīti idha na gahitāni. Pasaṃsā pana atthato pūjā evāti ^b^‘‘araha pūjāya’’^eb^nti dhātussa attho bhavituṃ yuttoti idha amhehi gahitā, aṭṭhakathācariyehi tu ^b^araha^eb^saddassa labbhamānavasena sabbepi atthā gahitā dhātunissitā ca adhātunissitā ca. Kathaṃ? –

[03]Ettha hi ^b^sugato^eb^ti sobhanaṃ gataṃ etassāti sugato, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatoti sugato, sammā gatoti sugato, sammā ca gadatīti sugatoti dhātunissitaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā saddanipphatti kātabbā. Vuttañhi ^b^aṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ –

[08]‘‘Sobhanagamanattā ^a^M0.0365^ea^, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā ca gadattā sugato. Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati, tañca bhagavato sobhanaṃ parisuddhamanavajjaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Ariyamaggo, tenesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā sugato’’tiādi.

[03]Atrimāni nibbacanāni – bhagasaṅkhātā lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo vani bhaji sevīti ^b^bhagavā^eb^. Somanassakumārattabhāvādīsu carimattabhāve ca bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti ^b^bhagavā^eb^. Atha vā nakkhattehi samaṃ pavattattā bhagasaṅkhāte sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanaloke vami, tannivāsitattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti.

[03]Ettha ^a^M0.0366^ea^ tāva uttamatthavācaka^b^parama^eb^saddavasena ^b^pāramī^eb^nibbacanaṃ kathessāma. Tato ^b^para^eb^dhātuvasena, tato ^b^para^eb^saddūpapadamudhātādivasena tato ^b^pāra^eb^saddūpapada^b^maja^eb^dhātādivasena.

[03]Dānasīlādiguṇavisesayogena sattuttamatāya paramā. Mahābodhisattā bodhisattā, tesaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ vā ^b^pāramī,^eb^ dānādikriyā. Atha vā parati pāleti pūreti cāti paramo, dānādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ pālako pūrako ca bodhisatto, paramassa ayaṃ, paramassa vā bhāvo, kammaṃ vā ^b^pāramī,^eb^ dānādikriyā. Atha vā paraṃ sattaṃ attani mavati bandhati guṇavisesayogenāti paramo, paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati kilesamalatoti paramo, paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ mayati gacchatīti paramo, paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokaṃ viya munāti paricchindatīti paramo, paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipatīti paramo, paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti paramo, mahāsatto, paramassa ayaṃ, paramassa vā bhāvo, kammaṃ vā ^b^pāramī,^eb^ dānādikriyā.

[03]Aparo nayo – pāre nibbāne majjati sujjhati, satte ca majjeti sodhetīti pāramī, mahāpuriso, tassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā ^b^pāramitā^eb^. Pāre nibbāne satte mavati bandhati yojeīti pāramī, pāraṃ vā nibbānaṃ mayati gacchati, satte ca māyeti gametīti pāramī, munāti vā pāraṃ nibbānaṃ yāthāvato, tattha vā satte minoti pakkhipatīti pāramī, kilesāriṃ vā sattānaṃ pāre nibbāne mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī, mahāpuriso, tassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā ^b^pāramitā,^eb^ dānādikriyāva. Iminā nayena pāramīnaṃ saddattho veditabbo.

[03]Tattha ^b^karuṇā^eb^ti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā. Kirati paradukkaṃ vikkhipatīti ^b^karuṇā^eb^. Kaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhati vibādhati kāruṇikaṃ na sukhāpetītipi ^b^karuṇā^eb^.

[03]Tattha ^b^vijjā^eb^ti vindiyaṃ kāyasucaritādiṃ vindati yāthāvato upalabhatīti vijjā. Tamokhandhādipadālanaṭṭhena vā attano paṭipakkhaṃ vijjhatīti ^b^vijjā^eb^. Tato eva attano visayaṃ viditaṃ karotītipi ^b^vijjā^eb^.
[03]Tattha ^b^medhā^eb^ti sammohaṃ medhati hiṃsatīti medhā. Pāpake vā akusale dhamme medhati hiṃsatītipi ^b^medhā^eb^. Atha vā –

[07]Vacanato pana medhati sīlena siriyā satañca dhammehi saha gacchati, na ekikā hutvā tiṭṭhatītipi ^b^medhā^eb^. Aparo nayo – sukhumampi atthaṃ dhammañca khippameva meti ca dhāreti cāti ^b^medhā,^eb^ ettha ^b^metī^eb^ti gaṇhātīti attho. Tathā hi ^a^M0.0368^ea^^b^aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā, khippaṃ gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā’’ti.
[03]Ranjanti sattā etthāti ^b^ratti,^eb^ rā saddo tiyyati chijjati etthāti ^b^ratti,^eb^ sattānaṃ saddassa vūpasamakāloti attho.

[03]Tathā hi sattānaṃ āyuṃ mānanto viya siyati antaṃ karotīti ^b^māso,^eb^ cittamāsādayo dvādasa māsā. Seyyathidaṃ? Citto visākho jeṭṭho āsāḷho sāvaṇo bhaddo assayujo kattiko māgasiro phusso māgho phagguṇoti. Tatra citto māso ‘‘rammako’’ti vuccati. ‘‘Yathāpi rammake māse, bahū pupphanti vārijā’’ti pāḷi dissati. Bhaddo pana ‘‘poṭṭhapādo’’ti vuccati.

[03]Atha vā ^b^māso^eb^ti aparaṇṇavisesassapi suvaṇṇamāsassapi nāmaṃ. Tattha aparaṇṇaviseso yathāparimite kāle asiyati bhakkhiyatīti ^b^māso,^eb^ itaro pana ‘‘mama ida’’nti masiyati āmasiyati gaṇhiyatīti ^b^māso^eb^ti vuccati.
[03]Tathā hi taṃ taṃ sattaṃ dhammappavattiñca saṅgamma vadanto viya carati pavattatīti ^b^saṃvaccharo^eb^.
[03]Tathā hi kilese bhindatīti ^b^bhikkhu^eb^. Chinnabhinnapaṭadharotipi ^b^bhikkhu^eb^. Bhikkhanasīlotipi ^b^bhikkhu^eb^. Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhati, ikkhanasīloti vā ^b^bhikkhu^eb^.

[03]Atrimāni nibbacanāni – sīdanasabhāve kilese bhindatīti ^b^sabbhi,^eb^ sappuriso, yo ‘‘ariyo’’tipi ‘‘paṇḍito’’tipi vuccati. Apica sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti etthāti ^b^sabbhi,^eb^ nibbānaṃ, yaṃ ‘‘rāgakkhayo’’tiādināmaṃ labhati. Tathā hi ^b^saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘yasmā nibbānaṃ āgamma sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti, tasmā taṃ sabbhīti vuccatī’’ti.
[03]Tathā hi bravantā ettha sīdantīti ^b^bhisī^eb^ti ^b^bhisi^eb^saddassa sambhavaṃ porāṇā kathayiṃsu.
[03]^b^Sukha^eb^nti ^a^M0.0370^ea^ hi sukhayatīti sukhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khādatītipi ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^. Suṭṭu dukkhaṃ khanatītipi ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Dukkha^eb^nti hi dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti attho. Duṭṭhu sukhaṃ khādatītipi ^b^dukkhaṃ^eb^. Duṭṭhu sukhaṃ khanatītipi ^b^dukkhaṃ^eb^. Atha vā dvidhā sukhaṃ khanatītipi ^b^dukkhaṃ^eb^.

[03]Tathā hi gandhayatīti ^b^gandho,^eb^ attano vatthuṃ sūcayati ‘‘idaṃ sugandhaṃ, idaṃ duggandha’’nti pakāseti, paṭicchannaṃ, vā pupphaphalādiṃ ‘‘idamettha atthī’’ti pesuññaṃ karonto viya ahosīti attho. Atha vā gandhayati chindati manāpagandho sugandhabhāvena duggandhaṃ, amanāpagandho ca duggandhabhāvena sugandhanti ^b^gandho^eb^. Ettha pana ^b^gandha^eb^saddassa chedanavācakatte –

[07]Ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Vāyunā vā nīyamāno gacchatīti ^b^gandho. Kaccāyanasmiñhi^eb^ ‘‘khādāmagamānaṃ khandhandhagandhā’’ti ^b^khādāmagami^eb^iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^khandha andhagandhā^eb^desā vuttā. Atha vā gacchanto dhariyate soti ^b^gandho^eb^. Vuttañhetaṃ bhadantena ^b^buddhadattācariyena^eb^ veyyākaraṇena niruttinayadassinā ‘‘dhariyatīti gacchanto, gandho sūcanatopi vā’’ti.

[03]^b^Raso^eb^ti ^a^M0.0371^ea^ hi rasanti taṃ assādentīti ^b^raso,^eb^ ramantā taṃ asantītipi ^b^raso^eb^. Vuttampi cetaṃ ‘‘ramamānā na’santīti rasoti paridīpito’’ti. Tatrāyamattho – devamanussādayo sattā yasmā ramamānā naṃ dhammajātaṃ asanti bhakkhanti, tasmā taṃ dhammajātaṃ raso nāmāti niruttaññūhi paridīpitoti. Padacchedo pana evaṃ veditabbo –
[21]Naṃ asanti na santīti, padacchedo siyā tahiṃ;

[03]Seyyathidaṃ? ‘‘Viḍūḍabho, tisso, yevāpano, pītaṃ, lohitaṃ’’ iccevamādīni nāmikapadāni anipphannāni bhavanti. ‘‘Nīlaṃ, pītaṃ, yevāpanako’’ iccādīni pana nīlavaṇṇe pītavaṇṇe. ^b^Ke re ge sadde^eb^ti dhātuvasena āgatattā nīlatīti ^b^nīlaṃ,^eb^ pītatīti ^b^pītaṃ,^eb^ ye vā pana itivacanena bhagavatā kiyate kathiyateti ^b^yevāpanako^eb^ti nibbacanamarahantīti nipphannānīti vattabbāni. Keci panettha vadeyyuṃ ‘‘nanu nīlati pītatītiādīni kriyāpadāni tepiṭake buddhavacane na dissantī’’ti? Kiñcāpi ^a^M0.0372^ea^ na dissanti, tathāpi etarahi avijjamānā purāṇabhāsā esāti gahetabbāni. Yathā hi ‘‘nāthatīti nātho’’ti ettha kiñcāpi ‘‘nāthatī’’ti kriyāpadaṃ buddhavacane na dissati, tathāpi ^b^nātha yācanopatāpissariyāsīsanesū^eb^ti dhātuno diṭṭhattā aṭṭhakathācariyā gaṇhiṃsuyeva, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi kriyāpadaparihīno dhātu vucceyya.

[03]Kiñca bhiyyo – yathā ‘‘yāva byāti nimīsati, tatrāpi rasatibbayo’’ti ^b^jātakapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devamanussānaṃ vohārapathe asañcarantaṃ purāṇabhāsābhūtaṃ ‘‘byātī’’ti kriyāpadampi dissati, tathā ‘‘nīlati, pītatī’’tiādīhipi purāṇabhāsābhūtehi kriyāpadehi bhavitabbaṃ. Tattha ^b^yāva byātī^eb^ti yāva ummīsati. Ayañhi tasmiṃ kāle vohāro, yasmiṃ kāle bodhisatto cūḷabodhi nāma paribbājako ahosi. Yathā pana ^b^viḍūḍabha^eb^saddādayo dhātuvasena anipphannā nāma vuccanti, tathā ‘‘pabbatāyati, samuddāyati, cicciṭāyati, dhūmāyati, duddubhāyati, mettāyati, karuṇāyati, mamāyati’’ iccevamādayo ca ‘‘chattīyati, vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, dhanīyati, paṭīyati’’ iccevamādayo ca ‘‘atihatthayati, upavīṇayati, daḷhayati, pamāṇayati, kusalayati, visuddhayati’’ iccevamādayo ca dhātuvasena anipphannāyeva nāma vuccanti.

[03]Tattha ‘‘pabbatāyatī’’tiādīsu saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati ^b^pabbatāyati,^eb^ evaṃ ^b^samuddāyati^eb^. Saddo cicciṭamiva attānamācarati ^b^cicciṭāyati^eb^. Vatthu dhūmamiva attānamācarati ^b^dhūmāyati^eb^. Saddo duddubhaiti ācarati ^b^duddubhāyati,^eb^ bhikkhu mettāyati, tathā karuṇāyati. ‘‘Mama ida’’nti gaṇhati ^b^mamāyati^eb^. Achattaṃ chattamiva ācarati ^b^chattīyati^eb^. Aputtaṃ ^a^M0.0373^ea^ puttamiva ācarati ^b^puttīyati,^eb^ sissaṃ ācariyo, attano pattamicchati ^b^pattīyati^eb^. Evaṃ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, dhanīyati, paṭīyati. Hatthinā atikkamati ^b^atihatthayati^eb^. Vīṇāya upagāyati ^b^upavīṇayati^eb^. Daḷhaṃ karoti vīriyaṃ ^b^daḷhayati^eb^. Pamāṇaṃ karoti ^b^pamāṇayati^eb^. Kusalaṃ pucchati ^b^kusalayati^eb^. Visuddhā hoti ratti ^b^visuddhāyati^eb^.

[03]Tatrāyaṃ padamālā – ‘‘pabbatāyati, pabbatāyanti. Pabbatāyasi, pabbatāyatha. Pabbatāyāmi, pabbatāyāmā’’ti iminā nayena aṭṭhannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vasena sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ, evaṃ ‘‘samuddāyati, chattīyatī’’tiādīsu. Tatra kāritavasenapi ‘‘pabbatāyantaṃ payojayati pabbatāyati, puttiyantaṃ payojayati puttīyati’’ iccādi padasiddhi bhavati. Ayaṃ pana padamālā – pabbatāyati, pabbatāyanti. Pabbatāyasi. Sesaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Iccevaṃ dhātuvasena nipphannānipphannapadāni vibhāvitāni.

[03]Idāni dhātugaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, adhātulakkhaṇaṃ, kāritapaccayayogaṃ, sakāritekakammadvikammatikammapadaṃ, ūhanīyarūpagaṇaṃ, dhātūnaṃ ekagaṇikadvigaṇikategaṇikapadaṃ, suddhakattuhetukattupadarūpaṃ, kammabhāvapadarūpaṃ, ekakāritadvikāritapadaṃ, akāritadvikammakapadañca sabbametaṃ yathārahaṃ kathayāma.

[03]Tatra sabbadhātukanissite suddhakattuppayoge suddhassaradhātuto vā ekassarato vā anekassarato vā ^b^a^eb^paccayassa parabhāvo ^b^bhūvādi^eb^gaṇalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena, visesalakkhaṇavasena pana ākhyātatte ^b^i^eb^kārantānekassaradhātuto saha ^b^a^eb^paccayena niccaṃ niggahītāgamanañca nāmikatte niggahītāgamanamattañca ^b^bhūvādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Ākyātatte kattari dhātūhi ^b^a^eb^paccayena saddhiṃniyatavasena niggahītāgamanaṃ ^b^rudhādi^eb^gaṇalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena, visesalakkhaṇavasena ^a^M0.0374^ea^ pana ākhyātatte kattari dhātūhi ^b^ivaṇṇekārokāra^eb^paccayehi saddhiṃ niyatavasena niggahītāgamanañca nāmakatte aniyatavasena niggahītāgamanamattañca ^b^rudhādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Kattari dhātūhi ādesalābhālābhino ^b^ya^eb^paccayassa parabhāvo ^b^divādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Kattari dhātūhi yathārahaṃ ^b^ṇu ṇā uṇā^eb^paccayānaṃ parabhāvo ^b^svādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Kattari dhātūhi ^b^nā^eb^paccayassa parabhāvo ^b^kiyādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Kattari dhātūhi ākhyātatte appakatarappayogavasena nāmikatte pacurappayogavasena ^b^ppaṇhā^eb^paccayānaṃ parabhāvo ^b^gahādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Kattari dhātūhi yathāsambhavaṃ ^b^oyira^eb^ppaccayānaṃ parabhāvo ^b^tanādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Ākhyātatte kattari dhātūhi sabbathā ^b^ṇeṇaya^eb^ppaccayānaṃ parabhāvo ^b^curādi^eb^gaṇalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena, visesalakkhaṇavasena pana ākhyātatte ^b^i^eb^kārantadhātuto saha ^b^ṇe ṇaya^eb^paccayehi niccaṃ niggahītāgamanañca nāmikatte niggahītāgamanamattañca ^b^curādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Gaṇasūcakānaṃ paccayānamaparattaṃ ^b^adhātulakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Iti dhātugaṇalakkhaṇamadhātulakkhaṇaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.
[03]Kāritapaccayassa yoge ‘‘ṇe ṇayo ṇāpe ṇāpayo cā’’ti ime cattāro kāritapaccayā.
[03]Tatra sāveti, sāvayati. Bhāveti, bhāvayati, obhāseti, obhāsayati. Imāni kārite uvaṇṇantadhāturūpāni.
[03]Dāpeti ^a^M0.0375^ea^, dāpayati. Hāpeti, hāpayati. Nhāpeti, nhāpayati. Nahāpeti, nahāpayati. ^b^Ā^eb^kārantadhāturūpāni.

[03]Maggo saṃsārato lokaṃ ñāpeti, ñāpayati. ^b^I^eb^dhāturūpāni niggacchāpetīti etesamattho. Imāni hi ^b^ni^eb^pubbāya ^b^i^eb^dhātuyā vasena sambhūtāni hetukatturūpāni. Tathā hi suddhakattubhāvena maggo sayaṃ ñāyati, saṃsārato niggacchatīti ñāyoti vuccati.

[03]Pāveti, pāvayati, ^b^u^eb^dhāturūpāni. Vadāpetīti etesamattho. Imāni hi papubbāya ^b^u^eb^dhātuyā vasena sambhūtāni hetukatturūpāni. Tathā hi ‘‘yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā’’ti suddhakattupadaṃ āhaccabhāsitaṃ dissati.
[03]Khepeti, khepayati. Kaṅkheti, kaṅkhayati, kaṅkhāpeti, kaṅkhāpayati. Ācikkhāpeti, ācikkhāpayati. ^b^I^eb^vaṇṇantadhāturūpāni.
[03]Pabbatāyāyati, puttiyāyati. Adhātunissitāni rūpāni. Iminā nayena sesāni avuttānipi rūpāni sakkā viññātuṃ viññunā pāḷinayaññunāti vitthāro na dassito. Iti kāritapaccayayogo saṅkhepena vibhāvito.

[03]Idāni ^b^ūhanīyarūpagaṇaṃ^eb^ brūma – hoti, bhoti, sambhoti, idaṃ ^b^bhūvādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Sumbhoti, parisumbhoti, idaṃ ^b^rudhādi^eb^gūpaṃ. Nindati, vinindati, bandhati, idaṃ ^b^bhūvādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Chindati, bhindati, rundhati, idaṃ ^b^rudhādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Deti, neti, vadeti, anveti, idaṃ ^b^bhūvādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Rundheti, paṭirundheti, idaṃ ^b^rudhādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Buddheti, palibuddheti, idaṃ ^b^curādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Jayati, sayati, palāyati, milāyati, gāyati, idaṃ ^b^bhūvādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Hāyati, sāyati, nhāyati, idaṃ ^b^divādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Kathayati, cintayati, bhājayati, idaṃ ^b^curādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Gabbati, pagabbati, idaṃ ^b^bhūvādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Kubbati, krubbati, idaṃ ^b^tanādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Hinoti, cinoti, idaṃ ^b^svādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Tanoti, sanoti, karoti, idaṃ ^b^tanādi^eb^rūpaṃ. Cinteti, cintayati, idaṃ katturūpañceva hetukatturūpañca. Kanteti, kantayati, idaṃ hetukatturūpameva. Bhakkheti, bhakkhayati, vādeti, vādayati, idaṃ suddhakatturūpañceva hetukatturūpañca. ^b^Miyyatī^eb^ti kattupadañceva kammapadañca. ^b^Bhāvethā^eb^ti bahuvacanañceva ekavacanañca. ^b^Saṃyamissa^eb^nti anāgatavacanañceva atītavacanañca. ^b^Anusāsatī^eb^ti ākhyātañceva nāmikañca. ^b^Gacchaṃ vidhamaṃ nikkhaṇa^eb^nti nāmikañceva ^a^M0.0377^ea^ ākhyātañca. Ettha ākhyātatte ^b^gaccha^eb^nti anāgatavacanaṃ, ^b^vidhama^eb^nti atītavacanaṃ, ^b^nikhaṇa^eb^nti parikappavacanaṃ, sabbaṃ vā etaṃ padaṃ anāgatādhivacanantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭateva. Iminā nayena aññānipi ūhanīyapadāni nānappakārato yojetabbāni. Imāni padāni dubbiññeyyavisesāni mandabuddhīnaṃ sammohakarāni ācariyapācariye payirupāsitvā vedanīyānīti ūhanīyarūpagaṇo vibhāvito.

[03]Idāni ^b^ekagaṇikādīni^eb^ vadāma – ^b^dhā dhāraṇe, bhūvādi^eb^gaṇikavasenāyaṃ ekagaṇikā sakammikā dhātu. Bhagavā sakalalokassa hitaṃ dadhāti vidadhāti, puriso atthaṃ saṃvidheti, nidhiṃ nidheti, imāni suddhakattari bhavanti. ‘‘Saṃvidhāpeti, vidhāpetī’’ti imāni hetukattari bhavanti. Kamme pana bhāve ca ‘‘anuvidhīyatī’’tiādīni bhavanti. Tathā hi kamme ‘‘nidhi nāma nidhīyatī’’ti ca ‘‘dhīyati dhapiyatīti dheyya’’nti ca rūpāni dissanti. Tattha kamme ‘‘kammaṃ sattehi anuvidhiyyati, kammāni sattehi anuvidhiyyanti. Bho kamma tvaṃ sattehi anuvidhiyyasi, ahaṃ kammaṃ sattehi anuvidhiyyāmī’’tiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Bhāve pana ‘‘satto dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyati, sattā dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyanti, to satta tvaṃ dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyasī’’ti yojetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo ativiya sukhumo pāḷinayānukūlo.

[03]Nāmikapadatte ‘‘dhātū’’tiādīni bhavanti. Tattha ^b^dhātū^eb^ti salakkhaṇaṃ dadhāti dhāretīti dhātu. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāsu^eb^ pana ‘‘salakkhaṇadhāraṇato dukkhavidhānato dukkhadhānato ca dhātū’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhātū^eb^ti pathavīdhātādidhātuyo. Tattha ^b^salakkhaṇadhāraṇato^eb^ti yathā titthiyaparikappito pakati attāti evamādiko sabhāvato natthi, na evametā, etā pana salakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo ^a^M0.0378^ea^. ^b^Dukkhavidhānato^eb^ti dukkhassa vidahanato.
